story:
If you are like us, prior to showering, you turn on the water and do something else while waiting for the water to get hot. Sometimes you forget that the water is running or you keep checking the temperature until it’s warm enough. Meanwhile, you’re wasting water and paying more on your energy bill. Now you can stop worrying because Livin Shower Save automatically stops water once it reaches the desired temperature. Save water without even knowing it.

Do you often feel guilty for keeping the water running while you soap or shampoo? But you do it anyway because no one wants to lose that perfect temperature when turning the water down and then up again. We made it simple for you, just click the Button to pause and resume water without any heat loss. Easy. And you won’t feel bad.

The Button is not just a beautiful decor on your bathroom wall but it indicates how much water you’ve used via LED lights. Set a goal of the amount of water you want to use. The lights will gradually light up around the circle as your water usage approaches the goal, nudging you to wrap up.

Water Blink™ will let you know when you’ve met 90% of your goal by quickly pausing and resuming water. Be conscious of how you use water.

Set a timer according to minutes or water usage, and the Button will give you a heads up when it hits 85% of your goal so you can start to finish up your shower.

Oh, did we tell you that it also works as a clock? You can quickly check what time it is by double-clicking the Button.

Double tapping the Button shows the current time of 7:05.

Our showerhead uses a low flow rate of 2.0 gpm (gallons per minute) without compromising full water pressure. It meets the Watersense EPA Criteria.

However, if you still like to use your own showerhead (like one with a hose, etc.), our showerhead part can be easily replaced with your own, so that you can keep enjoying other features from Livin Shower Save.

Enjoy the savings! Our mobile app puts together data from your showers and reports how much you have saved. The report includes water usage, shower duration, temperature patterns, and historical data of each shower. You can even see your savings rank among other Livin Shower Save users.

Worried about hot water when it comes to the kids taking their shower? According to the study from American Burn Association, in the United States, every year more than 1,500 people get scalded and hospitalized by hot water at home.

Our “Safety Lock” feature lets you set temperature limits so Livin Shower Save shuts off water flow to prevent scalding if the temperature goes over a certain level.

There’s more to water than meets the eye. It costs gas or electricity to heat it up. When you are taking a shower, you spend $0.231 for water and $0.319 for electricity on average. So the more you use hot water, the more you pay for both water and energy more.

A household of 4 people can save about $185 to $302 a year* by stopping the water flow once the water warms up and by using the pause/resume button while showering with our low-flow showerhead.

In just 4 months, you can pay off Livin Shower Save, and the future savings are yours!

No need to tear down the wall or get professional help. There’s no pricey installation involved here. Livin Shower Save’s showerhead simply replaces your current showerhead. It can be installed by yourself with simple hand tools within 10 minutes.

The Button, a detachable remote control, has a magnet inside so you can attach it to a wall mount.

We are a team of talented engineers and designers with an average of 10 years of experience in designing and manufacturing consumer electronics.

We believe we can live more humane and inspirational lives by producing thoughtful products within our living environment. We strive to make stylish products and offer services that enrich people’s everyday water use while using relevant technology and in consideration of the environment.

Livin team is comprised of talented people who have expertise in engineering, design, manufacturing, and business with an average of 10 years of experience in consumer software and hardware products. Everyone is working hard to bring Livin Shower Save to life. We have spent over two years developing this technology and going through multiple cycles of designing-prototyping-testing to polish up our product. Now we are working closely with our manufacturers to make sure that is a quality product and will be delivered on-time.

Through this Indiegogo campaign and your support, we will be able to scale up the manufacturing in order to move forward. The funds from the campaign will cover the costs for manufacturing, developing software, and other project costs including applicable state and local taxes.

What you are seeing here are prototypes, and we are continually improving upon the product. Please expect the final product to be more refined with excellent quality. We understand that no campaign comes without challenges. In any case, we promise to communicate with transparency and work around the clock to ensure your expectations are met.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Why We Design This Pet Bed

My wife and I have a cute dog Abel, who likes sleeping at the colder surface such as the floor instead of his soft bed in summer. However, the floor is too hard, not comfortable and bad for his joints. Many dogs will experience chronic joint pain as they age, and can result in stiffness, limping,  lethargy and irritability. We do not want our furry buddy to suffer any of the joint and spine problems due to a bad bed and we want to offer him the most comfortable rest place in his decade of life.

We searched from the market, and unfortunately, none of the existing product could be 5 stars in our mind.

We realized that the pet products are not thoughtful enough and are falling behind the advances in information technology. In order to give Abel and all the lovely furry friends a more comfortable & smart life, we decided to design and produce a family of thoughtful products for pets. All products will be thoughtful and smart.  

They can track and monitor the everyday life of your pet, which includes temperature, sleep, food, drink, location, walk, insurance,  and sync data to the cloud. We will analyze the big-data and give you useful suggestions to make your pet live better.

The first product is this pet bed, we listed the problems that need to be solved:

  • The bed should keep cool in summer and keep warm in winter.
  • The bed should neither too hard nor too soft. It should supportive, comfortable and allows the body to relax and complete rest.
  • The bed should be water resistant, easy to clean and never let stains go inside.
  • The bed should eliminate odor by itself, keeps air clean and fresh.
  • The bed should easy to wash both by hand and machine.
  • The bed should strong enough and bite resistant.
  • Most importantly, all materials should no harm to pet’s health.
  • Additionally, the plus version could monitor the pet's body index and sync data to the cloud and mobile APP.

We looked for staffs who was working in the home textiles industry and engineers to join our team and started to design the dream pet bed. After a year of research and experiment, we finally resolved all the problems above.

Pawpia PetBed One Description

1. Cooling Tech, Dual-side cushion

Cooling-Tech: The cushion will not let the body cold but will instead absorb excess heat through the gel surface and into the cushion.

Truth: Dogs only produce sweat on areas not covered with furs, such as the nose and paw pads, unlike humans who sweat almost everywhere. Keeps your fur friends cool is really important for him/her.

2. Premium Memory Foam

The premium human grade memory foam is supportive, comfortable, and guarantees a restful sleep for your dog.

Memory foam distribute body weight evenly, The biggest benefit of a memory foam is that it allows the body to relax and complete rest.

 

It will soften and firm up in all the right places. This provides excellent comfort and support for your pets, relieving both tension and stress. 

3. Breathable Water Resistant Fabric

Water-resistant fabric never let stains go inside, it is easy to clean - just wipe with a clean paper towel.


 

4. Build-in Bamboo Charcoal

The Bamboo Charcoal will eliminate odor and keeps air clean and fresh all the time.

5. Removable & Machine Washable Cover

You can easily remove all covers with only one zip.

6. Strong & Chew Proof

We have full confidence in the quality of our product and offer 5 years warranty. 

7. All Materials are Safe & Non-Toxic

We designed this bed for our own pet Abel and all of the lovely furry friends. Safety is always the first rule for our group. All materials we use are no harm to pets and human.

Pawpia PetBed One Plus Description

1. Monitor Your Pet’s Temperature

Every time you go to vet, they will take the temperature of your pets. The body temperature is one of the most important physiological signs, which reflect your pet’s health. The Pawpia PetBed One Plus has multiple sensors for measuring your pet’s body temperature. You will get alerts in APP once the temperature goes out of range.

        a. Setup your pet’s breed in APP, we will know the normal temperature range.

        b. Pawpia PetBed One Plus will monitor the temperature change all day.

        c. You will get Alert in APP once the temperature goes out of range. Early detection and early treatment are very important for some diseases.

2. Track Your Pet’s Sleeping Quality

How is your pet sleep? When does your pet have a deep sleep, light sleep or just rest every day? Pawpia PetBed One Plus will show you the sleep quality report each day. If the sleep habit changes suddenly, it‘s usually an indication that something is wrong with your pet’s health.

3. Synch Your Pet’s Health Data into cloud and APP

Pawpia PetBed One Plus can connect to your home wifi and sync data to cloud. You can reach your pet’s health data everywhere from a browser or mobile APP.

Models In The Bed

What We Offer

1. Four Different Colors

Size Table:

  • S:        20.5 * 15.8 * 11 inches (less than 5 lbs)
  • M:       23.5 * 17.8 * 11 inches (5-12lbs)
  • L:        29.5 * 23.8 * 11 inches (12-35lbs)
  • XL:     35.5 * 29.8 * 11 inches (35-80lbs)
  • XXL:  47.5 * 39.8 * 11 inches (more than 80lbs)

2. Customisable Cushion

We can print your own picture to the cushion:

3. Two Versions of Pet Bed

1. Pawpia PetBed One:

This is the basic version without smart sensors. We will start to ship this one in early November 2017.

2. Pawpia PetBed One Plus: 

If you choose Plus upgrade, we will start to send you the basic version in early November 2017 and send out the plus upgrade package in early 2018.

4. Cute Pillows For Pets

All pillows have a plastic noisemaking squeaker.

Bones & Candies &Classic Pillow

Special Pillow

 

Promotion Rewards

Log in and share this wonderful pet bed to your friends, your friend will appreciate your recommendation and you will get rewards based on all of your friends total spend:

  • $50-$100: 1 of the Bones, Candies or Classic pillow.
  • $100-$200: 1 of the Special pillow.
  • $200 and above: Above pillows + 10% cash return.
    • Cash check amount = (Your Friends Total Spend - 200) * 10%

Also, your friend will get one of the cute pillows above.

Why We Need Your Help

  • Put it into mass production to serve more pets, which planned to start in mid-October.
  • Continue to implement Pawpia Cloud and the mobile app.

story:
The Basics

Hi IndieGoGo, we're Andrew Heine and Tony Collins, and we're here to fund low-cost, custom nightlights.

Lighting seems so simple, but whether you're reading at night or walking in the hallway, there never seems to be the perfect set up to help you see what you're doing. That's why we've created lightbox. It can go anywhere, and has multiple options for how it stays on.

What it is

Each light comes with an on/off switch for the LED, and your choice of LED and sensor. The LED options are a 28,500mcd white light for lighting an entire room, and a 5,000mcd red light for keeping night vision. Each of them is diffused to spread light throughout the room. The sensors are an additional way to turn the LED on. The sound sensor responds to noises about as loud as a clap, and the motions sensor works from 3 meters away. Each sensor lights the LED for 30 seconds.

We need your help

By using simple technology, we've been able to keep our prices low for timers, however, we still need more funding to try out better and cheaper sensors. With your help, we can make a beautiful, functional, and cheap lighting solution for anywhere in your home.

story:
We spend one third of our lives sleeping. But we’ve all been through hard times in sleeping, and waking up.

 

 

The main technology behind UP light is the fact that light is a very important external factor affecting human’s sleep-wake cycles.

Naturally, our body wakes up when the sun rises because the daylight helps increase our cortisol, the main stress hormone in our body, to a level where our brain tells our body to get up and be energetic for the whole day. However, we don’t want cortisol level high all the time, especially when it is time to have a rest. Cortisol production should decrease gradually throughout the day, until it reaches its lowest level late in the evening.

At the time when cortisol decreases, another sleep-inducing hormone level becomes higher to regulate our sleep/wake cycle - melatonin. However, the lights from our home lights and smart devices screens will suppress the production of melatonin. Lower melatonin, together with an elevated cortisol level, will cause sleep disorders like insomnia and delayed phase sleep disorder. 

Based on these scientific facts, the UP team created a light that can simulate sunrise in the morning to help our bodies wake up, and sends out light with the right wavelengths to prepare us for a good sleep.

UP’s wake up mode starts from a dim yellow light and gradually changes to bright yellow, just like the process of sunrise. The increase of light intensity stimulates your body until you wakes up naturally. Set up the time frame you want to get up and your UP will start the sunrise simulation process until your room is filled with bright sunlight.

You can also select a nature sound to wake you up together with the sunlight.

UP connects with the app via WIFI connection. You can even control your UP while you are away from home. 

 

UP features 16 million colors and unlimited brightness levels. What’s even better? Everything happens at your fingertips! Light your UP using unique color and brightness selections.

With UP’s high quality bluetooth speaker, you can wake up, fall asleep, and do everything you want along with your favorite songs! Easy pair and control via bluetooth.

UP has different modes that allow you to match it with your current mood and environment. Select firefly mode when you are reading a bedtime story for your child or switch to music mode to let the light dance to the rhythm.

With a 6000mah rechargeable battery, UP has an incredible long burn time and meanwhile serves as a power bank for your other devices.

UP will send out dim red lights to help you fall asleep naturally.

Match your lighting to the sound in your home. UP will change with whatever you are playing, creating exhilarating lighting effects in real time. UP is a must-have in your home party!

With a removable strap, you can easily take UP with you to the campsites, or any outdoor places.

 

Sleep plays an important role in our physical health. However, most of us suffer from occasional sleep problems, such as insomnia, sleep disorders and so on. So we created UP, an affordable smart light that helps people sleep better, meanwhile brings no side effects.

 

 

Hoox is a young, dynamic and creative entrepreneurial team, with R & D, production for an integral whole. We specialize in the field of 3C digital accessories, adhere to the original, focus on the customer experience, to provide users create high-end, quality, fashion, personalized products.

story:
The E-Reading / Mobile / Tablet Revolution has Gone to the Toilet 

You might even say that it's a movement! Every you look, people are reading on a device. In cafes, on hammocks, on the subway, even by the sea. Kindles, iPads, Nooks, E-Readers of all stripes are everywhere.

One day, while doing my business and enjoying my Kindle edition of the NY Times, I set my e-reader on the edge of the bathtub and it nearly fell in. This near miss made me realize that I wanted my device to have its own safe spot in my favorite reading spot. So I borrowed my daughter's sewing machine and, several iterations later, came up with the John-E-Reader: a handcrafted e-reader bathroom storage solution. I gave a few early prototypes available to my in-laws for Christmas. I'm pretty sure they were "delighted".

I want to make the John-E-Reader in two colors - navy blue and white. There’s two sizes. “Standard” ($23) and “Jumbo” ($27) . Standard works with everything up to 5 and a half inches wide. The jumbo is great for the iPad or other larger tablets.

If you like reading your tablet on the toilet, your Kindle on your commode, and your iPad on the potty, then the John-E-Reader is for you. 

A Kindle Paperwhite in a standard John-E-Reader.

 
The jumbo John-E-Reader with an iPad 2.
 
 
Laser-cut acrylic hooks keep your John-E-Reader securely in place.
 

Some FAQs

Hey Chad. This thing seems really easy to make, why should I buy one from you? 

Your right, it doesn't take Project Runway sewing skills to put together a John-E-Reader.  I borrowed my daughter's sewing machine to make a small batch (including the ones shown here) as Christmas gifts for my in-laws. Also, if you don't have access to a laser cutter, then you can just use a bit of string or ribbon to attach it to the TP bar. If your bathroom is really manly, you can make your own out of leather. To save you the trouble of all those pesky measurements, I'm offering downloadable instructions and plans at the $9 level (for personal use only!). 

Why $2070? That seems like a pretty random goal.  

Thanks for asking and I'm glad you noticed! That takes me to 90 regular size John-E-Readers. That's a threshold for me that makes it a production run worth it. I'll use the money to pay for materials, some sewing help, and, of course, laser cutting the acrylic handles. 

How come just two colors? Would you consider adding more materials? Like, how about terrycloth?

If this project attracts a lot of support, I'm totally open to adding more material choices as stretch goals. But I think its a bit premature to be talking about stretch goals. Terrycloth is certainly a comfy suggestion!

So, do you have a background in textile production, design, or fashion? 

Um, no. My background is in broadcast journalism and video production, but I really enjoy the satisfaction of making tangible things and also happen to be a patent-holding inventor.  I have a bunch of fun ideas and hope that this can be the first of many crowdsource-financed projects for me.

story:
Thanks for the Media Support!

 

THE LEGEND HAS IT....

Once Upon A Time In China,

There was a poor farmer named Shen Wansan in the Ming Dynasty. One day, he came upon a magical treasure bowl by accident. Ever since then, he has became one of the richest man in China.....

 

 

INTRODUCING HERB & RICH CONNECT.

Inspired by the “Treasure Bowl” tale and with the integration of smart technology, “Herb & Rich” is a fun LED lighting, planting and coin-saving system that is specifically designed to bring you joy and fortune.

With a metallic lamp base, "treasure bowl"-like piggy bank at the bottom and bonsai at the top as well as round design that reflects Taichi in the Chinese culture, “Herb & Rich“ is USB-powered and comes with a smart iOS/Android app for you to control the lighting while having fun with its coin-activated fortune cookie game.

The touch-triggered LED light provides your plants the light they need while illuminating gold glow inside the treasure bowl when a coin is deposited in the bowl.

“Herb & Rich“ is the perfect combination of ancient wisdom and modern technology. Whether you are using it as a Feng-Shiu deco at home, a lucky adornment in the office or a fun tips- collector at the counter of your store, it is definitely going to strike up some conversations.

 

The Design of “Circle” 

The idea of “Taichi Circle/Cycle” is crucial in Chinese culture. It symbolizes an ecosystem and a sense of completeness, harmony, satisfaction as well as perfection. The concept of everything comes into to a full circle also resonates the philosophy of “what goes around, comes around.”

With that in mind, the “Herb & Rich” design embodies “circle” in every possible way. Whether it’s the round treasure bowl or the curvy, arc-shaped aluminum lamp tube, they all mean to bring harmonic balance, fullness and fortune to the household.

The aesthetically pleasing, intriguing and modern design totally compliments your modern lifestyle while its perfect size is also great for being an unique deco both at home and in the office.

 

USB Input

Combining modern technology, “Herb & Rich“ has a Micro-USB port and can be powered with any USB connectors.

 

Plants & Smart-Controlled LED Lights- Bringing Green to Your Environment

Living in an urban jungle, we all need a little green in our lives from time to time. Green plants do not only provide you with freshener air but also are great for your eyes after a long day at work. Yet, with our busy schedule, sometimes it is just a bit difficult for us to keep track of the beloved greens around us.

With “Herb & Rich,” you are able to turn on/off the LED light, set the timer and adjust its brightness in the palms of your hand via our carefully-designed app on your bluetooth-enabled smart phones (iOS and Android compatible). The smart control features allow you to make sure your plants obtain all the light they need to grow and flourish indoor as if they were in an outdoor setting.

The best thing is, if you own both the "Herb & Rich" and "Herb & Fish," you are also able to control both of them right on your phone. You can sync up to 5 devices with your smart phone.

The greener the environment, the more calm and zen your will feel.

 

Treasure-Bowl Piggy Bank With Digital Fortune Cookies— Teaching Your Children Good Saving Habits

It’s important for us as parents to teach our children how to save money and encourage them to form good money habits at young age. Most children will take these habits into adulthood and they can subsequently affect their financial decisions for the rest of their lives. As a responsible parent, money education is something we cannot ignore and by turning it into something fun yet educational is definitely beneficial for our kids in the long run. This, is where “Herb & Rich” comes in.

 

Tip box

“Herb & Rich” is not your regular piggy bank. By inserting the coins, the sensor on the opening slot would send a signal to our cleverly-designed app and a fortune cookie will pop up on your app screen with the well-wished fortunetelling of the day. It is the perfect ice-breaker and tips-collector for your store.

 

HOW IT WORKS

Herb&Rich is easy to use and control by a smartphone (iOS/Android supported).

Connect:

  • Base on Bluetooth 4.0 LE  
  • Install ARKY HOME APP  
  • Activate the Bluetooth in your smatphone (no need pairing)  
  • Activate ARKY HOME APP  
  • Search and connect via the APP 

Control:

  • Touch the hidden button on the light cover to turn on/off the upper light and bowl light.
  • Set timer of the light in app.

Coin reaction:

We build a sensor to react when you put a coin(metal coin only) in Herb&Rich. Once you insert a coin, the sensor will detect and send a signal to the APP via Bluetooth. The APP will show a fortune message.

Having fun by saving money only in Herb&Rich.  

 

Product testing and interaction

3D Structure Engineer - Ben & Hardware Engineer - Tim are working together with the staff in mold factory.

 

Size and specification

  • Material：Aluminium, Plastic  
  • Capacity：1300ml 
  • Net Weight：appro. 450g 
  • Size：23.3x17.7x35.8 cm 
  • LED：12 Light bulbs, 1w
  • LED(bowl)：6 Light bulbs, 1W 
  • Bluetooth：4.0 
  • Input：DC 5V 2A Micro USB 
  • What's In The Box：Herb&Rich x1/Micro USB cable x1 
  • Made in TAIWAN

 

Patent

With its circle-inspired sleek design, “Herb & Rich” isn't just nice on the eyes, it is also patented in Europe, China and Taiwan.

  • TAIWAN PATENT NO.M542378
  • TAIWAN PATENT NO.D170498
  • CHINA PATENT NO.ZL201430557946.9
  • CHINA PATENT NO.ZL20172005333.X
  • EPCD PATENT NO.002825547-001

 

About the“Treasure Bowl” Story

There was a poor farmer named Shen Wansan in the Ming Dynasty. One day, he dreamed of a group of kids dressed in green asking him to save their lives. Without realizing what it meant, the next day he went to work as usual. On the way, he saw a fisherman who was about to kill a whole basket of frogs he just caught. Suddenly, it clicked. “Is it possible that these frogs were the kids in green I saw in my dream?” With that in mind, he decided to be a good samaritan, purchased them all and set them free in a pond in his backyard.

That night, loud noises woke him up from his sleep. Wondering what's going on, he got up to check out the noise and discovered a bowl among the frogs. Out of curiosity, he brought back the bowl to use it as a hand-washing sink. Without realizing what it does, his wife accidentally dropped her silver pin into the bowl and miraculously, the pin was multiplied till the bowl was full. Shen tried a few more times by putting whatever metal he had into the bowl and it always turned out the same. All the valuables were multiplied and filled the bowl. Unsurprisingly, Shen ended up becoming the billionaire who helped the founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty to fund one third of the fees for restoring the Great Wall of China and the bowl was then famously named “Treasure Bowl” from then on.

 

Why We Need Your Help

 

About ARKY Design

As a design-centered company, “Create, Invent, Discover, Pursue Dreams and Make it Happen” has always been our motto and what has deeply rooted in our heart and soul is our desire to improve the quality of life of our users.

We do not just talk about it, we make it our mission to actually do it.

We have been trying our best to discover local design talents in Asia while designing our own products with the users in mind. Hopefully someday these designs will inspire and resonate with people from all over the world and prompts us to expand into different markets and deliver them to the doorsteps of people across the globe.

Arky is a platform for all talented designers in Asia. Before going into mass production, every design has to pass our initial evaluation and be examined by professionals from various industries, such as industrial design, retail, crowdfunding and digital influencers. We are here to ensure the quality and feasibility of these designs. Here at Arky, we promise to deliver the best user experiences with all of our products.

 

TEAM

 

慶玄 literally means mysterious in Chinese.

中強 literally means strong in Chinese.

韻 literally means euphonious music in Chinese.

瑞玫 literally means auspicious rose in Chinese.

宗霆 literally means great lightning master in Chinese.

福祥 literally means prosperity and luck in Chinese.

冠宇 literally means great universe in Chinese.

蜜 literally means sweet in Chinese.

 

FAQ

  • Ｑ：I have already synced up my phone with Herb & Rich without opening the app. Will I still be able to see the fortune cookie sayings when I insert the coins?
  • Ａ：You will only see the sayings when you open the app.

 

  • Ｑ：How many Herb & Rich devices can a smartphone sync up to?
  • Ａ：With one smart phone, you can sync up to 5 “ARKY Home” series devices via the app. So, if you’ve already synched up your phone with one Herb & Fish, then you can still sync it with up to 4 Herb & Rich.

 

  • Ｑ：Can the light color of Herb & Rich be changed?
  • Ａ：Unfortunately, the color is pre-set. The light for the plants on top is white while the light for the treasure bowl/piggy bank is gold.

 

  • Ｑ：Can I deposit the coins consecutively?
  • Ａ：You should insert the coins after the fortune cookies saying has popped up on your screen and then start the next round or the app might dysfunction. The interval in-between should be at least 10 seconds.

 

Timeline

-2017-

 

  • Sep - Original base model manufacturing optimization
  • Oct/Nov - Coin sensor module development
  • Nov/Jan 2018 - App usability testing

-2018-

  • Jan - Sensor connectivity integration closed testing
  • Feb - Lunar New Year Festival
  • Mar - Sample production
  • Apr - Scale production
  • May - Mass production
  • Aug - Quality control, packaging, and preparation for shipment
  • Sep - Off for shipment!

 

About “ARKY Home” series

※ This project does not intend to affirm or promote any religious beliefs and practices.

 

【PRODUCTION DESIGN AND CERTIFICATION】

We have the base model ready and have began sensor connectivity integration. Furthermore, we are conducting focus group testing on the product usability and software UI/UX experience. To make sure Herb&Rich Connect. is safe and legal to be used in your home country, we are dedicated in working with experienced hardware-software integration partners to make sure the certification process is completed on time for product shipment.

【SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT】

Like any other hardware projects, shipping delays caused by supply chains isn't unusual. However, we have done our best to minimize the risks by selecting a qualified vendor that is in close vicinity to our manufacturing facility so that we can try to eliminate any component supply shortage factors and greatly decrease the manufacturing downtime. By drawing on our experiences in dealing with a variety of manufacturers as well as our manufacturing partner’s expertise in mass production, we are confident that we will be able to achieve our funding goal and keep our backers posted on all the latest production development as well as any future adjustments that might have to be made due to unusual circumstances in the process.

In a word, everything will be transparent and you’ll be with us every step of the way.

story:
CEWi is the door to a new dimension of smart homes. Easily control every appliance in your home from anywhere anytime. Make your life easier. 

Because it’s fun to have a smart home. Especially if it’s part of a smart world. Imagine a world with no limits, where everything is in your hands and you can control them anywhere, anytime. That’s not just a dream. We could make it a reality, but to do that, we need your help.

Why is CEWi different from all the other smart home systems?

Developers of other, existing smart home systems attempt to achieve their goal by designing their own devices to go with their solution, ranging from smart garage doors to light bulbs or motorized drapes. They remain the only source of gadgets compatible with their system. This limits the range of available devices and prohibits their makers from lowering their prices.

Our philosophy is different. Our vision is to create a platform that can be used universally. CEWi is a platform that can be used by anyone who wants to develop a smart device. This way, anything can become online in an easy and low-cost way. Anything can become part of a huge ecosystem. In the long run, we'd like as many manufacturers to use CEWi as a platform as possible.

The user benefits from the CEWi platform as well. They can use same app to pre-heat their oven on the way home that they've just used to switch off the lights at work.


You can turn everything around your home smart in a few minutes, without the need for experts or renovation. 

The garage door, the sprinkler system and the coffee machine are remotely controllable just as easily as your alarm system or the lamp besides your bed. We provide you an easy solution to integrate your new and existing devices into the CEWi system.

Have you ever forgotten to switch off the lamp in the morning rush? Or forgot to set the timer of the washing machine? That’s not a problem anymore. Just grab your smartphone, log into our app, and do those things with just one tap. You can access your CEWi network from everywhere, because all data is stored in our safe cloud.

Your system is always ready. With your preset schedules you can sit back and relax, CEWi does everything for you. Monitor your home anytime, even when you’re away. The possibilities are endless.

Our multiplatform smartphone app

Our system is intelligent and extremely safe. You have the ability to precisely set user permissions to control each device. This way, you can set up parental controls to protect your children from messing with dangerous things around the house, or let your friends switch off the lights, but only if they’re in your living room. 

CEWi uses strong encryption so all your data and personal information is safe with us.

With CEWi and your devices you have endless oppportunities. It is up to you to discover all the ways you can benefit from CEWi.

To control everything, you need a remote control and a receiver. These are the central parts of our ecosystem. The remote is our free application on your smartphone, tablet or computer and the receiver is one of our products or just a circuit that manufacturers can easily build into their devices. And the bridge between these two parts is the CEWi cloud. That's our magic.



CEWi box with different status lights

CEWi Box connects to your WiFi and it creates a way for other devices to be accessible over the internet. The local solution uses a low-power and long-range radio, optimized to control and monitor everything.

The easy way to make every device smart.

Thanks to its safe and versatile design, you can switch the power to your devices and monitor their power consumption and view detailed statistics.

We already have a working prototype and a polished production design that is yet to be built.
Plug+ will be available in US and UK version, you can choose from them after our campaign.

Existing prototype

Production design

We have something special for developers and explorers.

Create your own smart world with our easy-to-use development tools.

The Sensor is a universal solution to build your smart environment. It includes low-power intelligent sensors to monitor temperature, light, motion, humidity and a lot more. 

You can go even further. If your're a developer yourself, it's easy to make your own devices compatible with our system. Just integrate our module, the CEWi Micro, into your product. You can use CEWi as an adaptable platform that can be customized to your needs.

The CEWi Micro has several GPIO pins and it uses a simple UART interface to communicate with your circuit. You can develop your own device page in the CEWi app, and it's possible to use GUI elements that fit perfectly with the device's native look and feel.

With CEWi Micro, you will be able to get feedback about how your product is used or which part you have to develop further to make your users happier.


Because it's innovative, easy-to-use, event-driven and can be accessed from anywhere with an internet connection.

By helping us reach our first goal, you'll make it possible for us to put the Box, the Plug+ and the Micro module into production and further optimalization of the app and backend software to make our unique system as streamlined and powerful as possible by the time you first try it.

CEWi is not just about controlling your devices, it's about making everything smart. With Sensor, your possibilities are endless. However, it's still in a very early stage of development. If we successfully raise $200,000, we'll have enough resources to develop it along with the rest of the system. There is no perk for the Sensor yet, but we'll create a new perk just for the sensor when we cross this goal. It'll costs appr. $20/pieces. This is to ensure that we'll be able to ship the Sensor as soon as possible. 

We'd like to share some of our ideas that can make CEWi the most advanced and widespread smart platform: 

  • Beautiful Box and Plug+ enclosure designs in different colors to make them a stylish part of every home
  • Light+ and Switch+ make CEWi more versatile

We'd love your feedback on our ideas during the campaing to create new perks when we reach new goals!






Worldwide shipping is available for all rewards.

We created a separate perk called "Shipping". We didn't calculate the shipping fee into each perk's costs because if you choose multiple perks, we can send it in one package. This way, it's possible to save on shipping. Our prices do not include vat and taxes.

If you choose one or more perks that come with rewards that need to be shipped, please choose the "Shipping" perk too!


Make your world smarter

with CEWi!
story_txt:
CEWi is the door to a new dimension of smart homes. Easily control every appliance in your home from anywhere anytime. Make your life easier. Because it’s fun to have a smart home. Especially if it’s part of a smart world. Imagine a world with no limits, where everything is in your hands and you can control them anywhere, anytime. That’s not just a dream. We could make it a reality, but to do that, we need your help.Why is CEWi different from all the other smart home systems?Developers of other, existing smart home systems attempt to achieve their goal by designing their own devices to go with their solution, ranging from smart garage doors to light bulbs or motorized drapes. They remain the only source of gadgets compatible with their system. This limits the range of available devices and prohibits their makers from lowering their prices.Our philosophy is different. Our vision is to create a platform that can be used universally. CEWi is a platform that can be used by anyone who wants to develop a smart device. This way, anything can become online in an easy and low-cost way. Anything can become part of a huge ecosystem. In the long run, we'd like as many manufacturers to use CEWi as a platform as possible.The user benefits from the CEWi platform as well. They can use same app to pre-heat their oven on the way home that they've just used to switch off the lights at work.

You can turn everything around your home smart in a few minutes, without the need for experts or renovation. The garage door, the sprinkler system and the coffee machine are remotely controllable just as easily as your alarm system or the lamp besides your bed. We provide you an easy solution to integrate your new and existing devices into the CEWi system.

Have you ever forgotten to switch off the lamp in the morning rush? Or forgot to set the timer of the washing machine? That’s not a problem anymore. Just grab your smartphone, log into our app, and do those things with just one tap. You can access your CEWi network from everywhere, because all data is stored in our safe cloud.Your system is always ready. With your preset schedules you can sit back and relax, CEWi does everything for you. Monitor your home anytime, even when you’re away. The possibilities are endless.Our multiplatform smartphone app
Our system is intelligent and extremely safe. You have the ability to precisely set user permissions to control each device. This way, you can set up parental controls to protect your children from messing with dangerous things around the house, or let your friends switch off the lights, but only if they’re in your living room. 
CEWi uses strong encryption so all your data and personal information is safe with us.

With CEWi and your devices you have endless oppportunities. It is up to you to discover all the ways you can benefit from CEWi.
To control everything, you need a remote control and a receiver. These are the central parts of our ecosystem. The remote is our free application on your smartphone, tablet or computer and the receiver is one of our products or just a circuit that manufacturers can easily build into their devices. And the bridge between these two parts is the CEWi cloud. That's our magic.

CEWi box with different status lightsCEWi Box connects to your WiFi and it creates a way for other devices to be accessible over the internet. The local solution uses a low-power and long-range radio, optimized to control and monitor everything.The easy way to make every device smart.Thanks to its safe and versatile design, you can switch the power to your devices and monitor their power consumption and view detailed statistics.We already have a working prototype and a polished production design that is yet to be built.Plug+ will be available in US and UK version, you can choose from them after our campaign.Existing prototypeProduction design

This is to ensure that we'll be able to ship the Sensor as soon as possible.

Light+ and Switch+ make CEWi more versatile

Make your world smarter
with CEWi!

story:
Short Summary

We, Zeomade, are based in South Korea and specialized on door safety system and products.

Pronunciation of child in Korean language is exactly same as English alphabet "i", as you can assume from the name of our product, iHandle has been developed to reduce door related injuries for our children. 

Almost 70% out of child safety accident happens at home. 

Crush and pinch are the fifth most common children accidents occur at home, all around the world.

Closing door can exert up to 40 ton per square inches of pressure along the gap between its hinges, and that is more than enough to give permeant damage to our hands and fingers.

The National Safety Council in USA estimates that 300,000 injuries are caused by doors every year, and Consumer Product Safety Commission statistics for the last available year cite almost 45,000 injuries to hands fingers, and wrists of children under the age of 14.

In USA only, door injuries result in an estimated 15,000 amputations every year.
Closing doors frequently inflict bruised, cut, or smashed fingers, torn or cracked fingernails, broken bones, and even amputations on children.

 

어린이 안전사고는 가정에서 가장 많이 발생합니다. 

가정에서 발생하는 안전사고 중, 끼임사고는 다섯번째로 많이 발생하는 사고 입니다.

손 끼임 사고의 주 원인은 바로 문 입니다.

끼임 사고는 심할경우 절단에 이를수 있는 매우 위험한 사고 입니다.

문 손잡이와 쿠션 기능을 하나로. 도어 일체형으로 미관이 깔끔하고 기존 문에 끼우는 제품대비 분실의 위험이 없습니다.

충격흡수 패드 적용으로 문틀 및 손잡이에 파손이 없습니다.

바람에 의한 갑작스런 문 닫힘으로 발생하는 안전사고 및 소음 방지

한국에서는 Tubular type을 선택하시면 됩니다.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have completed our development and are ready to produce the tubular type door handle system, but we are on the last stage of development and need regular production tools for the Mortise type handle system.

Mortise type and Tubular type are two most common door handle systems in the market.

With your help we can finish these two door handle systems which will work in the most of  the door system by D.I.Y simple replacement.

For Tubular type, you will receive a set of iHandle and tubular type door latch. 

For Mortise type, you will receive a set of iHandle without door latch system.

(Please refer the pictures)

Important!! Please compare below pictures with your existing door lock system, before you choose perks.

한국에서는 Tubular type을 선택하시면 됩니다.

story:
BLÜME was created to simplify the process of cigar humidification, allowing full control and visibility of your precious cigar inventory. As cigar lovers, we designed BLÜME to be an active and fully connected humidifier ideal for use in any humidor. Both simple and effective, it's crafted for new or experienced cigar owners.

 


Per Cigar Advisor Executive Editor Gary Korb, "Very cool concept! Seems like there are lots of new ways to keep your cigars fresh with a little high-tech savvy added in."

Thank you to Cigar & Spirits, halfwheel, TrendHunter, CigarNoise, Cigar Dojo, Engadget, InTouch Rugby, EmojiStogies and The Finest Hours Cigars for your coverage or upcoming coverage! 

If you'd like to feature BLÜME, please contact info@cigarzen.com.
 


The cigar smoking experience is undeniably linked to the quality of the cigar you smoke. When you smoke a great cigar, you have a great experience. But unlike other products that require aging to reach perfection (e.g. wine, scotch), the way you store a cigar directly impacts the experience you have when it is smoked. 

Cigar newbies and veteran smokers alike have all smoked a bad cigar. A dry cigar or one that has been kept in an environment with fluctuating relative humidity levels is going to deliver a sub-optimal smoking experience.  Our question: How do you achieve the optimal experience?
 


BLÜME: active humidification via atomizing transduction. Cigar Oasis: floral foam with basic fan-over-water evaporation

The issue with current products is that they just don't cut it. The humidification systems on the market today, like the one pictured above next to BLÜME, require a lot of manual effort and monitoring by the user. That's where we come in.

BLÜME takes away the guess work when it comes to optimizing the aging process for your cigars by using state-of-the-art connected intelligence to ensure you're never out of touch with your humidor. 

BLÜME currently comes in two finishes: a deep brown embossed faux-leather, and carbon fiber. Both options are beautifully paired with a chrome base for an added sleek, reflective look. Choose the finish that looks best in your own humidor.  

BLÜME is a two-part solution. 

Part One is the device; a truly active humidifier with internal technology as impressive as its modern look. 

Part Two is a feature-rich smart-phone application that keeps you connected to your cigars at all times.

Both the device and the app work in harmony to consistently deliver the optimal smoking experience you’ve always wanted, but were never able to achieve.  BLÜME harnesses advanced technology to perfectly age cigars, delivering the smoking experience that cigar craftsmen always intended.

BLÜME's nearest competition is the current market leader, Cigar Oasis.

It's easy to see the differences in design between the two units. But once you take a closer look inside each humidification system, it's even easier to see why BLÜME comes out on top.

  • Basic humidification: Products on the market today, like the widely-used Cigar Oasis Excel pictured above, use a fan-over-water method of creating evaporation, which is an inefficient method of promoting humidity. BLÜME's system uses ultrasonic waves that atomize the water in its reservoir, creating tiny water droplets which are then expelled through the opening around the top of the device for optimally dispersed humidification. 
  • Alerts: Differences also come in the form of humidity alerts. While email or text alerts are optional for the Cigar Oasis Excel, app push notifications are always included with BLÜME so you never have to worry. Not only that, but the on-device hygrometer screen and low water alert system on the Cigar Oasis Excel forces you to actually open your humidor, letting out important humidified air, in order to see your reading. 
  • Battery power: While traditional batteries are an optional accessory for the Cigar Oasis Excel, BLÜME is always charging via multiple built-in battery packs to ensure  optimal humidification never stops, even when charging.

BLÜME uses active humidification, which means built-in hygrometers monitor the humidity levels in your humidor through sensors at both sides.  When needed, atomized water is automatically released as vapor from the  perimeter of the device. 


What makes BLÜME different from other active humidifiers on the market is more than its elegant design. BLÜME is equipped with an atomizing transducer that emits ultrasonic waves to create tiny liquid water droplets, which quickly evaporate to efficiently adjust the relative humidity of the humidor.

Not only that, but the connected smartphone app keeps tabs on your hygrometer readings, notifying you right away when it’s time to add water, eliminating the burden of manually monitoring the humidor.  We've put a lot of thought into the mobile application.  Not only does it keep an inventory of your cigars along with an array of important data, but BLÜME will also help you select which cigar(s) have been optimally aged and are therefore prime for enjoyment. 

 

The Cigar Zen team is made up of Rob (left) and Lee (right).  Both avid cigar lovers, Rob's background in business and a deep understanding of the cigar industry, paired with Lee's extensive knowledge of technology and world-class product design, has culminated in the creation of BLÜME.  
 

 

 

Another way to help is to stay connected with us through social media and our weekly newsletter! Share our posts with your cigar smoking friends to help spread the word, and get all the BLÜME updates you'll ever need by signing up for our newsletter through cigarzen.com.

Find us on: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and YouTube!

 

After nearly two years of intense work on BLÜME, it's clear that we need your help to introduce our advanced cigar humidification system to the market. We will do whatever is necessary to bring BLÜME to market, but we recognize every project has risks on the journey. For BLÜME we believe those risks to be the following:

1. Manufacturing challenges or delays
To mitigate delays we are targeting nearly a year to deliver BLÜME to ensure that final design tweaks, manufacturer selection, tooling, and initial quality control all occur with plenty of time to ship production-level BLÜME units. Even with this, we understand it's impossible to guarantee a specific delivery date, and we recognize that this could be a risk for our project.

Should any manufacturing challenges or delays arise, we commit to our backers full transparency in the issues we need to overcome, and look forward to your support.

2. Software design challenges
Like all software projects, there can be unforeseen challenges when designing software. In our case, BLÜME is the culmination of several key software solutions at once, including firmware code to run the device itself, mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms, and back-end server code that will run in the cloud. The number of different languages and interfaces between components can increase development challenges.

To mitigate this risk we are taking several approaches. First, we have selected standardized development platforms such as iOS and Android, and have chosen a full-featured connected device platform. Second, we have been prototyping the development ourselves and testing for quite some time, and are confident that all necessary software can be produced. Lastly, we are working with a tier 1 software development agency that is deeply skilled in all areas of required development.

3. Changes to final design
When the rubber meets the road there are always surprises and changes that may need to occur. We accept that this is part of any hardware design project, and that's why we have completed the majority of the design process before we even considered launching on Indiegogo.

We will be making some final tweaks as we march toward production, however the many design iterations previously completed have helped us mitigate design risk significantly.

4. Capital challenges due to unexpected costs
While we have attempted to anticipate all post-Indiegogo costs, there will inevitably be costs that we did not expect. In order to mitigate this concern we have budgeted for all aspects of production, from final design tweaks, manufacturing and tooling, through to fulfillment and marketing. Additionally we have allocated 5% of our Indiegogo budget to unforeseen costs to ensure that we do not run out of capital as we deliver BLÜME to our backers.


1. Is this a humidor? No, BLÜME is a humidification system that fits inside any standard size humidor (see more regarding humidor sizes below).

2. How big is the device?  BLÜME's planned dimensions are 7” x 2.45” x 3.06” (L x W x H)

3. How much water can the reservoir hold? BLÜME holds 250ml (8.8 ounces) of water.

4. How is the device powered? BLÜME is powered by a battery in the base as the main power source, which we are estimating lasts one month between swaps. That being said, a smaller battery built in to BLÜME serves as a back-up so the device will keep humidifying while the user is charging their base.

5. What size humidor does the device work in? BLÜME is designed to fit in all standard “box” humidors, as well as larger humidors (i.e. end table or small cabinet humidors). Users with larger cabinet or walk-in humidors would likely require more than one BLÜME unit to keep the entire space humidified. Cigar Zen’s future plans include units built for these larger humidors.

6. How long does the water last before running low? The water held in BLÜME’s reservoir should last for one month between refills.

7. What is the warranty on BLÜME? BLÜME comes with a Lifetime Limited Warranty. For Terms and Conditions of this warranty, please visit our website.

Second, we have been prototyping the development ourselves and testing for quite some time, and are confident that all necessary software can be produced. Lastly, we are working with a tier 1 software development agency that is deeply skilled in all areas of required development.3. Changes to final designWhen the rubber meets the road there are always surprises and changes that may need to occur. We accept that this is part of any hardware design project, and that's why we have completed the majority of the design process before we even considered launching on Indiegogo.We will be making some final tweaks as we march toward production, however the many design iterations previously completed have helped us mitigate design risk significantly.4. Capital challenges due to unexpected costsWhile we have attempted to anticipate all post-Indiegogo costs, there will inevitably be costs that we did not expect. In order to mitigate this concern we have budgeted for all aspects of production, from final design tweaks, manufacturing and tooling, through to fulfillment and marketing. Additionally we have allocated 5% of our Indiegogo budget to unforeseen costs to ensure that we do not run out of capital as we deliver BLÜME to our backers.1. Is this a humidor? No, BLÜME is a humidification system that fits inside any standard size humidor (see more regarding humidor sizes below).2. How big is the device?  BLÜME's planned dimensions are 7” x 2.45” x 3.06” (L x W x H)3. How much water can the reservoir hold? BLÜME holds 250ml (8.8 ounces) of water.4. How is the device powered? BLÜME is powered by a battery in the base as the main power source, which we are estimating lasts one month between swaps. That being said, a smaller battery built in to BLÜME serves as a back-up so the device will keep humidifying while the user is charging their base.5. What size humidor does the device work in? BLÜME is designed to fit in all standard “box” humidors, as well as larger humidors (i.e. end table or small cabinet humidors). Users with larger cabinet or walk-in humidors would likely require more than one BLÜME unit to keep the entire space humidified. Cigar Zen’s future plans include units built for these larger humidors.6. How long does the water last before running low? The water held in BLÜME’s reservoir should last for one month between refills.7. What is the warranty on BLÜME? BLÜME comes with a Lifetime Limited Warranty. For Terms and Conditions of this warranty, please visit our website.

story:
Have you ever been guilty of wishing there was more time in the day?

If you said YES, are you also a later riser? Those who wake up early claim that they rarely wish for more time. On the other hand, those who sleep later literally have fewer hours in their day before they need to head to bed again.

Did you know?

Early risers tend to make more healthy decisions when it comes to food.This can be broken down in this way: early risers start their day with a good breakfast. A late riser might skip on the breakfast and then, in their hunger, make the easier choice for lunch over the healthiest. Those early risers who had a healthy breakfast are much more likely to eat a smaller and more planned out lunch.

 

Clocky- The World’s Smartest Alarm Clock

Clocky makes an early bird out of everyone. Wake up and get everything done on time.

We present to you Clocky, a device that will put a stop to all of your problems in the morning by getting you  out of bed on time. We have designed a device that makes you get up and start your morning routine whether you want to, or not. But, you will be doing this with the coolest new device and your favorite playlist by your side.

Rise and shine sweetheart!

How it works?

Clocky is an alarm clock, and in order to turn off the alarm in the morning you must set it on the first base. It has no snooze button. Once Clocky is on the first base it will automatically turn the alarm off and your playlist will start playing. After your time at the first base is finished the alarm will turn on again, and this will let you know that you need to move on to the next base. When set on the next base the music will continue. This process keeps repeating itself, depending on how many bases you set.

It will let you organize your time and your morning routine.  From the moment you open your eyes until the moment that you will walk out the door to tackle the new day ahead of you.

Plan the time you wake up, and believe us that you won’t have the chance to oversleep, because Clocky is not an ordinary alarm clock. It will force you to get out of bed and make the first step towards a new day.

Where do you usually go after you open your eyes in the morning? Most people go to the bathroom to get their morning hygiene done. Clocky is not a device with a single base, but has as many bases as you need. It is simple. The main device wakes you up and in order to stop the alarm, you will need to put it on top of the first base, which for example is in the bathroom..

 The first step is made . Plan with the help of the mobile app, how much time you need in the bathroom, so you will manage everything. Clocky will notify you 5 minutes before you need to go to the next base.

Put bases throughout your home depending on your morning routine and clocky will help you by telling you when you need to go to the following base.

Once out of the bathroom you need to go get dressed, so set your next base next to your closet and set how much time you need there to get ready.

Once dressed, set a base in the kitchen, because breakfast is the most important meal of the day, so never miss it.

After breakfast, set a base next to the door and place Clocky on it until you return home after you are finished with your day.

The key to success is organizing your time accordingly, and understanding how important this is.

What stage is Clocky at:

Testing Clocky prototype:

 

First samples are finished and tested.

 

FAQs:

Q- What is Clocky?

A- Clocky is a smart alarm clock that gets you out of bed. You must get out of bed in order to turn the alarm off.

Q- How do I set Clocky?

A- Clocky is set through the mobile application, like the alarm on your phone.

Q- How do I turn off the alarm?

A- This is the whole concept of Clocky, and that is that you will have to get out of bed to set Clocky on the base. You decide where this base is set. It can be your bathroom, kitchen, living room etc.

Q- How many bases do I need?

A- You can use as many bases as needed for your morning routine. This can be one base, or more bases to organize your morning. Each base will get you to a new checkpoint that will organize you to leave the house on time.

Q- How do I set the alarm sounds?

A- Clocky will use your phones sounds.

Q- Is it water resistent?

A- Clocky is splash resistant. Don't try to put it in water, or this will be the last base for it. :)

Any other frequently asked questions will be added here during the campaign.

story:
SURRAO

We are Thai designers intending to highlight and enhance a daily routine's issue that people get used to and overlook them. Our first idea and direction are started by noticing any items or activities around us. However, our product is designed for solving through this issue.

 

CHUBBO

Chubbo has been developed through the idea of "quick and easy trash bag picking up" that people doesn't want to touch anything that stick with the trash even just 2-3 seconds to tie plastic trash bag before throwing away, we saw this problem and took it as our first priority to solve it.

 

Thai Culture

Thai people always use plastic shopping bag that we get free from Supermarket or any free plastic bag to cover our trash bin before throwing trash because it's easy to clean and make our trash bin doesn't look awful or too dirty. But sometimes handle of plastic bag bin get dirty and make many people suffering from touching the handle, this is a core reason we created "Chubbo".

 

All dimensions divides by three

All dimensions can be divided by three the reason why because we determine that all numbers can be related and not making any confusion 
amount our team members.

 

Core Function

We separated the bin into two parts which is good Smiley face side and Surely face side. The main part is the Smiley face side consist of the handle of the bin and the plastic holder of the bin which is mostly use.

 

Plastic Holder

The curved part is like the hook to secure the holder of the bag, also separate the dirty part and 
the clean part easily. 

 

Before/After plastic bag

This picture shows how the plastic bag holder holds the bag and how the curve is working.

 

Smiley Face

This part shows the core function part consists of the holder of the bin, we design like a smiley face and the plastic bag holder.

 

Purely Face

This part show how smooth and the shape of the body of the bin that we don’t want to decorate too much.

 

Floating Object and Shadow line

We designed the base of the bin quite smaller than the body to make it feel light or like floating in the air.

 

Headless Pyramid designed

As we mentioned about the body like the Floating object, we have the inspiration from the geometry of the pyramid and redesign to cut off the top of pyramid part. The Headless Pyramid shape helps to distribute force load from the bin while using.

 

Intersect Gridline

IIn Every part of Chubbo, we geometrically design base on the simple way, therefore we offset and cross the base line intersect each other to separate the part of the base. The reason why because we need to hide and make the shadow line on the base of the bin.

 

 

PROTOTYPE

We started from prototyping through the paper to develop the function by real users' experiences.

 

After we went through the function, we decided to develop forms of Chubbo and check them by 3D printings to make them look more friendly.

 

Feel Free To Critics

If you have any suggestion or any feedback feel free to let us know, this will be so grateful to let you be as our team development.

 

Join Us

Tell us your problems by our e-mail: surrao.office@gmail.com, We believe that everybody has their own problems and still waiting to be solved.

story:
Meet Modeng lamp — Unique Light.

The Modeng light is a wooden smart solar portable light, controlled with your smartphone. Hexagon designed, self stand or hang on wherever you need it, could use as a hand lantern. The Modeng light has a button to turn on/off the light. Thoughtfully simple, a solar panel embedded in the back of the light, as supplement making charging wire free and always available.

All The Modeng’s Features!

Modeng’s Materials

ACCESSORIES

Mini compass+hook+DC line

30 Leds In Each Modeng Lamp

15 Leds For White Lights And 15 Leds For RGB Colors

Turning The Modeng On/Off By Button

Charge The Modeng With adapter of 5V/1A (NOT INCLUDE )

The Solar Panel Charge Li-Battery As Supplement

Li-Battery has 2400mAh capacity, solar panel is 5.5V/110mA as supplement for outdoor & camping use.

The Design Process

 

MODENG Smartphone APP

Available for both Apple and Android

YOGA time

APP control

Camping time

 

Dancing time

 

Designed to be — Light Your Way

The Modeng light is much more than a common light. With features that matter, it's bright enough to be a desk lamp, and portable enough to be a light with you anywhere you go. Being wireless and solar charging, it's there where you need it, adding convenience and safety when needed. You could control the light color as you want with your smartphone. By mobile APP control, It has millions color to choice. The light could also dance with your mobile music.

Where you need it

When you need it,

Anywhere

And it's so much more...

Specifications

MODENG:

Dimensions:165 x 190 x 30mm  (6.5''X7.48''X1.18'')

Weight:0.6KG

MATERIALS:

Hardwood

ABS plastic

SOLAR PANEL:

Polycrystalline solar panel

5.5V 110mA

POWER & BATTERY:

On/Off button

Mobile APP remote

Lamp usage: Up to 4 hours at highest set/Up to over 120 hours at lowest set

Li-battery: 3.7V 2400mAh

LED

15 Leds For White Lights And 15 Leds For RGB Colors

ACCESSORY

DC USB charge line

Hook

Features

American Black Walnut

European Beech

Rewards

$55 - Early Bird: 1 Modeng Lamp in either American Walnut or European Beech 

$60 - 1 Modeng Lamp in either American Walnut or European Beech 

$110 - Early Bird: 2 Modeng Lamps in either American Walnut or European Beech ($55 each)

$120 - 2 Modeng Lamps in either American Walnut or European Beech ($60 each)

$165 - Early Bird: 3 Modeng Lamps in either American Walnut or European Beech ($55 each)

$180 - 3 Modeng Lamps in either American Walnut or European Beech($60 each)

$275 - 5 Modeng Lamps in either American Walnut or European Beech ($55 each)

$440- 8 Modeng Lamps in either American Walnut or European Beech ($55 each)

 

MODENG® is a China based studio brand made from an intersection of multidisciplinary backgrounds in philosophy, industrial design and bespoke manufacturing.

MODENG was created in 2010 by two friends - Jinpeng and Robin. Passionate about wood products design, both went on to become award winning designers in their respected fields. Over 20 years of experience on creative design, we still have passion for life.

Why Indiegogo

We create this MODENG Lamp for easy life, Our team has worked tirelessly for almost 2 years designing, developing and testing. We connected with many industry and software professionals to make sure we are developing a product that is truly valuable and needed in our community.

We invested countless hours and high dollars of our own money to get MODENG Lamp to the stage it is at now. Due to some special parts(e.g. solar panel & Bluetooth module) need to mass customization(over 1000sets), we here need help for the crowdfunding in order to bring the MODENG Lamp to the world.

We cannot take this project any further without your help.

WE ARE EXTREMELY THANKFUL FOR THE LOYAL CUSTOMERS WE'VE MET ALONG THE WAY.

Risks and challenges

We have been designing and manufacturing wood light products since 2010. We are very familiar with the production, shipping and delivery process. We've got some great experience under our wood products and have built our reputation manufacturing products that we stand behind by offering the best customer service of which we are capable. We've been through unexpected situations more than once, and we always go the extra distance to provide every customer with the best product and experience possible.

Ship Date: We've designed our rewards packages and shipping timelines based on very conservative estimates. There are always a few things that are out of our control such as customs, port strikes, delays due to severe weather condition and/or other unforeseen issues. Either way, we guarantee that you will receive an extremely high quality product and we will be in constant communication with updates regarding progress or changes. We always strive to exceed expectations!

Mobile Application Changes: As we refine the MODENG Mobile App, we will roll out new features and improve the user experience. Any changes to the code within the application will have the chance of causing small bugs or errors (even after thorough testing). We'll only make changes that enhance the product experience and we will always work quickly to fix anything that doesn't work perfectly within the app. Changes in the app are at our discretion and timeline and will be based on user feedback and customer comments.

Thanks so very much, 
Jinpeng & Robin and the MODENG Team

Frequently Asked Questions

Does shipping costs include taxes?

Unfortunately taxes vary from country to country in every and IndieGoGo platform doesn't allow to charge them. So, please take into consideration tax payment rules according to import laws of your country when making contribution. We won’t be able to provide a refund if you reject the shipment due to customs fees.

Where do you produce MODENG?

Our producion facilities are located in China. MODENG production management controls manufacturing in order to ensure the highest quality standarts of our products.

How to install App in my mobilephone?

We will send you QR Code for your scan to install in your mobile phone, or we directly send you the install software by mail.

How long time will the lamp light on?

It will be up to 4hours at highest set(RGB and white led at highest level). It will be up to 120hours at lowest set.

How to charge the lamp?

The lamp li-battery has 3.7V 2400mAh capacity, and need 5V/1A adapter to charge, there is a DC USB line with the lamp. The customer need use their own adapter to charge the lamp, and it will take 5-7hours to charge battery with the 5V/1A adapter. Solar panel used for the power charge supplement, for the solar panel is 5.5V 110mAh outlet, it will take over 24hours to charge the battery full.

When will deliver the product?

The product could be delivered in December 2017.

Is there a warranty?

We will provide a 90 day warranty for the Modeng lamp as long as it being used under normal conditions. We can’t provide a warranty if you drop or break the product. However, we will repair or replace any defective unit at no cost to you.

Do you accept returns?

Unfortunately we do not accept returns from Indiegogo projects. We try to offer these rewards at the best price we can which means we aren't in a position to offer returns on a product that took us several months to bring to market. You are welcome to cancel your pledge at any point before we ship for a full refund.

When I choose what type of wood?

Once the Indiegogo campaign is over we will send a survey at which point you can pick between the American Walnut or the Europe Beech. 

Could I controll more than 2pcs lamps at same time?

Each mobile phone only controll 1 Modeng Lamp through APP. Each Modeng Lamp has one unique code, you could choose the lamp code which you want to controll through APP.

 

Contact Us

General Enquiry & Support Help: skyhunt@126.com

You are welcome to cancel your pledge at any point before we ship for a full refund.When I choose what type of wood?Once the Indiegogo campaign is over we will send a survey at which point you can pick between the American Walnut or the Europe Beech. Could I controll more than 2pcs lamps at same time?Each mobile phone only controll 1 Modeng Lamp through APP. Each Modeng Lamp has one unique code, you could choose the lamp code which you want to controll through APP. Contact UsGeneral Enquiry & Support Help: skyhunt@126.com

story:
Do you love walking your dog? So do we! It might come as a surprise that average dog leashes, especially retractable leashes have caused injury in some cases. How? Well, the problem with regular leashes is that they are not very visible to those around you. In certain weather and lighting conditions, a regular long leash could become an unexpected tripwire.

 

Action was taken in the past to make leashes safe. Manufacturers started adding reflective materials to leashes. This works to a certain degree, but only when light is shone directly onto it. Joggers, pedestrians, and cyclists don't usually carry around flashlights. 

 

Here is where QimmiQ comes in. With our illuminated dog leash, you will be seen and stay out of harm's way.

QimmiQ’s built-in illumination capabilities keep your dog's leash visible in any weather conditions, creating awareness of you and your dog. Anyone around you will see your leash, no matter how far out it is extended.

You are now visible from short distance and long distance!

Now that they will be able to notice you and your leash, accidents or injuries can be avoided.

Our patent-pending technology combines the use of optical fibers and state-of-the-art LED technology which we have combined with clever mechanics within the leash itself to illuminate the extended leash with a simple push of a button.

 

Our technology keeps you and your dog, along with those around you safe. Not to mention the cool factor of having a retractable dog leash that fully lights up!

To keep your leash shining bright we have a built-in 700mAh rechargeable battery that has enough power to keep your QimmiQ leash bright for up to 20 hours. Depending on how often the leash is used, keep in mind you will need to charge it now and then.

We have used the same principle as other retractable leashes out there, but with a sleek and stylish design. The case is made out of durable molded plastic and incorporates quality steel components for the mechanical aspects on the inside.

The leash is made out of a high-strength Nylon material, It is able to support the weight of dogs above 25kg. With a 5-meter cord, your dog has a comfortable amount of space to move freely and safely.

You can light up QimmiQ any time you want! It comes with a USB cable which can be used to recharge the built-in battery.

We worked together in a medical device start-up and learned a lot about optics and optical fibers, which has helped us a lot in developing Qimmiq.

In addition to the core team, we have several professionals who are working for us (industrial design, mechanical design, sales and marketing, testing).

 

We planned every step of QimmiQ in great detail and are working with multiple different toolmakers, manufacturers, and shipping companies to make sure there are little to no delays.

One challenge we have is correctly setting the plastic injection mold machine we will be using for the outer casing of QimmiQ. We are working with very skilled professionals to get this done, however, nothing is perfect so we will regularly update our backers.

We will ensure clear communication with all of our backers throughout, and after our campaign.

Additionally, to further mitigate delays, we are looking for different shipping options and ordering key components well ahead of time.

Thank you in advance for all of your support!

 

About The Creator 

Hanna has experienced firsthand how dangerous unseen retractable leashes can be when she was involved in a near-miss incident with a cyclist. She has partnered up with Markku to create the illuminated retractable dog leash, QimmiQ.
