story:
2 minutes of your time

Dear visitor, please take 2 minutes of your time and post a comment with your impression and thoughts - it is highly appreciated and you are supporting me as well :) ...

so here is the story ...

HUMAN EVOLUTION AND FEEDING

Let’s face it, our dynamic and modern life has shortened our feeding time, and brought new activities to the table which additionally occupied our hands during eating. Regardless of the long-established protocol for eating with a knife and fork, our behavior at the table has evolved over the time and created a new approach to eating. The new approach is to eat with one hand only - using a fork to tear off a bite before spearing it. We all do it from time to time. Cutting food with an ordinary fork can be a tough task and unnecessarily agonizing. And eating, nested deeply in our sub conscious, is the most intimate and influential process for the human being. That's why it is of great importance that this process is facilitated as much as possible. And while our overall evolution has forced us to adapt our practices at the table, our eating utensils were never adapted! The question is, can we keep up with our evolution and still have an ease of feeding?

A MISSING LINK

Thanks to a single invention that allows you first to cut and then to spear your food you can eat with no stress using only one of your hands. Although it is designed as a fork with standard shape and dimensions, it embeds a unique innovation - the combination of the spearing and the cutting functions of the classical fork and knife. An innovation that comes pretty late in the terms of evolution of human eating. In our constantly evolving life both nutrition and eating habits have evolved, yet there is no evolution whatsoever in the eating utensils for centuries.

This is where Rezbod comes in and saves the day!

THE SOLUTION

After years of research and development we are proud to present to you Rezbod, a reliable, durable and comfortable eating utensil. It has a contemporary design and is completely safe and natural to use. Rezbod provides a magical solution without changing any of the typical movements of the hand during both actions – spearing and cutting. When used for spearing or scooping its blade is closed and Rezbod is as safe as any fork.

The cutting function of Rezbod is activated manually only when the utensil is in lateral position. The blade opens when the index finger is placed over the handle to apply cutting pressure - precisely as in handling a knife.

Once the cutting is done and the index finger is removed from the handle Rezbod automatically turns back into a stylish fork that can be used in perfect harmony with any table knife.

All this is possible because of highly reliable mechanics fully inbuilt inside. Made from high grades stainless steel that complies with food service safety regulations, Rezbod is washable by hand as well as in a dishwasher.

FOR ALL PEOPLE

Rezbod has to be accessible to all people across the world because it provides a solution that fills a major gap in our current stage of development. In order to do so it must be produced in vast quantities. Rezbod is not an ordinary fork, it has mechanics inbuilt inside. The production process has two stages, first all the parts are made, and then assembled. Thanks to their simple geometry the parts can be manufactured easily in high volumes. The assembly of the parts is a fine and laborious process that demands automatization. At this moment our ability to produce the Rezbod parts greatly exceeds our ability to assemble them. With this campaign we want to finance the automated Rezbod assembly line which we have already engineered. By ordering Rezbod now YOU will make it accessible to all.

OUR JOURNEY SO FAR

Seven years ago Rezbod was just an idea I shared with my best man, whose business experience complimented my academic knowledge. The journey from drafting a sketch to having a working prototype was dynamic and challenging. We made a whole sequence of prototypes advancing gradually to a model adequate for mass production - the Rezbod Zero. Now we are facing a new challenge - financing the assembly line, which can be fully operational within four months of successful completion of this campaign.

WHAT’S NEXT

The intent of the Rezbod Zero campaign is to finance the automated assembly line which will allow us to commence the serial production of Rezbod. Once we assemble all pre-ordered units from the Rezbod Zero model we will launch a new Rezbod model celebrating the start of serial production. The Rezbod Serial Model will have more art oriented design, an optimized price and shorter delivery time, as the assembly line will be in place and operational.

OUR TIMELINE

  • October 2017: Start of Indiegogo campaign
  • December 2017: End of Indiegogo campaign
  • January 2018: Start of assembly line construction
  • April 2018: End of assembly line construction
  • May 2018: Start of deliveries of Rezbod Zero 
  • August* 2018: End of deliveries of Rezbod Zero 
  • September* 2018: Start of deliveries of Rezbod Serial Model

*In case that the orders of Rezbod Zero exceed the minimum quantity of the campaign target, the end of deliveries of the Rezbod Zero and the start of deliveries of the Rezbod Serial Model can be shifted ahead in time within 1 to 4 months depending on the Rezbod Zero total orders.

story:
History of the company

"Comet House" was born from a group of young university students and professors with the initiative to analyze the housing situation in precarious conditions that currently exists in the region and how they affect the quality of life of its inhabitants.
Having carried out the analysis, an architectural solution ofsustainable housing with  e  ecotechnologies wasran proposed that adapts to thees  s  conditionof each family and  that  contributes to the coexistence between them..


As the project progressed, some dependencies such as: APIVER, ICAVE, CROC, COLPOS. They were interested in the project and decided to integrate as allies to support the project idea and have greater environmental and social impact.


We are currently in the process of consolidating ourselves as one of the most socially impactful local companies, and we are looking for partners and partners who wish to join our end.

What We Need

  • We need  to finance some activities for creating a model of modular home.
  • The advantages of our construction system are:
  1. Economic acquisition
  2. Safe construction
  3. Environmentally friendly

The Impact

  • The social impact is going to take place through the transformation of products and services that specifically leave poverty with a better quality of life, accessing the virtuous circle of opportunities for technological innovation, research and knowledge transfer.
  • Similarly, to the extent that the serial housing model increases along with the sustainability criteria used, it will have a positive impact on the socioeconomic indicators of the region in which the project will be used.

Risks & Challenges

In addition to the problems caused by the housing deficit, the consequences of which are the lack of development in the real estate sector and financing options, among other factors, many communities suffer the effects of a year of climate change that increased temperatures and decreased the frequency of rains.
 The sustainable housing project deals in an innovative way with various types of problems: the enormous housing deficit, the absence of social integration and a growing concern for the environment.

  • Sustainable housing can help mitigate those problems.

Other Ways You Can Help

The sustainable housing project we are proposing will be very viable, however, there could be difficulties among multiple stakeholders due to alliances and strategies for obtaining resources.

 

We firmly believe that change begins from the comfort of your home!

story:
Located inside your post box, postybell is a device that sends an alert to your phone when you’ve got mail. It works from any distance - even if your post box is in another country.

Get a notification each and every time you receive new mail -  no matter the distance of your post box. postybell’s amazing sensor detects new movements inside your postbox and sends you a notification, so you don't waste any time checking empty boxes.


We are consuming knowledge at an online pace, in every area of our lives. That is, almost every area. postybell finally marches post mail (A.K.A snail mail) to the online era, informing you when you receive letters or packages to your mailbox, wherever you are.

Now, we know attempts have been made to create a device similar to postybell. Yet, they all relied on Wi-Fi or Bluetooth technologies, alerting you ONLY if you were located within a short distance from your mailbox. postybell eliminates the distance barrier, sending you a real-time cellular alert, no matter where you are (even when you’re abroad!).

 

HOW IT WORKS

postybell features two smart modules:

1. A proximity sensor

2. A GSM module

Now, this is how it all happens:

Postybell works with all phones including house, cell, and Smartphones. It simply rings the number you configure it to.

However to make things even more convenient, we have developed an app that “catches & records” and manages these alerts. The app currently supports only Android devices, but developing a version for IOS is at the top of our “as-soon- as-we-reach-our-goal” to do list.


The user-friendly app allows you to easily control and monitor postybell.

Here are some of its major incredibilities:

1.  Incredible # 1 – one postybell fits all

     Only 85mmX42.2mmX15mm, Postybell’s slim figure fits all mailboxes.

2.  Incredible #2 – total cellular control

     Connecting your cell phone to your postybell (PIR based connection), you can
     easily review all logs and perform actions from your device.

3.  Incredible # 3 – multi mailbox monitoring

    The app allows for cellular monitoring of several mailboxes. Simply add on
    your various profiles (home box, office box, and more), and   
    you can immediately control all mailboxes from your device.

4.  Incredible # 4 – real-time incoming mail alerts

     As soon as the postman visits your mailbox, postybell will alert you, by phone or
     by mail.

5.  Incredible # 5 – low battery alert

     When your postybell battery begins to run low, it will notify you via text message.

6.  Incredible # 6 – alert forward

    You can configure the app to forward alerts to a different mobile number  or  email
    So  if you’re on vacation, you can ask your friend or neighbor to watch  your post
    box for you.

 Watch how you can help improve people’s lives with postybell


                    As seen on

Snap VRS Blog Directory

 Watch how you can help improve people’s lives with postybell

1. Place postybell in an “off limits” room and postybell will alert you when
    someone enters!

2. Place postybell in your private drawer, locker, or box and you’ll get an alert  when
    someone opens it!

3. we bet you can think of other cool uses for postybell you can think of , please let us
    know.  

 

Here is postybell inside an a American post box, we added solar charger as an option .


postybell Prototype I


postybell Prototype II


postybell Prototype III



We’ve got big plans for postybell.

Here are just a few:

1.  Developing a postybell version for iOS. (See? We didn’t forget about you
     iPhone fans!).

2.  Creating “postybell pro” – a postybell with built-in camera that sends you real-time
     pics of your new post mail.

3.  Expanding postybell’s range of capabilities by adding different sensors, including
     heat, humidity, and gas sensors.


How big is postybell?

postybell is 85mm long, 42mm wide and 12mm deep. It weights 50 grams (0.88oz).

What’s included in the postybell price?

The postybell package includes the following:

•  1 postybell device

•  1 micro USB charging cable

•  USB charger

•  Free app downloading link

Are there any additional expenses, such as a monthly fee?

No. All you need in order to use postybell is a local SIM. As the app “catches & records” the alerts and rejects the call (so that you don’t incur any charges), it will notify you via a call. (The future IOS version will not perform in the same exact way, so you can simply skip the call, to avoid being charged).

What type of battery does postybell use? How long does it last?

postybell comes with a built-in, re-chargeable 400 mA/H lithium polymer battery. It can last up to 2-3 months without charging. We are currently working on further optimizing it.

Can postybell send alerts to more than one cellular phone?

Yes.  You can connect up to 5 devices to one postybell.

Can I monitor more than one mailbox using postybell?

Yes. The postybell app supports multiple postybell profiles.

How do I charge postybell’s battery?

Postybell comes with a USB charger and a USB charging cable, for easy charging. In addition, we offer 2 more charging options:

•  A solar battery that easily attaches to your mailbox, transforming sun energy into
   electricity.

•  A portable battery you can charge at home and attach to your postybell when
   the battery runs low.

Must I have a smartphone in order to use postybell?

No. Although the app only supports smartphones, postybell can call any phone in order to alert you of new mail, including mobiles and house phones.

Do i need to be “tech savvy” in order to install the postybell device in my post box?

Not at all. On the back of the postybell device, you’ll find a small magnet. To get postybell started, just stick the magnet onto the body of the post box. It’s as simple as it sounds.


Who made your great movies?
  www.mustache.co.il

there any additional expenses, such as a monthly fee?
No.
All you need in order to use postybell is a local SIM. As the app “catches &
records” the alerts and rejects the call (so that you don’t incur any charges), it will notify you via a call. (The future IOS version will not perform in the same
exact way, so you can simply skip the call, to avoid being charged). 
What
type of battery does postybell use? How long does it last?
postybell
comes with a built-in, re-chargeable 400 mA/H lithium polymer battery. It can
last up to 2-3 months without charging. We are currently working on further
optimizing it.
Can
postybell send alerts to more than one cellular phone?
Yes.  You can connect up to 5 devices to one postybell.
Can
I monitor more than one mailbox using postybell?
Yes.
The postybell app supports multiple postybell profiles.
How
do I charge postybell’s battery?
Postybell
comes with a USB charger and a USB charging cable, for easy charging. In
addition, we offer 2 more charging options:
• 
A
solar battery that easily attaches to your mailbox, transforming sun energy
into   electricity.
• 
A
portable battery you can charge at home and attach to your postybell when   the battery runs low.


Must I have a smartphone in order to use postybell?
No. Although the app only supports smartphones, postybell can call any phone
in order to alert you of new mail, including mobiles and house phones. 
Do i need to be “tech savvy”
in order to install the postybell device in my post box?

Not at all. On the back of the postybell device,
you’ll find a small magnet. To get
postybell started, just stick the magnet onto the body of the post box. It’s
as simple as it sounds.

Who made your great movies?  www.mustache.co.il

story:
Introduction

About a year ago I bought an iRobot Roomba vacuum cleaner because of the interesting experiences I had heard from my friends. I think iRobot is the number one brand of robot vacuum cleaners available, they sold more than 5 million cleaning robots all over the world.

A while ago I discovered that iRobot had placed a mini-din connector behind a flap. After some research I found out that the serial specification of this connector has been published on the web by the iRobot company. It is possible to read out all of the sensor data and control all of the actuators! How cool is that! I thought it would be cool to be able to control the Roomba on my smartphone or tablet. Unfortunately there are no Roomba Wi-Fi adapters for sale. So I decided to build one myself, and here it is.

I have been getting a lot of mails of interested buyers, so that's why I want to start production of the module. This way developers all over the world can do cool things, more easily, with the iRobot. It is also great for novice users because the module is plug and play.

That's where you guys come in, we want to produce a minimum of 100 modules to be able to provide them at a reasonable cost. If we are successful and you are a supporter we try to deliver the modules within 20 weeks.

Please watch this movie to see how to connect and use the module:


An early prototype:




Specifications

The module works with the Roomba 500 and 700 series, to be sure, check your manual first.


Dimensions 44.5mm x 30mm
Supply voltage 4.5 - 30V
Supply current about 35mA @ 5V RX, about 110mA @ 5V TX
Efficiency about 70%
Power failure detect XC61C
WiFi standard
  802.11 b/g
WiFi connect SoftAP mode
Secure WiFi auth WEP-128, WPA-PSK (TKIP), WPA2-PSK (AES)
Built in networking applications DHCP, UDP, DNS, ARP, ICMP, TCP, HTML client
  802.11 power save and roaming functions
ESD protection Transient protection on data lines


The module...    
  .......... Uses a switching power supply located at the bottom of the board, this way there is no unnecessary production of heat and no unnecessary power drain from the battery!
     
  .......... Acts as a wireless tunnel between the iRobot and smart device, there is no additionally microcontroller on the board. Just open a TCIP/IP connection to the module and start transmitting messages as specified in the iRobot Roomba specification!
     
  .......... Uses a Micochip RN171 WiFi module, fully configurable! (you will need a logic level RX/TX device).
     
  .......... Transmits a UDP broadcast every 7 seconds. This way you can discover the module in your home network without having to enter the IP address manually!


More information

Please see these links:
- 3D Model pdf !!!
- iRobot SCI specification.
- Microchip RN171 configuration manual
- Optional housing


What can you do with the module?

"Roomba SCI is a serial protocol that allows users to control a Roomba through its external serial port (Mini-DIN connector). The SCI includes commands to control all of Roomba’s actuators (motors, LEDs, and speaker) and also to request sensor data from all of Roomba’s sensors. Using the SCI, users can add functionality to the normal  Roomba behavior or they can create completely new operating instructions for Roomba."

Source: iRobot SCI specification

You can control your iRobot vacuum cleaner with your smartphone, tablet or computer from anywhere in the world*. With this module it is even possible to let the iRobot listen to your website! You will need an logic level RX/TX device for this to configure the RN171. You can use the USB +5V to supply power to the module. See this module for example: Link

You can use every iRobot App in the Appstore/Android market that makes a TCP/IP connection on the right port and uses the SCI specification. Or build your own application, as long as the platform can send/receive TCP/IP messages and receive UDP messages it will work.

*You will need to forward a port in your router to control the Wi/Fi module from outside your house.

OPEN hardware and software

The schematic and several software applications will be published, like:
- VB.net example.
- Xcode (iOS) example.
- RN171 configuration settings.


Current status

The module is almost ready for production at the moment, three prototypes have already been produced. You can optionally order a housing, see:

Optional housing datasheet

You will have to drill a few holes in it yourself. It comes with srews for lid and pcb.


Keywords: iRobot, Domotica, WiFi, Roomba, App, Smartphone, Wireless, Control, automation

story:
Short Summary

My name is Petri Kultanen I'm from Finland. 3D printing has been my hobby for more than a year now. I have learned how to draw 3D models and find best printer settings for them to print objects fast and still keep good quality.

Now i would like to share you my creations, but i need money to finish my collection and document it so i can share it to others who would like to make money with their 3D printer, or just want to print lovely thinks to their child's doll houses.

There is few options for you to contribute, If you pay more than others, you will get early access to my models, and can start printing and selling them. If you just want to print items for your self and friends you can pay less.

If you want to start improving models you can get original editable models for 4000$. They are made with free cad software called DesignSpark Mechanical.

You can always of course edit cheaper obj or stl files , but it's not so easy.

What is better with these models than open source

You can always download models from sites like Thingiverse, but this is print ready collection and all models are tested and have clear assembly instructions.
I have not published these models anywhere. Printed items i have sold in Finland, but will retire from that when this campaign is done.

What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to get at least few weeks salary, so i can take leave from my full time job and finish up this collection.

What is my doll house collection?

45 items that you can print to dollhouse.

Most of them need some sticker, paint and glue to assemble. Few of them also needs metal nails for hinges, and some fabric.

Each item has ready to print ".stl" and ".obj" files in two scales 1:12 and 1:16

You can scale them to other scales also, but i will only do test prints for these two scales.

Also there is assembly instructions.

Printable material if needed (Like stickers), these are in pdf format.

And recommended printer settings for repetier-host and 0.4 nozzle size. 

I have made available 1 model as and example of what you will get, with this you can evaluate is this campaign right for you,

Perks:

Perk Available When Amount of 3D models Original editable models included
$4,000.00       1 Immediately after launch all 45 Yes
$2,000.00       1 After 2 months of launch all 45 yes
$2,000.00       1 Immediately after launch all 45 No
$1,000.00       2 After 1 month of launch all 45 No
$200.00 unlimited After 2 month of launch all 45 No
$100.00 unlimited After 2 month of launch 1 of your choice Yes
$50.00 unlimited After 2 month of launch 20 of your choice No
$10.00 unlimited After 2 month of launch 5 of your choice No

You will get right to print and modify models, but not right to publish or share model files to anyone else.

This campaign will happen only if i can raise 3000$.

There will be 1 extra model for every 1000$ than i get on top of that 3000$

So if i raise for example 5000$ there will be total of 47 models in this collection.

These extra models will be something that you can suggest, and i know how to draw them.

Launch day is 15.10.2014

    Risks & Challenges

    There aren't many risks, because i have successfully printed and assembled 41 of 45 items, and everything that is to be done is document and make final obj and stl files.

    Biggest risk for investor is that they have that kind of printer that my settings aren't valid, and they do not know how to find best settings. ".obj" and ".stl" files are tested with repetier-host printer software and they will work.

    To overcome this issue there is evaluation item, that you should test before joining this campaign.

    I keep right to watermark files, and everyone will get separate download link, so i can track if someone leaks models to public.

    I have drawn all models my self, they are not copy of anything, but if you start to sell these items, please check that these items do not violate any copy rights in your country. I have checked only Finland.

    You can ask questions about items on campaign facebook page, or email me at kauppa (a t) kisut.com

    Demo item

    You can download for evaluate purposes one item from this address.

    http://www.kisut.com/item1.zip

    This is work ongoing so give feedback about instructions in package so i can improve them to final product.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Please spread a word about this campaign to all your friends that have 3D Printer.

story:
PAZO is for everyone. The durable, bendable, interlocking pieces allow adults and kids of all ages to create endless variations of three-dimensional shapes.

“Design is an exchange of cultures, and PAZO is a bridge that connects oriental structure principle and modern beauty.”

PAZO's shapes are the product of Mr. Yang’s careful planning and formal training in industrial design. “Our products appeal to people who want to imagine, create and design while having fun!”

 

PAZO is a building tool and a stylistic way to make any space more unique. The most popular PAZO creations are used to add a decorative, personal touch to the home, office, or even special events. The building kits come with instructions to build a wide variety of crafts. People can unlock their own creativity and imaginations through art and science in a stylistic way for the world to see.

After a huge success in Europe and Japan, the interlocking PAZO Build and Design Kit became a signature product representing the need for an intellectual, interactive, fun and practical builder kit for all ages.

PAZO is globally recognized and has received several awards, including winning the Red Dot Design Award, A´Design Award, and 2017 40 Under 40 Designers Silver Award.

 

The Origin of Polygon

 

 

 

PAZO is built on the science of geometric polygon shapes combined with artistic aesthetics, however, all of the shapes are meant to be played and to interact with. Create your own custom lamps, baskets, containers, or your art masterpiece—it’s all possible with PAZO.

 

PAZO—An Award-Winning Creative Design Kit

Due to PAZO's creativity, fun, and high quality, it has won many awards. 

2016 Red Dot Design Award: PAZO has the highest quality of the design among thousands of competitors from all over the world. 

A´Design Award recognizes PAZO as one of the most creative product among its competitors.

2017 40 Under 40 Designers Silver Award foresees PAZO as the product that will shape the design world in the decades to come.

 

Featured on

 

Why PAZO?

PAZO is built to bring out the inner artist in each one of us and reinforced by the structural integrity of geometric polygons. PAZO builders are always encouraged to think outside of the box and to interact with it in different settings. Through the creation process, PAZO builders can build individually or with one another to design an art display that’s of gallery caliber, create a catapult to add some personality to your cubicle, or enhance your home with beautiful hanging lights. Create with PAZO!

 

PAZO’s versatile playability allows you to build complex shapes such as a catapult or an animal. Collaborate or challenge your friends to create the next “wow” piece.

 

We provide multiple guides, you decide how you want to create them. You can create your own Do-it-Yourself projects, use them in education, play them as toys, or even make up board games using the pieces, there’s no limit to what you can build. Please visit https://www.mrsheep.co/pazo-model for our library of video tutorials.

 

The polygon shapes built with PAZO is structurally sound and the material is extremely durable, so don’t be afraid to have a fun playing with your creation.

    

 

 

10 years of experiences in industrial design field, the designer–John Yang–has designed many kinds of products. From packaging, appliances, 3C, furnitures to vehicles, he believes design is “strategically aesthetics” that can help enterprises to reach great success on new product lines or new business models.

Inspired by the everyday life in the UK, John has fallen in love with the fusion of traditional craft skills and new technologies. He has blended in Oriental cultural elements into his work and created new furnish-crafting style. His work—paper shade series—was a huge success with its innovative craft convention in Europe and Japan. After Salone Satellite, Milan in 2014, John began a new design direction—the educational products.

“Education is the foundation of heritage and where our culture rests.”

As the result, he devotes to create a new Oriental educational design—PAZO. PAZO, the intellectual design kit has won many awards around the world, such as the Red Dot Award, A´Design Awards, etc. Until today, John still strives for his East Renaissance for next generation.

 

What are the sizes of PAZO Discs and PAZO MINI discs?

The diameter of a PAZO disc is 3 inches (10 cm); PAZO discs are perfect for creating large-scale design models and gallery-like lighting lampshades.

The diameter of a PAZO MINI disc is 1.65 inches (5.5 cm); PAZO MINI discs are perfect for creating décor pieces around the home and office as well as various toy models to play with.

 

Compatibility

Currently PAZO and PAZO MINI can be played together using combination builds but due to the size difference, they cannot be directly built together since the pieces are not compatible yet.

For example, you can use PAZO discs to build the catapult model and use PAZO MINI discs to create the cannon balls. However, you cannot use the two sizes together to build out one shape due to the size differences of the interlocking openings.

 

PAZO and PAZO MINI compatible accessories are in development!

The PAZO team is planning and developing accessories that are fully compatible for both PAZO and PAZO MINI build platforms.

 

What type of plastic is used to make PAZO discs?

PAZO discs are made out of high quality food grade plastic (HDPE), which is the same material used in most food containers to ensure that PAZO is safe for adults, children, and pets to play with. 

 

Can we pick our own colors?

Currently, the kits are pre-configured with the optimal number of different colored discs for maximizing build combinations. However, we are working on developing more combination kits and booster packs – please stay tuned!

 

Will there be new models or combinations in the future?

We have an extended knowledge base of build tutorials on our website that we are constantly adding and updating as new ideas are formed.

https://www.mrsheep.co/pazo-model

PAZO is extremely versatile in the shapes that the users can create and therefore, we encourage our users to share their creations and models with us.

Please contact us if you have new ideas for models or builds!

 

Will there be any instructional manual in the kit?

Every kit comes with an instructional manual.

We also have an extensive library of video tutorials and new build guides on our website and on our Facebook fan page.
https://www.mrsheep.co/pazo-model
https://www.facebook.com/pazoplay/

 

What can you build with 60 or 240 PAZO discs?

You will be able to build out hundreds of combinations and shapes.

Please visit https://www.mrsheep.co/pazo-model for our library of video tutorials. Each video contains detailed step-by-step instructions on how to build out the shape along with the difficulty level and number of discs required for the model. 

 

Risks and Challenges

We believe in always keeping transparent communication with our backers and padding our timeframe estimates to avoid disappointment. We are confident that the delivery of our products will go smoothly, but in the event of any unexpected delay, all updates will be communicated to backers via email in a timely manner.

 

Do you have any other questions? Please don't hesitate to leave a comment, private message, or send us an email: mrsheep.info@gmail.com!

Compatibility
Currently PAZO and PAZO MINI can be played together using combination builds but due to the size difference, they cannot be directly built together since the pieces are not compatible yet.
For example, you can use PAZO discs to build the catapult model and use PAZO MINI discs to create the cannon balls. However, you cannot use the two sizes together to build out one shape due to the size differences of the interlocking openings.
 
PAZO and PAZO MINI compatible accessories are in development!
The PAZO team is planning and developing accessories that are fully compatible for both PAZO and PAZO MINI build platforms.
 
What type of plastic is used to make PAZO discs?
PAZO discs are made out of high quality food grade plastic (HDPE), which is the same material used in most food containers to ensure that PAZO is safe for adults, children, and pets to play with. 
 
Can we pick our own colors?
Currently, the kits are pre-configured with the optimal number of different colored discs for maximizing build combinations. However, we are working on developing more combination kits and booster packs – please stay tuned!
 
Will there be new models or combinations in the future?
We have an extended knowledge base of build tutorials on our website that we are constantly adding and updating as new ideas are formed.
https://www.mrsheep.co/pazo-model
PAZO is extremely versatile in the shapes that the users can create and therefore, we encourage our users to share their creations and models with us.
Please contact us if you have new ideas for models or builds!
 
Will there be any instructional manual in the kit?
Every kit comes with an instructional manual.
We also have an extensive library of video tutorials and new build guides on our website and on our Facebook fan page.https://www.mrsheep.co/pazo-modelhttps://www.facebook.com/pazoplay/
 
What can you build with 60 or 240 PAZO discs?
You will be able to build out hundreds of combinations and shapes.
Please visit https://www.mrsheep.co/pazo-model for our library of video tutorials. Each video contains detailed step-by-step instructions on how to build out the shape along with the difficulty level and number of discs required for the model. 
 
Risks and Challenges
We believe in always keeping transparent communication with our backers and padding our timeframe estimates to avoid disappointment. We are confident that the delivery of our products will go smoothly, but in the event of any unexpected delay, all updates will be communicated to backers via email in a timely manner.
 
Do you have any other questions? Please don't hesitate to leave a comment, private message, or send us an email: mrsheep.info@gmail.com!

story:
Hello You, 

The first SUPRAGARDEN campaign is ending - too soon.

We did not have the best timing or visibility with this first campaign. The product design was not finished as fast  as we originally planned in December.

But we will be back.

The water tank and nursery level design is now ready for new SUPRAGARDEN. We have decided to finalize product design, improve marketing actions and then run second campaign with New SUPRAGARDEN - very soon. Latest at march 2016.

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX


SUPRAGARDEN® is the new Hydroponic Grow System and Garden Innovation for easy vertical gardening and green wall building.  Please watch the video to understand your new design and growing possibilities, indoor and outdoor.

Check out the special First Bird and Fast Bird cases with limited order amounts. 


ACCESSORIES

You can also order extra components for you garden.





Summary about SUPRAGARDEN® and Plant Steps Ltd

SUPRAGARDEN® is the new hydroponic grow system for easy vertical gardening and green wall building, indoor and outdoor.  

In start of 2015 Jouni Spets, a experienced and innovative businessman from Finland, invented a simple modular gardening product for making easily fertile window gardens and fabulous living walls. He developed full modular, vertical hydroponic garden system, SUPRAGARDEN® based on use of modular PlantSteps® grow channels. With this new novelty it is easy for anyone to start a vertical food and plant garden at home with same hydroponic and NFT growing technique commercial greenhouses are using. Learn more about Aquaponics and how to use  aquarium fishes as nutrient source for plants. 

Plant Steps Ltd was founded to facilitate the production and sourcing of components for SUPRAGARDEN®. Plant Steps Ltd has focus on SUPRAGARDEN® global market expansion from 2016.  

PlantSteps® is patented in Finland and international PCT patent is pending. 

SUPRAGARDEN® and PlantSteps® products designs are in final registration phase. Best design details about multi usage Nursery level with attachments to four PlantSteps are relieved soon. You will love it. First production color for them will be off-white/light grey.  

The market launch of SUPRAGARDEN® starts with this INDIEGOGO campaign at Christmas 2016 and gardens are on delivery in spring 2016. 

With SUPRAGARDEN® You can get something really special and unique for your next spring gardening projects. 


WE NEED YOUR HELP

Plant Steps Ltd has put SUPRAGARDEN® to pre-sales campaign on INDIEGOGO to speed up the product launch to global market. We also need Your support to fund investment to mass production, aluminium molds and to source all the needed components for building and sending SUPRAGARDEN® packages to you. 

 We are here also to increase the product visibility on all potential market areas and make connections to best global and local business partners in order to expand SUPRAGARDEN® product family and it's availability to new market areas.

First generation PlantSteps and  Water tank and Nursery level are manufactured in Finland, in high quality plastic molding process and with safe materials, thick PE plastic. Electronic parts are according to CE and RoHS standards.

SUPRAGARDEN® and PlantSteps® are on production from start of 2016 and ready for deliveries in spring 2016. Estimation for global delivery start is April. 

SUPRAGARDEN® delivery package is big and we try to get them home delivered everywhere with track&trace and transport insurance. Please provide phone number and e-mail for easy delivery. Transport costs are high with this big shipment, but your Early Bird discount will compensate this. You will save money and time by making the SUPRAGARDEN order now. 

Do not miss your moment for getting new and futuristic design and garden solution, far before all the others. 

Risks & Challenges

Ordering SUPRAGARDEN® is risk free. All product components are tested and ready for mass production by Plant Steps Ltd and sub-contractors. 

Plant Steps Ltd has experienced core team with more than 40 years of experience at service, concept and product business, production management, marketing and global trade, eCommerce and logistics. We have strong customer focus and we do what we promise. Our target is to give you, the most innovative, high quality garden solution and design concept possible. 


Jouni Spets
Founder
Plant Steps Ltd

 jouni.spets@plantsteps.com


COMPANY INFORMATION:

Plant Steps Ltd | Kasviportaat Oy | Company ID: FI26675188

Address: Kunnaankuja 12, 01370 VANTAA, FINLAND 

For general questions please contact: info@plantsteps.com

www.plantsteps.com | www.supragarden.com


INFORMATION ABOUT THE USE OF SUPRAGARDEN 

Water tank with Nursery level can hold up 1-2 levels of PlantSteps, but we recommend that all PlantSteps are also attached like to wall, post, rope, wire or frame.
You can use following compatible and tested options for erecting your SUPRAGARDEN® to window, wall or as self standing partition wall.
Please remember, that plants will anyway mostly cover the system in few months or weeks. 

Telescopic pillars and posts 
You can get perfect, aluminium telescopic pillars and pillar fasteners from local IKEA . You can raise these telescopic posts (⌀ 50mm) between floor and sealing with distance 2,1 - 3,4 meter and  6,9- 11,1 feet. Attach PlantSteps® to one or two posts by using high quality IKEA fasteners. Water tank comes between posts. This is perfect solution for balconies and windows where this "transparent" but sturdy body structure can hold up really big food garden. 
Link and product code for STOLMEN telescopic posts: 201.799.40 
Link and product code for posts fasteners: 501.799.34 
 You can also  order them on-line from IKEA. Cost for 2 pillars and fasteners is about $70 or 70 €.

Hanging rope or wire
You can support PlantSteps® elegantly with hanging rope, string or wire from sealing or other attachment point. At picture PlantSteps® are attached to hemp rope simply with cable ties.
Metal wire and wire locks are easy and safe way to support SUPRAGARDEN® and with them you can flexible design and make unique of gardens and green walls. 

PlantSteps® can be also attached to wall with screws and nails or by using 75 mm tube clamps, from local hardware store or on-line shop. 


PLANTING THE GARDEN

You can start growing plants from seeds, cuttings or you can continue to grow pre-planted grocery store herbs and lettuce at SUPRAGARDEN®.

We recommend to plant seeds and cuttings to rockwool,  clay pebbles or coco fiber and put them first to Nursery level for rooting. When roots are showing you can lift them to upper PlantSteps®.  

You can find much more information about hydroponic growing from internet. 



PROTOTYPE 0.8 

SUPRAGARDEN® USE OPTIONS
There are also some horizontal options with setting up SUPRAGARDEN® and PlantSteps®. These low solutions are great for outdoor gardening, where you want to have easily access to plants like tomatoes.


One Do-It-Yourself solution with PlantSteps for windows or Walls. PlantSteps can be connected to 75-80 tubes so making it easy to do versatile plant structures with hardware material:



SUPRAGARDEN PROTOTYPE 0.5
Green plants, Jamaica Bell chili and cherry tomatoes are all growing on same system under spring sun 2015. 

Additional user instructions and pictures will updated here during project. 
HAPPY XMAS and Green NEW YEAR!

story:
Our Story

Pixel Moose is a startup that aims to propose creative solutions for spatial optimisation. We thought of the problem of gift boxes and gift wrappings. How does one maintain the element of surprise of gifting so that the receiver does not know what he or she is receiving? Wrapping a gift up in multiple layers of paper and foam may solve this issue nicely but they give rise to the problem of wastage.

How then can we innovate on this traditional way of packaging a gift?

This is where the Moosebox comes in!

We think Moosebox could be the innovative solution, and with your support, we can make Moosebox a reality.  

Your contributions will allow us to turn Moosebox into a reality and enable the gifting community to have a greener and a more fun experience!

Features of Moosebox




How does Moosebox work?




* The caps and the locks are removable and thus the user can change which two pins he or she wants to set as the code.

How to customize the puzzle solution?
What We Need & What You Get

We are raising funds for the manufacturing of our first batch of 500 pieces of Mooseboxes. 
To thank you for your support, we are offering you a Moosebox with a gift encapsulated within!

What Perks are we giving?




If we meet our goal, we will kick in the option of letting you guys customize the design on your Moosebox! 



Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't know what to think about this idea and aren't sure you can commit – there are other ways you can help out. Spread the word! Tell your family and friends and let them know what's going on. With all the social networking and ways we now connect with one another, by posting links to this page you are reaching places we would never be able to reach.

In short, do help us:

  • Share this campaign page with your friends and family and everyone else whom you think will be interested in Moosebox.
  • Like our page on Facebook and sign up for our mailing list at our website.


How can I contact you?

If you have any queries, suggestions or feedback, feel free to contact us at our website’s enquiry form or via our email: pixelmoose2015@gmail.com
  

Thank you for your support!

Thank you for reading through our campaign page to know more about Moosebox!

Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC BY 3.0
Icons made by http://icons.mysitemyway.com

story:
As Seen On.......

The Problem With Your Bed Sheets

Your bed sheets are awful for three reasons:

1) Your sheets are difficult to put on your bed.

2) Your sheets come untucked every night.

3) It is a hassle to make your bed every day.

Traditionally, hospital corners (you know--the tucking and folding that a flat sheet requires) have been used as an attempt to keep your top sheet in place, but they don't solve the problem. Hospital corners are a hassle to do and your sheets still come untucked.

The Spun Sheets

Sheets That Save Time

We have taken a traditional flat sheet and redesigned a new semi-fitted top sheet that fits your mattress like it should. The Spun sheet makes it easier to put sheets on your bed, stays in place night after night, and simplifies the process of making your bed each day.

How It Works

Our top sheet is fitted to the corners of the foot of your mattress. The corner seam keeps your sheet in place throughout the night without restricting your feet from moving freely. Start by pulling the corners down over the mattress.

The bottom flap tucks far enough under your mattress that the weight of the mattress keeps the sheet secure and in place until you remove it to be washed. The corner seam keeps the sheet from shifting throughout the night.

The side flaps are short enough that you can choose to keep the sides of your sheet untucked and your bed will still look nice and finished...

...yet the flaps are long enough to tuck in, whichever look you prefer.

The Spun Sheet will stay in place night after night, no matter how restful, or rowdy, your sleep is. Best of all, making your bed the next morning takes half the time!

The Fitted Sheet That Stays

We designed our fitted sheet using a strong and durable 3/4” grippy elastic. This feature will keep your fitted sheet from popping off the corners of your mattress or bowing up on the sides. Our directional tags make it simple to put the sheet on the right way on the first try, rather than guessing and having to remove, turn, and replace the fitted sheet.

Keeping Your Pillow Where It Belongs

Since functionality is one of our priorities, we also designed a better envelope pillowcase. Our discrete envelope case keeps your pillow from sliding out during the night.

Soft and Durable 

We believe strongly in the functionality of our product, but not at the cost of quality and comfort.

We tested hundreds of fabrics in search of the perfect construction.

We found that when looking for the perfect set of sheets, there are 5 factors to consider. We have combined the best of all of these factors to give you a sheet that is incredibly soft and durable.

We take pride in the fact that our sheets are made with premium materials, are of the highest quality, and will last for years.

We Are Obsessed with the Details

The design of bed sheets has not been improved for years. We decided to change that.

We have worked tirelessly to improve your sheets, starting with the function of the sheet, the premium materials and feel, all the way to the aesthetics. There is no detail we haven’t thought of.

Rewards

Why Do We Care So Much About Sheets?

We were frustrated that our sheets were not both functional and out of this world comfortable. We believe they should be both. We wanted to take something as simple as sheets and turn them into something people love.

♥ Chloe and London / Co-founders of Spun

We Work With The Best

We work with the best textile manufacturer in the world, and they specialize in sheets. They have been a huge part of making Spun's unique patent pending design come to life. All product development for Spun Indiegogo rewards is complete and our manufacturer is ready to proceed. We have planned for some wiggle room in our timeline in case there are any surprises or delays, which we do not anticipate. We will do everything we can to keep or beat, our proposed schedule.

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

Cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this. For US backers we will pay for the VAT and GST charges. For all other countries we are unable to cover VAT and GST, but will do our best to get it to you in the most cost efficient way possible and any savings we can discover, we will pass on to you. As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes except for the US. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo. One of our backers found this handy tool, that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency: http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a...

REFUND POLICY

100% pledge back guarantee = you have 7 days after the end of the campaign to receive a full refund. After 7 days, we will start placing the POs for the products and will NOT issue any refunds or returns.

EXCHANGE & RETURN POLICY

We do not do returns for crowdfunding products. However, if you receive the wrong size or wrong product, our exchange policy lasts 30 days from when your product arrived according to the tracking # we sent you. If 30 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately, we can’t offer you an exchange. To be eligible for an exchange, your item must be unused, free from dirt, dust or damage and in the same package and condition that you received it. If your return passes our inspection, you may receive an exchange. If you have a factory defect, you may apply for your warranty and we will send you a new product. See warranty guidelines below.

SHIPPING POLICY

If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address, moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, we will not be able to send you another product. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package.

WARRANTY

Our products come with a 90-day warranty starting on the day of receipt. You will need to apply for RA# and pay for the shipping to send your product in. When we have received your product with the associated RA# attached if the product truly has a defect we will fix or replace your product and refund your shipping.
