story:
Hammock-chair “Kolyhva” is unique Ukrainian product, its roots coming out of Tripoli culture, and has no analogues in the world. “Kolyhva” combines features of both a hammock and a lounge chair. Comfortable and easy to use, this hammock-chair is far ahead of all the other existing world alternatives.

 

 

 

 

Wherever you are : on the wild beach, near the pool, at the backyard of your sweet home, having a break at your office, traveling by car or even by yacht - this solution won't leave you indifferent. 

"Kolyhva” is a result of my efforts on the improvement of hammock design. In such a way that you can make swaying movements due to the partial landing of your body and by using your legs. With your feet on the ground, you would most probably start making such sideway movements without even thinking about it. This is more than likely to make you feel relaxed and comfy.

https://mir-s3-cdn-cf.behance.net/project_modul...

 

The base of the armchair hammock KOLYHVA is made of iron pipe, with galvanized coating (it is new for crowdfunding) and polymeric painting  with white or black matte colors. B2B bakers for lot of 16 KOLYHVA  have an opportunity to order in any RAL colours.

 KOLYHVA can be ordered in two versions of fabrics:

  • semi-synthetic 50% Polyester 50% Cotton with water-repellent impregnation and those colors are: gray, black, red, blue, orange and green. It is the most practical use and I recommend it for public use.

 

 

  • It is a 100% natural fabric based on cotton and jute. Such hammocks are more pleasant to the body, but they wet and quickly get dirty. Despite this, I use this option at my home.

 

 
 
 
 

 

Transportation bag

Total weight of Kolyhva assembled аrе 26,5 lb /12 kg  Standard set

and  33lb / 15 kg DELUXE set.

si

 

KOLYHVA fits in the Smart for two car.  You can put even two!

 

Standart, Standart plus complectations are blue,  

Premium is beige with printed logo KOLYHVA

Deluxe set has black transportation bag with printed logo KOLYHVA.

  

 

 

 

KOLYHVA`s devices

 

  • The console table

Quite a long time using Kolyhva I found the need of the console table. It is not convenient to put a cup of coffee, or other things on the floor or on the grass. Some time of searching, let me  to invent the solution of table which is attached to the base of a hammock due to its own counterbalance. Later, I upgraded it by slot for gadgets: tablet, mobile phone for movies watching.
 

 KOLYHVA Standart plus set has one console table made of plywood and Premium set has two console tables made of waterproof plywood black colour. Both models have slots for gadgets holding.

KOLYHVA DELUXE sets have another design of console with wineglass holder   and producing from HPL.

It is very strong material with 100% waterproof,  UV protection and  softtouch antiscracth laying.

They could be as white as black colours.

 

  • foot holder

A couple of weeks ago I`ve finished prototypes of new devices . 
It  gets you to the  next level of comfort with KOLYHVA!  At the beginning I designed it as single piece of fabric, but it turned out  as having a problem with getting dirty by foot. This fact made me to redesign it as separated washable spare part of hammock.
 
 
 
 
 Foot holder as option for Premium and Deluxe sets.
 It next level of your comfort with hammock chair KOLYHVA.
As rule it has same colour as hammock.
 
 
Foot holder fixing to same ring as hammock
 
 
Another device, for Deluxe Kolyhvas set, is compact folding umbrella for sun, wind and rain protection.
 

 

 It's easy to install,  you can store and carry it in the standard Kolyhva`s transportation bag.
 
 
 
Umbrella could be green and light gray colours.

Form of umbrella allows to print branding. I think, corporate business will like it. 

In the future, I  plan to upgrade umbrella with the possibility of fastening an anti-mosquito net. 

 

 

 

FAQ 

how to fix textile at the buttom?

-  outside, into the ring like in this video:

 

- Is the height of the landing in a hammock adjusted?

At the expense of the upper knot you can knit or lower the cloth of the hammock, thereby adjusting the comfort of the hammock. The knot is tied up as a tie.

 

 

What are Kolyhva`s sizes ? What weight is it for?

The maximum size is 32 "x 33" (44 ") or 810x840 (1100) mm

 

- How many  Kolyhva have you made?

For the entire existence we have made of about 300 units only for local Ukrainian consumers. Although, no, about 10 customers use KOLYHVA in Belarus .

- Do you await in b2b customer?

Yes of course. KOLYHVA is a very practical thing and can be used for dealers in tourist  and in the hotel industry for recreation areas, spa areas, beaches, and more.

I think that in the future, it will be possible to arrange services for renting hammocks, as bicycle rental for example.

But as I was spoking with buyers, many of them, got it not for itself use but for gift to friend, boss, father etc.

- Will it be possible to purchase options for KOLYHVA such as tables, fabric part, or umbrella?

Of course all options and pieces are interchangeable. You can order specially through the site KOLYHVA.com and I will send you by mail.

- How do you plan to spend crowdfunding money?

The funds will go to the future improvement of the hammock itself, the creation of the official site www.KOLYHVA.COM, the organization of serial production and access to international markets. I really want to share my product with foreign users.

- What future upgrades are you planning?

In the future, I plan to add such options as an anti-mosquito net, a flashlight, a built-in solar battery for charging gadgets, and also to develop a travel option for an ultra-compact ultra-light made of aluminum.

- Have you sold your product to the American continent?

Unfortunately no. This will be my first daylight. But I already have a couple of options for how I will do it.

 

more videos  

 

Big thanks to my frends and customers

 

Broadcasts on the Ukrainian TV channel.

 
 
My first video presentation. 5 years ago

story:
SwapBots is a revolutionary children's toy and video game, packed full of excitement!  

Our first wave of toys features nine characters, each compromising of three components with its own unique powers. Swap the pieces of each character to create your own customised Bot, then watch its unique powers burst onto your screen as you bring it to life with the SwapBots video game.   

Swap - Swap the pieces of your Bots to create a customised character with multiple super-powers!  

Scan - Scan your toy into the exciting SwapBots video game, then watch it come to life on your screen. You can now customise it further with digital accessories and build it a unique hub environment.  

Play - Play for hours on end within the SwapBots video game. It's packed full with games, a battle mode, customisable environments and interactive ways to share your SwapBots journey with your friends!

Parents: SwapBots are affordable and they encourage children to interact and play with both a tactile physical toy and a rewarding video game in a way that supports positive development.  

SwapBots were created by mums and dads who wanted to unlock the magical world of augmented reality for their children, whilst still encouraging physical play and without breaking the bank! Now it's time for us to share our toy with families across the world!

The free SwapBots app will never promote in-app purchases or adverts - a commitment we're proud to make, as fellow parents and gamers. All kids need is to start collecting the SwapBots toys at friendly, pocket-money prices.   

Gamers & AR enthusiasts: SwapBots is working with gaming and AR experts across the globe, the video game and story of SwapBots can be enjoyed by people of all ages; we think you'll love this just as much as the kids (maybe even more).

 

 

 

 

Thanks to the amazing crowdfunding community, we're now 100% funded! We're now taking pre-orders, so that more of you amazing lot can get your hands on the first collection of SwapBot toys! We can't wait to see what you think... Don't forget, the more money we're able to raise, the better and better we can make our augmented reality video game. So please do share, for the chance for us to be able to upgrade features and jam it full of even more great stuff! 

 

PROBLEM SOLVING - Work your way through multiple levels and mini-games, overcoming challenging obstacles!

PHYSICAL PLAY - SwapBots encourages physical play by making the toy the focus of the gameplay.

AFFORDABLE - At pocket-money prices and with no in-app purchases, SwapBots are safe and accessible to all.

DIGITAL LEARNING - Harness the power of augmented reality and the magical world it unlocks!

IMAGINATION - Customise your Bot with accessories and tailor your environment with fun, interactive props. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SwapBots are now in production and we couldn't be happier - soon they'll be on shelves in stores near you! But the more we raise on InDemand, the more amazing digital content we can create! So go ahead and get your SwapBots on InDemand now and help us make our revolutionary children's toy even better. 

 


Will SwapBots work on my device?

SwapBots will work on most iOS (Apple) and Android tablets and smartphones. On iOS we are optimising SwapBots for iPad 3, iPhone 5 and newer devices, while Android 4.1 or later is recommended for other devices. You can run SwapBots on other iOS and Android devices although we can’t guarantee the performance of the app.

Can I download the SwapBots app today?

Not right now - the app will be arriving at the same time as the toys during summer 2017.

How many toys do I need to play SwapBots?

To play SwapBots you only need one toy, although to get the most out of the swapping and customising-based gameplay we would advise using three toys or more - that’s why SwapBots come in multiples of three.

During our Kickstarter campaign there are nine collectable characters that are going to be released for pre-order. In the near future we hope to release more SwapBots, also in waves of nine characters.

How does the gameplay work?

SwapBots is all about focusing the gameplay around the toy and the environment the player is in. We are currently in the process of developing SwapBots to include core battle gameplay for one or two players. The multiplayer is played either locally on one device or over a network using two devices. There are also mini-games that encourage the player to gain skills and to nurture their Bot. Here is a video that is focused on the gameplay a little more: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f0h710tXDWo

SwapBots toys play a key part in the interactions during the game. Augmented reality has the ability to turn anything into an interactive surface, so not only do you see the toy come to life, it is central to how you play the game. Unlike other ‘scan-to-play’ toys such as Skylanders or Lego’s Nexo Knights, SwapBots remain in play after the initial scan phase. Swapping parts of the Bot has an impact on what happens within the game and we use the toy as an anchor to other digital content, allowing us to make environments and characters appear on the same surface as the toy.

What age is SwapBots aimed at?

We envisage SwapBots being most popular with six to eleven year olds, although all the big kids in the studio also love it!

SwapBots is manufactured by Creata who have a track record of working with worldwide brands such as Coca-Cola, McDonalds, Kellogs and M&Ms. Creata also manufacture Skylanders toys, so they are leaders in the toys-to-life space and have been advising us on how to make a safe and appealing product for this age group.

Is SwapBots English language only?

Localisation of SwapBots into other languages is a mid-term goal for us, however at launch it will be English only. However, the game features very little written or spoken English and is intuitive to use no matter what language you speak.

What is augmented reality?

AR (augmented reality) is overlaying digital content over the real world. In the case of SwapBots that means marker-based contextual AR that tracks the movement of the toy. For SwapBots we use ordinary smartphones or tablets to create this effect - there is no need for dedicated, expensive hardware.

Who are the team that are creating SwapBots?

SwapBots is a startup company based in the UK from the team behind Draw & Code - a creative and digital studio specialising in AR, VR and other immersive and interactive technologies.

The toys are manufactured by leading toy production company Creata. SwapBots uses software from Unity 3D and Vuforia to bring the toys to life.

When will the toys and app be delivered?

The toys will be shipped and the app released at the end of July 2017.

story:
TOOLBOX FITTING IN YOUR POCKET

 

Like every other smart tool or device, EveryGrip does the thinking for you. Its patented retractable steel rods are made to self-adjust and closely fit the head of the bolt.

 

Thanks to its versatility, it did not take long for EveryGrip to gain recognition from well known international crowdfunding groups, communities and social networks.

 

EveryGrip is one of the most universal tools in the world, as it can easily readjust itself in a fraction of a second and grab virtually any bolt, nut or hook.

 

House, machinery, training equipment, furniture and lots of other day to day fixings can be easily handled with EveryGrip.

 

No matter if rusty or damaged, Everygrip works with virtually all types of bolts, nuts and hooks.

 

The possible uses of EveryGrip are literally unlimited. Whatever the job is, EveryGrip is going to be your number one assistant!

 

Forget searching for a right wrench, and spoil yourself with this toolbox fitting in your pocket.

 

Choose your favorite: power drill, handle or ratchet  and use it in your usual working style.

 

Resulting from extensive testing by hobbyists and repair-shops, now EveryGrip is even more durable and easy to use. Especially when used in combination with ergonomic ratchets and handles carefully picked, tested and customized by our team.

 

PACKAGES

Don’t wait, ORDER NOW and SHARE this super-campaign!

 

STRETCH GOAL!

*** Once we reach our funding goal of this campaign, benefits from the economies of scale will kick in and we will be able not only to enrich our current product packages with extras to our current backers, but also to fund further development of a yet unseen even more universal tool based on the same working principle suitable for PZ/TX/PH screws (e.g. regular wood screw).

story:
UNIQUE Light Shows for the holidays 

Even though holiday lighting is a key element of holiday decorating, it has been largely stagnant and unchanged for years. In Home Depot, Target, and Costco, the holiday light sets offered for sale are all standard – similar light string length, fixed colors, same shape packaged in a box –  for years. There has been relatively little innovation in the Holiday Lighting industry as fast food, and the current lighting systems limit the creativity and the joyfulness of most holiday decorators and of their family members.

Living in Silicon Valley, our team has experienced how technology makes our life more convenient and greener. Why not apply our innovations on those traditional holiday lights? We started our project from a whiteboard and brainstormed about how to make every Christmas tree look unique and dynamic in the local communities. After spending a few months of research, experiments, and prototype creations on our new Holiday Light Set, we believe we have reached our expectations that we can now bring our prototype to indiegogo and ask your help to refine and manufacture this fun project. 

 

What are the key features? 

Low Power, Safe, Portable. After our research and evaluation, we chose the special LED bulbs and strings that minimize the power consumption in our lights, optimized the circuits, and eventually made the new lighting system very low voltage for your portability and safety. Even a portable battery for your smartphone can run the light sets for hours. Our customized Lights consumes only 5.5% energy of traditional lights, and 30-40% of the regular LED lights with same bulb quantity!

Extendable and Stackable. If you have a taller tree or bigger wreath, you can order 2 sets and stack them for long length. The water-resistant connectors of our light cables and strands are universal. 
 
 

Flexible and Configurable. We improved the system by enabling plug-n-play of LED strands in different colors and with gadgets. This allows you to flexibly change colors at anytime. If your kids happen to change their mind on their decorations yesterday, simply replace with a different color/shape/sparkling style/order in a few minutes. 

More Dynamic Effects. To add more dynamic effects to the lighting system, we have incorporated a 3-channel programmed remote control that governson/off, dimming, and blinking effects as well as adjusts the speed of animation. This guarantees you to have your own light show right away after you open the package. 

 Interchangeable Gadgets & Decorative Covers. You can never changed a decorative cover on a purchased light, but now you can do so in our lighting project. We make it plug-n-play so your kids can choose the one they like and put it on the tree like any other Christmas ornaments. 
Each child in your family may choose his or her favorite lights & gadgets and attach them to the tree. If they change their minds the next day, no problem. They can simply choose another branch strand or decorative cover and replace them within 30 seconds. With our lights, the holiday decorator can be creative in all aspects of decorating!

 

What are included in your rewards? 

Wreath Set 
The Wreath Set is a special gift that we tailored as a Thank You Gift for our supporters. Wiring is a big issue for the wreath, especially when you need to open and close the door everyday. We now solve it! The set charges itself during the day and automatically illuminates at night. This set has all innovative features throughout our design: free selection/change of light colors, interchangeable decorative covers, stackable strands, low power consumption, and also dynamic.  Here is a video of how to decorate a wreath with this light set. 

As one of the most valuable benefits of our lighting system, choose your favorite colors in yellow, pink, blue, green, and auto-blinking all-color for each LED strand. We may include more colors if we receive sufficient support from the indiegogo community. Decorative Covers  

Christmas Tree Set
This is one of the most innovative designs for tree decorations. Every family member can join the lighting decoration and share the fun because of the safety (5V low voltage). You can change colors of a branch or move around gadgets at anytime. It's also upgrade-able: over years, add more or change decorative covers like how you add/change traditional ornaments. 

The Premium Tree set supplies abundant lights and gadgets for a 8' tree with heavy thick branches. The Standard Tree set supplies enough of lights and decorations for a shorter tree or a tree been already crowded with other ornaments. The custom 3-channel remote control helps catch every visitor's attention of your unique tree decorations.  

As one of the most valuable benefits of our lighting system, choose your favorite colors in yellow, pink, blue, green, and auto-blinking all-color for each LED strand. We may include more colors if we receive sufficient support from the indiegogo community. Decorative Covers  

 
 

We [Joey, Jeff, and Jim] have redesigned FlexiLights countless times over the past 6 months. We are now ready to take FlexiLights into full production. Thats why we need your help. 

To make sure our backers can enjoy the light shows for the upcoming Christmas and Hanukah seasons, we have simplified the project, while kept most of the innovative designs, to lower the barrier of fund raising. The manufacture is also ready to produce the simplified lighting system at anytime with much smaller volume. 

We will start shipping our Rewards on or before the 10th of December. Please check our blog for updates. 

If you would like to support us with the more advanced FlexiLights, please visit our Advanced FlexiLights Campaign.

story:
In their quest of resolving daily chores at home, a team of youngsters came to wonder how they could make doors more secure, yet still have easy access as they went about frequently moving in and out. Their worry towards the security of their loved ones made them want to experiment and develop better solutions to help keep them safe. Thus, Smado Inc. was formed.
At Smado Inc., we believe in making products that will make our daily life easier in the best way possible, leading us to focus our energy towards developing beneficial Smart Devices for everyday use. Our endeavor has led to the creation of the Smado smart lock, a combination of a smart bell, lock, and door opener, providing an all-encompassing device that will help with your home security and convenience needs.
                       

Starting in 2014, we sought to understand the tech that made automated openers function. During this experimentation period, we encountered several issues that led to our innovative creation.
There were many smart locks available to consumers, but we decided to do something different and unique. We started by perfecting the opening process with the Smado Smart Opener, and after exhaustive research and evaluation, we got the Smart opener working efficiently…

With BLE enabled smart sensors and embedded systems that integrate with a smartphone, we were able to open doors without the need to unlock them by hand. We then cased this first prototype with a friendly design.

                            

While we were integrating the smart sensors, we also made sure that our smart lock worked perfectly. Once the smart lock and the opener started working in conjunction with one another, we redesigned the product and gave it a new look.

 

                              

                          

    

                            

                         

                         

                         

                         

                         

                          

                             

                             

 

 

 

         

 

With the Smado lock, finding the right Smart Home solution has never been easier. Smado’s leading smart home technology connects all your smart devices into one fully integrated system. Don’t get stuck with smart devices that are a headache to install and that don’t work together. Smado's easy to install system is self-explanatory and will ensure that everything will work from day one.
No longer will you need to leave a key under your mat or worry about leaving a door open. Remotely close any door that you might have left open. You can also give friends and family their own codes, giving them the ability to remotely open a door without you needing to be present. You will receive a notification whenever the code is used, giving you greater peace of mind. Access all your smart doors in one app, giving you seamless control from anywhere, allowing you to check your system’s status, control all your connected devices, and to receive real-time notifications for any activity that you care about.

 

We are a team of tech enthusiasts, with a vibrant set of skills, that joined together to invent Smado. This product was a result of us all living together in our apartment and trying to find a solution to constantly losing our key. Our solution was an automatic lock that would provide a solution to our needs, in addition to making everyday security and home access more manageable.

Our mission is to make life simpler and more secure for everyone by offering unprecedented visibility and control over their doors.

Our products, services, and partnerships aim to deliver smarter home access and security that will keep the bad guys out and let only the good and known guys in.

 

Shipping Details

All units will be Shipped & Products Delivered within 30 Days after the end of Campaign.

 

Refund & Return Policy

SMADO Inc offers a 1 Year Replacement Policy for faulty Products. 30 day evaluation period. Returns & Replacement or Refunds within 30 days after your product is shipped in case of faulty product, display, adaptor e.t.c.
Upgrading any order anytime by contacting us at team@smadoinc.com for any questions regarding our Company, Product, Services & Order-related Queries.

Remotely close any door that you might have left open. You can also give friends and family their own codes, giving them the ability to remotely open a door without you needing to be present. You will receive a notification whenever the code is used, giving you greater peace of mind. Access all your smart doors in one app, giving you seamless control from anywhere, allowing you to check your system’s status, control all your connected devices, and to receive real-time notifications for any activity that you care about.

 

We are a team of tech enthusiasts, with a vibrant set of skills, that joined together to invent Smado. This product was a result of us all living together in our apartment and trying to find a solution to constantly losing our key. Our solution was an automatic lock that would provide a solution to our needs, in addition to making everyday security and home access more manageable.


Our mission is to make life simpler and more secure for everyone by offering unprecedented visibility and control over their doors.


Our products, services, and partnerships aim to deliver smarter home access and security that will keep the bad guys out and let only the good and known guys in.
 
Shipping Details
All units will be Shipped & Products Delivered within 30 Days after the end of Campaign.
 
Refund & Return Policy
SMADO Inc offers a 1 Year Replacement Policy for faulty Products. 30 day evaluation period. Returns & Replacement or Refunds within 30 days after your product is shipped in case of faulty product, display, adaptor e.t.c.Upgrading any order anytime by contacting us at team@smadoinc.com for any questions regarding our Company, Product, Services & Order-related Queries.

story:
Hello and thank you for taking the time to visit my Indiegogo :) 

The past few days have been a bit crazy, however, I finally set up some stuff in order to get this project rolling. Thank you guys for signing up and giving me the chance to make this a reality. I worked long and hard on this project and I am so proud to present it to everyone here!

Here is the Plushy spec's that we've all been waiting for! :)

  • Height: 15" inches
  • Width:  16" inches
  • Thickness: 4" inches 
  • Made out of 100% Polyester & PP Cotton
  • Super soft and squishy
  • Design hand made with many months of revisions

I found a manufacturer who can fully replicate my design! :) Additionally, I requested to remove the line going through the middle in order to make it more seamless. Yay!

 

Side 1 of the Plushy Arrow Pillow, Orange!

 

Side 2 of the Plushy Arrow Pillow, Blue!!
 
Some ideas these can be used for:
  • Grab 2 pillows and place a set on the couch on opposite sides. You can have 2 orange sides, 2 blue sides, or even 1 of each side to compliment eachother :)
  • You can use a set for throw pillows on your bed.
  • They are comfy to sit on if you have hardwood floors for guests.
  • They are great to throw at people.
  • Buy some catnip, sprinkle it on the pillow, ...??, Profit! 

Awesome, so why $6,750?

I am asking for $6,750 to fund this project in order to get my design produced as quickly as possible. With the amount of attention that it has gained, there is no way I would be able to single handedly produce these in a reasonable time frame. The funds include, but are not limited to the following:

  • Cost to get these produced.
  • Cost to get the fabric inspected by safety third parties.
  • Cost to pack, and warehouse the goods overseas and domestically.
  • Cost to import goods into the US to be distributed ASAP.
  • Cost to cover any additional international packages such as the UK that require more funds to get there securely.
  • Cost for door-to-door delivery, from my forwarder to packing location.
  • Maybe one pizza while I write the labels out :o)
  • Lastly, the packaging and shipping to get them to your front door!

Here's a price breakdown!

50% goes to manufacturing (producing, safety checks)

30% goes to importing them (customs, freight shipping, forwarding)

10% goes to supplies and shipping (such as a boxes! tape! postage! yay!)

9% goes towards indigogo processing fees

1% goes to 10 pizzas, sodas, and chips, as bribery to friends that will:

  • Generate all names/addresses/etc on a shipping label
  • Print that label, stick it on a box
  • Put your fluffy goodness in the box
  • Tape the boxes up 
  • Help deiliver the boxes to UPS the same day its packed
  • Make sure everything is organized and stuff! :)
  • Make sure you have an awesome experience
  • Be very thankful for your awesomeness!

I'd like to clarify that this is not a flexible funding project, so either the project makes it or it doesn't. I did not want to flexible fund this as the funds would all directly going towards the project itself, and I didn't want to just run off with unused money that won't go towards the initial goal for its intended purposes.

Raffle Rules & Information:

  • Single $5 Pledge = 1 Raffle ticket
  • Multiple Raffle Pledges are Allowed

Make sure to share! The more raffle entrees, the more squishy's we can give out! I mean, come on.. who doesn't love the squishies? :D

As some folks have been asking:

For this project, Indiegogo will return your funds to you if the project is not successful. Only if it is successful, will they be fully withdrawn as a permanent method. Please contact me if you have any other questions!

Thank you :)

story:
Samovar: Conversation without tea is like a night sky without the moon.

Please Invite Us

http://www.akpag.com

  We can assure you that you have never seen this type of product on crowdfunding before. We resourced as much experience and expertise as we could for this project. We created handcrafted copper Samovar which is made in Turkey.

       Samovar is a professional copper container which allows you to heat and boil water using whatever you can find in nature or the environment. Our samovar is handmade in a small boutique workshop in Turkey where craftsmen still use conventional techniques.

.

 

       When water is stored in copper, the copper gently leaches into the water and lends it all its positive and beneficial properties.

 

     

      Here are 12 reasons why boiled water from copper is beneficial for you.

1-Weight loss

       Try drinking water stored in a copper pot. It will fine tune your digestive system to perform better and more efficiently.

2- Helps the digestive system perform better

     As well as cleansing and detoxing your stomach, copper also helps regulate the working of your liver and kidneys. It also aids proper elimination of waste and ensures the absorption of nutrients from food. According to Ayurveda, if you want to detox your stomach, you should drink a large glass of water that has been stored in a copper vessel, early in the morning on an empty stomach.

3- Stimulates your brain

 Copper is known to have brain stimulants and anti-convulsive properties (prevents seizures) which does a world of good to your brain.

4- Anti-ageing properties

   If you are worried about the appearance of fine lines on your face, Copper is your natural remedy. Packed with very strong anti-oxidants and cell forming properties, Copper also helps in the production of new and healthy skin cells that replace old dying ones.

5- Can fight cancer

    Copper helps fight off free radicals – one of the main reasons for the development of cancer and negate their ill effects. According to the American Cancer Society, the exact mechanism of how Copper helps prevent the onset of cancer is still not known but some studies have shown that copper complexes have a considerable anti-cancer effect.

 

6 - Helps maintain cardiovascular health and beats hypertension

      Heart disease is one of the most common diseases worldwide and copper helps minimize your risk of developing the disease. According to the American Cancer Society, copper has been found to help regulate blood pressure, heart rate and lowers one’s cholesterol and triglyceride levels.

7-  Helps heal wounds faster

     Known for its immense anti-bacterial, anti-viral and anti-inflammatory properties, copper is a great tool for healing wounds quickly.

Weight: approx. (2.300 g)

Capacity: approx. (3.850 g)

Boiling time, 8 - 10 minutes from simply striking a match

 

8- Regulates the working of the thyroid gland

     Experts say that one commonality amongst people with thyroid diseases is that they usually have low levels of copper in their body. While this is most commonly seen in people with hyperthyroidism, Copper is one of the most important trace minerals the thyroid gland needs to function optimally. A lack in copper can send the functioning of the gland out of sync.

9- Can kill bacteria

     Copper is known to be oligodynamic in nature (the sterilizing effect of metals on bacteria), and can destroy bacteria very effectively. It is especially effective against E.coli and S.aureus

 

10-Beats arthritis and inflamed joints

     Copper has very potent anti-inflammatory properties. This asset is especially great to relieve aches and pains caused due to inflamed joints

11- Skin health and melanin production

     Copper is the main component in the production of melanin (a pigment that mitigates the colour of your eyes, hair and skin) in our bodies. Apart from that copper also aids in the production of new cells that help replenish the top most layers of your skin.

12- Beats anaemia

      Copper helps keep the levels of haeme (iron) up and regulates its flow in your blood vessels.

 

 

Timeline 

 

FAQ

 

Q- How can I make money from this Project?

A-  The Samovar will be created by the only craftsman in Turkey that still uses this traditional and conventional technique. In 15 years, no one else will be able to produce this Samovar, so essentially, after a short while your samovar will become an antique.

Q- What type of resource does Samovar need to work?

A- Coal, charcoal, paper, actually almost anything you can find in nature.

Q- Can I use lighter fluid to start the Samovar?

A- No, simply light a piece of paper.

Q-  Can I add wood while boiling?

A- Yes

Q-  Can I use Samovar indoors?

A- Yes, once the Samovar is lit and working correctly, you can use it indoor but be careful

Q- Can I use Samovar without water?

A- No, you can’t use samovar without water

Q- What should I do the first time?

A- You should first boil the water then discharge the water pot after this, you use can Samovar

Q- My Samovar is giving off a lot of smoke, what is happening?

A- The samovar will give off some smoke, but excessive smoke is created when you put too much wood into the chamber.

NEVER USE WITHOUT WATER

story:
Save water and energy

We are Bridgiot (Your bridge to the Internet of things), a startup company that is part-owned by Stellenbosch University, and supported by MTN through the MTN Mobile Innovation Lab. 

We have built a device, called Geasy,  for a research project on electrical water heaters (geysers). Geasy latches onto your existing geyser and provides various features that include:

  • Measuring water usage with break downs into events and costs
  • Measure energy usage and cost
  • Remote control of the geyser, including schedule and auto-schedule control. 
  • Burst detection and mitigation. 

We already have over 100 Geasies installed, and are saving on average over R100 ($7) per unit per month just through scheduling. The geysers under our control have a peak load of almost 100 kW in the morning, and measures a combined 700 kWh and 14000 litres per day. 

Have a look at www.geasy.co.za for more information. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are building this network, to save energy and to create awareness of water consumption. To do this, we want to raise our number of units in the field to over 1000, and in the process, establish the market need for such a device. 

We are making available two types of Geasy, of which you can choose:

  • A full-blown water-metering, burst mitigating, energy managing Geasy for R3000, and 
  • A watered-down (excuse the pun) Geasy with only energy management for R2000.

The installation will be for your own cost, and you will have to arrange your own plumber. It takes between 30 minutes and 90 minutes to install, depending on the difficulty of the existing geyser. It takes even less if you are installing a new geyser anyway.

The Impact

If we get 1000 Geasies installed, we can save a daily total of 4 MWh of energy per day, we can also avoid peak loads of 1 MW every morning (saving Eskom some trouble), and finally save up to 50,000 litres of potable water per day through behavioural changes. As a cherry on top, we will prevent a significant amount of damages that may occur due to bursts. 

Risks & Challenges

We already have over 100 units running in houses, most of which have been working for over 6 months. We are still busy with our certification testing, and there is a risk that your insurer will not like you installing an uncertified device in your house. The process to resolution is underway.

Initially we will absorb the data costs for your device, after a year there is a small monthly charge to cover the mobile data used.

story:
The worldwide crime fighting community
with a wireless panic button

A combination of a physical button and a free safety app

The button will come in a variety of colors, and eventually shapes,
and can be worn in a necklace or bracelet.


Call for help with one click and the community hears you

Imagine people all over the world being able to help each other quickly when someone is in need. Using new technology and combining smart functionality, Panica makes it possible to call for help in many ways, instantly, with only one click.

Anyone can download the Panica app for free. Whoever has the app installed is a part of the worldwide Panica community and can use the essential functions even without the Panica button. By combining sound, GPS location and notifications to both friends and the online community, you can reach out for help with one click.

When activated, Panica:

1. Alerts the Panica community

Everyone nearby with the Panica app will be notified when the alarm has been triggered. They will both see exactly where the alarm was triggered as well as getting a detailed road map on how to get there. Panica will also give easy access to emergency services if they need to be reached.

2. Alerts your friends

The friends you have listed in the Panica app will be notified when the alarm has been triggered, regardless where they are located.

3. Alerts the police

When the alarm has been triggered the phone will send a message to the alarm central with your whereabouts. 

4. Starts a highly visible flashing light signal and a high-pitched alarming sound

The app will use the built in flash/lamp in the phone to create a light beacon so people can more easily find the exact position if it is dark. It will also give out a high-pitched alarming sound to alert nearby people and hopefully scare away any perpetuators.

5. Starts a recording of the event

Sometimes it is good to have an event documented. Panica will start recording the event as soon as the alarm has been set off.


These are a few situations when Panica will come in handy:

The possibilities are here.

Now let's use them for our loved ones safety


Personal security is about feeling safe

There are many personal alarm apps on the market. However, none of them are connected to an online community. Also, you usually have to hold the phone in your hand in order to activate the alarm. This is an action that might not be possible in a number of situations. For example, if you are out running, you might not want to hold the phone in your hand. Not to consider that the phone might go into a sleep mode, which would require you to unlock the phone before calling for help.

With Panica we are trying to solve the problems the other alarms on the market have. We have not only made it easy to reach and used in stressful situations but also if the phone with the Panica app or the button/device would break the position of the alarm will still be stored in our servers and pushed out to friends and the online Panica community.

We aim to build a worldwide community of caring people. Together we can fight crime and help each other in panic situations. You should be able to use Panica regardless if you are at home with your family and friends nearby or if you are traveling abroad. We have decided to give out the Panica app to everyone for free. Even those who do not have the button can still help making the streets safer.

 


How Panica works? 

(for us who like tech stuff)

Some of the key functionalities and features:

  • Possibility to create groups, such as: family members, friends, neighbors etc.
  • Offers both a loud and silent alarm functionality.
  • Triggers the alarm functionality by pressing the Panica button or the in-app button.
  • Send alarm notifications to nearby people in the online community as well as the group of people you have chosen forehand.
  • Offers a "safe walk" functionality that shares your location only with the ones you want to share it with.
  • Sends a text message with your exact location to someone you have chosen forehand.
  • Quick access to emergency services for both you and everyone that was notified.
  • Gives an automatic address lookup where the alarm was triggered.
  • Gives Instant directions to the exact location where alarm was triggered.
  • Panica is always ready to send an alarm when the Panica button is pressed, even if the application on the phone is closed.

(Even deeper technical specifications)

  • Push Notifications to both iOS and Android.
  • PHP backend
  • Third party SMS service to alert a contact person directly from the application when alarm is triggered.
  • Bluetooth LE to communicate with Panica accessories.
  • Using CoreLocation to show the accurate location for example when the Alarm is triggered or during Safe Walk.
  • JSON for efficient network communication.
  • SSL encrypted network traffic.
  • Keychain to securely store sensitive data.
  • Using Apple/Google maps to display location and directions.
  • Using Apple/Google reverse geocoding lookup street name.
  • Power efficient, using notifications when an event is triggered instead of polling.
  • Register for Bluetooth event to start the Panica application and take action even if the app is closed.
  • Ability to Play sound and blink LED during the alarm.
  • Quick access to telephone for emergency call using URL scheme.

Inside the button

We have worked very hard to make Panica look stylish as well as technically working exceptionally well. We have built the product with the newest standards in order to create a device that has a long lasting battery life. The Panica device will work for years with a standard battery, but we wanted it to be used much longer so we made it possible to change the battery as well. When the battery is draining power the app will notify you that it is time to change it.

Panica button is connected with the application using Bluetooth 4.0 to be used as a remote trigger when help is needed. Panica is not just a button, it communicates battery status and distance to your phone using highly integrated single-chip Bluetooth® low energy IC.







The Panica Team



We have worked extremely hard to come to this stage. We are a team of dedicated professionals with experience and knowledge from all aspects needed to successfully deliver Panica to you.

The team consists of:

Marcus Holmström
Marcus is a serial entrepreneur and has been co-founding a number of successful startups in his career. He loves Internet and the possibilities that can be used to make the world a better and safer place.

Magnus Foss
Magnus has been working with online business since 1995 and has been involved in several startups. He loves the opportunities Internet gives to recreate old ideas and make them into new modern and smart products of the future.

Fredrik Colling
Designer and entrepreneur. Founder and owner of Vektorgrafik, a Stockholm-based design/web agency.

Jimmy Lindberg
Digital Strategist with 20 years of experience as an entrepreneur. Founder and owner of Pargate Scandinavia AB, a laser rangefinder manufacturing company.
5 years experience in producing advanced electric equipment in China.

Stanislav Goryachev
With education in computer science Stanislav has several years of iOS app development, launching multiple applications into App Store.

Jenni Lindberg
Jenni is familiar with many situations where a young girl could wear Panica to feel safer. Jenni contributes with knowledge from one of our large group of targets.


What's next?

The professional manufacturing company we have partnered with has manufactured a number of high-end hardware products. We have worked with their experienced team before and knows that they are the right people to assist us with everything from quality control to logistics and shipping . 

We want you to have your Panica as soon as possible. Here is our delivery schedule:

  • December: Launch the campaign on Indiegogo. Make a lot of of new Indiegogo friends.
  • January: Finalize the app iterations and make the last tweaks on the button design.
  • February: Place the initial order and start a full scale production of the buttons.
  • March: Quality assurance and product validation. Launch the Panica app.
  • April/May: Finalize the assembly, shipment and begin to send out Panica buttons to the world.


Use of funds

  • Factory setup
  • App development
  • Certifications
  • Server setup
  • Manufacturing and components
  • Quality Assurance

We are almost done with the testing of the hardware and the possibilities in the app. With the funds needed we will finalize the production and begin placing an order of all the components and create a shipping-ready product for you.

We have come very far but need your help to take these last steps. We will be working closely with both the manufacturing company and app developers to make sure that everything is delivered as promised on time.

Any amount that you are willing to bring to our project will take us one step closer to the goal. Help us to deliver on this project and give us the chance to make the world a little bit safer. If you just help us to spread the word and share our page will be of great help too.

We bow low and say THANK YOU for believing in us and helping us to succeed!


Q&A

How big is the button?

We designed the Panica button to be so small that it can be attached discretely to virtually anything.

How do I replace the battery in my Panica button?

The Panica button has a battery door that swings open, making battery replacement easier than ever.

What is the range of the button?

Panica’s range is approximately 100 feet (30 meters).

How can you carry the Panica button?

The button has three different attachment options:


How is Panica different from other finder products?

1) Easy-to-reach: You do not have to hold a phone at all times in order to reach people you trust when something bad happens.

2) Crowd assistance GPS: Technology that allows users to receive help from the Panica community, not only the ones you invite to the system but also everyone else with the Panica App.

3) Sustainability: Panica is meant to last a lifetime with the replaceable batteries.

Compatibility check - Can I use both Apple and Android phones with Panica?

You will be able to use Panica with both iOS and Android, see exact specifications below.

iPhone 4S and later, iPad (3rd generation) and later, iPad Mini (1st generation) and later, iPod Touch (5th generation)

Requires internet connection, iPods and iPads without SIM card will no be able to trigger or receive alarms without working WIFI connection.

iOS 8.0 or later

Android 4.3 or later.

Is the Panica button water resistant?

The Panica button will last through drizzle and light rain but is not waterproof. So please do not bring your Panica button into the shower.

How can you make sure the production will run as smooth as possible?

We have lined up trusted manufacturing companies to be able to start a full-scale production as soon as we are fully funded. However, creating a completely new product that has to deliver with 100 % at all times is never easy. It requires expert knowledge to make sure we succeed. To set up the manufacturing line for best possible outcome will take around 60 days and there can always be delays in this process. To minimize the risk for this we are working closely with the experts at our chosen manufacturing partner to analyze and tweak every step in the process. We aim for a swift production with an extremely high quality. There is likely there will be some minor additions or improvements to the final product along the way. This will however only benefit you as a consumer and we will let you be part of these additions and tweaks every step on the way in every possible way.

How do you make sure the app will be great?

To make sure we create a state of the art mobile app that will work in the intended way we have taken in an expert in app development with many years experience. To make sure we minimize the risk of potential problems and that we deliver on our promise we have set up a team of other app experts within our network that will look through our app in detail and try to identify potential problems and come with further suggestions.

How is the team organized?

We work with deadlines and we love to deliver on them. We work with a detailed Basecamp project where we have taken down every part of the project into tasks. We have done so from the day we first started talking about this project and we will continue with it until you as a consumer have your Panica app and button in your hand.

How do you make sure setbacks are avoided?

Sometimes issues arise that we could not plan for, regardless how hard we have worked to make sure they don't. It can be that a supplier does not deliver as promised or we have a problem at the factory with our machines. To minimize the possibility of potential setbacks we have identified at least one more supplier for each component we need.

The factory we have chosen to produce our product is one that we have worked with for many years. We trust their expertise and professionalism fully and they have many years experience of delivering excellent products.

Can you give me some extra technical specifications?

Yes we can! See below:

ULTRA LOW POWER CONSUMPTION

- Down to 14μA for 1s connection interval

- 500nA deep sleep mode

- 2μA standby current (between connection events, 32kHz oscillator running)

- 12.5mA Active TX peak current at 0dBm output power

- 14.5mA Active RX peak current

2.4GHz RADIO

- Fully Bluetooth v4.0 low energy compliant

- 0, -6, -12, and -18dBm programmable TX output power

- 1Mbs on-air data rate

- -87dBm RX sensitivity at 1Mbps

- Excellent co-existence performance

- Compatible with 16MHz ±40ppm crystal

OSCILLATORS

- 16MHz XO

- ±250ppm 32kHz RC with calibration to reduce total system accuracy to 100ppm

EMBEDDED BLUETOOTH LOW ENERGY STACK

- LL, L2CAP, GAP, SM, ATT and GATT mandatory features for peripheral role operation

- Battery Service, Link Loss Service, TX Power Service, Immediate Alert Service

- Immediate Alert Profile, Alert Notification Profile, GAP, GATT

- Direct Test Mode

INTERFACE

- Configurable generic IOs

- 2 wire UART for DTM and configuration

POWER SUPPLY

- 1.9 to 3.6V supply range using on-chip linear voltage regulator

- Best-in-class power consumption enabling months to years of battery lifetime when running from standard CR2032 coin cells

TEMPARATURE RANGE

- -25 to +70 ºC

PACKAGE OPTIONS

- 32-pin 5 x 5mm QFN
story_txt:
The worldwide crime fighting community with a wireless panic button

A combination of a physical button and a free safety app



The button will come in a variety of colors, and eventually shapes, and can be worn in a necklace or bracelet.









Call for help with one click and the community hears you
Imagine people all over the world being able to help each other quickly when someone is in need. Using new technology and combining smart functionality, Panica makes it possible to call for help in many ways, instantly, with only one click. Anyone can download the Panica app for free. Whoever has the app 
installed is a part of the worldwide Panica community and can use the 
essential functions even without the Panica button. By combining sound, 
GPS location and notifications to both friends and the online community,
 you can reach out for help with one click.When activated, Panica:1. Alerts the Panica communityEveryone nearby with
 the Panica app will be notified when the alarm has been triggered. They will both see exactly where the alarm was triggered as well as getting a detailed road map on how to get there. Panica will also give easy access to emergency services if they need to 
be reached.2. Alerts your friendsThe friends you have listed in the Panica app will be notified when the alarm has been triggered, regardless where they are located. 3. Alerts the policeWhen the alarm has been triggered the phone will send a message to the alarm central with your whereabouts. 
4. Starts a highly visible flashing light signal and a high-pitched alarming sound
The app will use the built in flash/lamp in the phone to create a light beacon so people can more easily find the exact position if it is dark. It will also give out a high-pitched alarming sound to alert nearby people and hopefully scare away any perpetuators.5. Starts a recording of the eventSometimes it is good to have an event documented. Panica will start recording the event as soon as the alarm has been set off.
These are a few situations when Panica will come in handy:

The possibilities are here.Now let's use them for our loved ones safety


Personal security is about feeling safeThere are many personal alarm apps on the market. However, none of them are connected to an online community. Also, you usually have to hold the phone in your hand in order to activate the alarm. This is an action that might not be possible in a number of situations. For example, if you are out running, you might not want to hold the phone in your hand. Not to consider that the phone might go into a sleep mode, which would require you to unlock the phone before calling for help.With Panica we are trying to solve the problems the other alarms on the market have. We have not only made it easy to reach and used in stressful situations but also if the phone with the Panica app or the button/device would break the position of the alarm will still be stored in our servers and pushed out to friends and the online Panica community.We aim to build a worldwide community of caring people. Together we can fight crime and help each other in panic situations. You should be able to use Panica regardless if you are at home with your family and friends nearby or if you are traveling abroad. We have decided to give out the Panica app to everyone for free. Even those who do not have the button can still help making the streets safer. 
How Panica works? (for us who like tech stuff)Some of the key functionalities and features:
Possibility to create groups, such as: family members, friends, neighbors etc.
Offers both a loud and silent alarm functionality.
Triggers the alarm functionality by pressing the Panica button or the in-app button.
Send alarm notifications to nearby people in the online community as well as the group of people you have chosen forehand.
Offers a "safe walk" functionality that shares your location only with the ones you want to share it with.
Sends a text message with your exact location to someone you have chosen forehand.
Quick access to emergency services for both you and everyone that was notified.
Gives an automatic address lookup where the alarm was triggered.
Gives Instant directions to the exact location where alarm was triggered.
Panica is always ready to send an alarm when the Panica button is pressed, even if the application on the phone is closed.
(Even deeper technical specifications)
Push Notifications to both iOS and Android.
PHP backend

Third party SMS service to alert a contact person directly from the application when alarm is triggered.
Bluetooth LE to communicate with Panica accessories.
Using CoreLocation to show the accurate location for example when the Alarm is triggered or during Safe Walk.
JSON for efficient network communication.
SSL encrypted network traffic.
Keychain to securely store sensitive data.
Using Apple/Google maps to display location and directions.
Using Apple/Google reverse geocoding lookup street name.
Power efficient, using notifications when an event is triggered instead of polling.
Register for Bluetooth event to start the Panica application and take action even if the app is closed.
Ability to Play sound and blink LED during the alarm.
Quick access to telephone for emergency call using URL scheme.
Inside the buttonWe have worked very hard to make Panica look stylish as well as technically working exceptionally well. We have built the product with the newest standards in order to create a device that has a long lasting battery life. The Panica device will work for years with a standard battery, but we wanted it to be used much longer so we made it possible to change the battery as well. When the battery is draining power the app will notify you that it is time to change it.
Panica button is connected with the application using Bluetooth 4.0 to be used as a remote trigger when help is needed. Panica is not just a button, it communicates battery status and distance to your phone using highly integrated single-chip Bluetooth® low energy IC.
The Panica Team

We have worked extremely hard to come to this stage. We are a team of dedicated professionals with experience and knowledge from all aspects needed to successfully deliver Panica to you.
The team
consists of:
Marcus
HolmströmMarcus is a serial entrepreneur and has been co-founding a number of successful startups in his career. He loves Internet and the possibilities that can be used to make the world a better and safer place.Magnus FossMagnus has been working with online business since 1995 and has been involved in several startups. He loves the opportunities Internet gives to recreate old ideas and make them into new modern and smart products of the future.
Fredrik CollingDesigner and entrepreneur. Founder and owner of Vektorgrafik, a Stockholm-based design/web agency. 
Jimmy LindbergDigital Strategist with 20 years of experience as an entrepreneur. Founder and owner of Pargate Scandinavia AB, a laser rangefinder manufacturing company.5 years experience in producing advanced electric equipment in China.
Stanislav GoryachevWith education in computer science Stanislav has several years of iOS app development, launching multiple applications into App Store.Jenni LindbergJenni is familiar with many situations where a young girl could wear Panica to feel safer. Jenni contributes with knowledge from one of our large group of targets.
What's next?
The professional manufacturing company we have partnered with has manufactured a number of high-end hardware products. We have worked with their experienced team before and knows that they are the right people to assist us with everything from quality control to logistics and shipping . We want you to have your Panica as soon as possible. Here is our delivery schedule:

December: Launch the campaign on Indiegogo. Make a lot of of new Indiegogo friends.

January: Finalize the app iterations and make the last tweaks on the button design.

February: Place the initial order and start a full scale production of the buttons.

March: Quality assurance and product validation. Launch the Panica app.

April/May: Finalize the assembly, shipment and begin to send out Panica buttons to the world.


Use of funds
Factory setup
App development
Certifications
Server setup
Manufacturing and components
Quality Assurance
We are almost done with the testing of the hardware and the possibilities in the app. With the funds needed we will finalize the production and begin placing an order of all the components and create a shipping-ready product for you.We have come very far but need your help to take these last steps. We will be working closely with both the manufacturing company and app developers to make sure that everything is delivered as promised on time.Any amount that you are willing to bring to our project will take us one step closer to the goal. Help us to deliver on this project and give us the chance to make the world a little bit safer. If you just help us to spread the word and share our page will be of great help too.We bow low and say THANK YOU for believing in us and helping us to succeed!

story:
A family of smarter, better, connected digital photo frames

The first multiple screen digital photo frames

"Designed due to the frustration of all the dull, similar looking digital frames which are notoriously a hassle to use and regularly appear in the Christmas least wanted gifts lists. Our photos and memories deserve better as we struggle to find ways to display the ever increasing amount of photos we care about."


Photine comes in a 1, 3 and 4 screen model. They are the first multiple screen digital photo frames made from Canadian maple with high quality LCD screens. They are a beautiful way to relive those best moments in life.


"The most innovative digital photo frame we've ever seen" - Shell LiveWIRE UK

"[The] overall idea definitely seems to be impressive and in this digital world where we all are connected one way or the other, this idea can be a great success." - Technospot.net

"Here we have the chance to re-create those memories, and bring all those photos we take constantly on our phones to life, and do it all while making it look beautiful" - OxGadgets



  • Winner of the London Entrepreneurs Challenge (2013)
  • Winner of the UCL Bright Ideas Award (2013)
  • Shortlisted for the Shell LiveWIRE Grand Ideas Award (2013)
  • Shortlisted for the NACUE Varsity Pitch (2013)
  • Our founder, Charlie Jackson, is currently shortlisted for Britain's Top Real Role Model for his involvement in Nine Studios, the company behind Photine.

Photine frames connect to your WiFi and can download your images from the online services you use like Facebook, Dropbox, your computer libraries and more… Photine frames are smarter than most. With their smart albums they can automatically retrieve and display your latest photos with the most Facebook likes, comments, the ones you and your partner are tagged in and more.



Smart selection, instant, automatic and effortless.


Photine frames are set up via our mobile app or any web browser. Starting out is as simple as: 

  • Launching the app 
  • It discovers a new frame to set up 
  • Sign the frame into your WiFi 
  • Log into 1 or more online services like Facebook or Dropbox 
  • Your frame will now display your images.


Our app includes more features like pushing photos from your device to the frames, navigate between photos being displayed or send a photo to someone else's frame. Perfect for long distance couples. You can also have a party mode where you tell the app who is coming over and it will make sure your Photine frame will display pictures where your guests have all been at the same events before.



Digital photo frames catch up with the smart home


Having multiple screens allows Photine frames to do things no one else can do. Like display 1 image cut up over multiple displays or show panoramic images across our gorgeous 3 screen frame.



You could also assign each display of 1 frame to a different family member. So only their photos stream to that frame. Great when the kids have left home.



Feel more connected to your family


Photine frames have a contemporary design with a tiered construction. So some displays are raised above others. This dynamic offers a beautiful yet subtle contrast to the products.



Photine frames have been kept as simple as possible, with only a single domed button to turn the product on and off.


  • Pick specific albums and pictures to display rather than use smart albums. 
  • Photine stores the last 1000 images in its memory so you still have plenty of photos to display if your WiFi disconnects. 
  • Temporarily assign a display to a friend or family member. Great for when they are travelling and you get their holiday images displaying in real time back home. 
  • Support for: Facebook, Dropbox, iPhoto, Mac OSX, Windows, Flickr, Picasa, Google Drive and Instagram. 
  • On/off timer. Photine can automatically turn itself on and off according to the time. So you can set it to never display when you're asleep and wake you up with the latest images of your family.
  • No duplicates. If you have more than 1 Photine frame they can communicate with each other and make sure that the same photo doesn't appear on a different frame around the same time.



At Nine Studios we're committed to giving you the product you want and we have far too many features we wanted to add into our devices. These are some that haven't made the initial cut but if there's any you particularly want to see let us know. We still have time to add these features if there are any you all really care about, especially if we exceed our funding goal. As a company we design smart home products so many of these features are to make Photine frames a wider part of the smart home, connecting with third party devices and services.

  • iTunes Album Art - So the frame can monitor what your iTunes is playing on the computer and can display the currently playing album cover on one of the screens.
  • Music Visualiser - You may have seen the iTunes music visualiser which displays moving colours and patterns in time with the music your playing. A very attractive display. What if we could get this type of functionality across the multiple displays on a Photine frame?
  • Online Setup - When you buy your Photine frame on our site what if you could configure what the frame will display before it arrives. Use our web portal to sign into your Facebook account, select the albums/people etc you want to show and then when you receive your frame, log in to the WiFi and off it goes. Great for getting as a present for someone, especially if they are less technically inclined.
  • Ambient Lighting - Lighting is a powerful emotional factor. Just ask the guys at Philips making the Hue colour changing light bulbs. These are smart bulbs that can be controlled from a smart phone. Photine could integrate with these devices so you could set up ambient moods with just 1 button. Turn on the romantic setting and have the light bulbs dim down to a nice red shade whilst Photine starts playing a smooth visualiser motion like the iTunes visualiser mentioned above.
  • Smart home integration - We are getting more and more affordable smart home products. From WiFi speakers and doorbells to energy management and security. Photine can work with these products to provide extra functionality. Someone rings the WiFi doorbell and Photine displays a video feed of who is at the door.



Pledge £25 and get our exclusive for Indiegogo, Photine unisex t-shirt.



Or choose our glorious Nine Studios glass.



Everyone has different tastes, different needs, different styles of homes and we know that we can't design a perfect digital photo frame for everyone. This is why we're creating an open hardware community at Nine Studios. Where we give manufacturers, designers, other companies and hobbyists access to our technology and allow them to buy sub assemblies of our products. So they can create their own unique frames using different materials, finishes or layouts. All without needing to know anything about electronics or software development. It can be as easy as making a one off wooden frame in your garage and fitting it to one of our sub assemblies, all the way through to mass production. This means that you as consumers get more choice with a Photine frame that fits in your home and with your own personal aesthetic. Please purchase our open hardware pledge if you are interested in joining this community or email c.jackson@ninestudios.com for more details.


  • £14,000 on Indiegogo & payment Fees
  • £150,000 on the manufacture of the products
  • £36,000 on the final engineering development

Our plans are to have all the engineering and software development finished by Spring 2014. We want to have our manufacturing to begin shortly afterwards and to be ready to ship the products in the Summer of 2014. 

Where are we now:

We've been working on these photos frames since the beginning of 2013 and have since played with many weird and wonderful concepts, sketches and designs. Our current designs took form just before the summer and our recent prototypes are constructed using tablet computers, so that full functionality can be easily simulated whilst our electronic engineers test our hardware systems. This means that most of the functions portrayed in the video and this description are at a simulated stage but are an accurate representation of what we can achieve.



Photine is designed by London based startup Nine Studios, a product design company that designs, develops and sells consumer friendly smart home products.



We have a great team with experience in the design of smart home products, launching and successfully selling businesses and the manufacture of complex engineering and avionic components. 

Charlie Jackson - Founder & Product Design Engineer

MSc Technology Entrepreneurship, BEng Product Design & Manufacture, 3 years designing and researching smart home products. Currently shortlisted for Britain's Top Real Role Model.

@charliejackson

Feel free to contact him at: c.jackson@ninestudios.com for any enquiries.

Rob Wollner - Technical Director

Programmer, worked in R&D for a number of years creating bespoke technological solutions, patent pending, featured in BBC technology news for winning various hacking competitions.

@wollno

Feel free to contact him at: r.wollner@ninestudios.com for any enquiries.

Tom Brassington - Programme Director & Systems Engineer

Senior Avionics Design Engineer, working in avionics over 6 years, MEng Avionics & Aerospace Systems Engineering.

Feel free to contact him at: t.brassington@ninestudios.com for any enquiries.

Georgia Pell-Johnson - Marketing Director

MscEcon Marketing, BScEcon Business & Management, over 6 years experience as a social media marketing manager.

@pellykins

Feel free to contact her at: g.pell.johnson@ninestudios.com for any enquiries.

Viki Bell - Advertising Director & Public Relations Officer

BA Art & Design, furthered her advertising education at the University of Arts London, as an artist has had numerous exhibitions and specialises in visual layouts and digital media.

@vikiibell

Feel free to contact her at: v.bell@ninestudios.com for any enquiries.

Taimoor Bajwa - Electronics Engineer

BEng Electronic & Electrical Engineering with a background in coding and running his own business for 5 years before joining Nine Studios.

Feel free to contact him at: t.bajwa@ninestudios.com for any enquiries.

In addition to our core team we have 3 additional software developers and several mentors with great industry experience. 


As always the main risk involved with a project like this whether we can deliver on our promise with the money we raise. We are telling you that we can. Our costs are extremely low; we've won free office space and have extremely low staff costs (as a young company our employees are here because they believe in our project and are rewarded with equity instead of using up the money you are giving us). 


We also have the capability to do it. We have a great team as mentioned above and fully believe in wider collaboration with the community. This is why we're launching our open hardware community. This is a journey we are all taking together, not just our team. We value your support and input as much as our own.


We want to use this Indiegogo campaign as an opportunity to find and accept help and advice for all of you. If you have any ideas, feedback or suggestions please get in contact with us. 


If you think you can help us make these products better, in a shorter time or even want to join our team as we bring these products to market and develop further smart home products get in touch as well. We're always on the lookout for talented individuals who want to join a high growth design and technology company.


Call our founder, Charlie Jackson on +44 (0) 7522 994760 for any and all queries. 


You can also email him at c.jackson@ninestudios.com and he will personally make sure your questions get answered by himself or the right member of the team.
