Make Your Race Stand Out with FastFlow Lids
RunTheBluegrass Half Marathon in Lexington, Kentucky (a beautiful course, by the way) was the first organized race to use the FastFlow Lids.  They purchased 3,000 lids, which was enough for two of their eleven hydration stations.
Race organizers of RunTheBluegrass saw such a benefit from providing these lids to their runners that they committed to order more for their next race.

Be the first race in your state to provide FastFlow Lids to your runners at every hydration station.  You'll be glad you did it.
At the race expo before the RunTheBluegrass Half Marathon, we showed hundreds of runners the FastFlow Lids and told them they were "lids that allowed a runner to drink easily and quickly without slowing or spilling."  On average, the runners we surveyed were willing to pay $3.40 more for their race fees if the race offered the lids at all hydrations stations.
After the race, we surveyed runners again.  The increase in race fees they were willing to pay went up to $7.40 on average.  So what does this mean?  The customer value clearly exceeds the cost, and the lids will not only pay for themselves, they'll also make your race more desirable.
FAQ's
Are FastFlow Lids recyclable?



Yes, they are 100% recyclable.  The lids are made from food-grade polystyrene plastic and use recycling number 6.

Why are the FastFlow Lids produced in two different colors?

The white lids are used to indicate water is in the cup, while the black lids indicate that a sports drink is in the cup.  These colors can be seen from a distance, which informs runners well in advance what type of liquid they are getting at the hydration station.

Won't FastFlow Lids just cause more waste?

Our experience has shown that these lids actually cause less waste.  Because there are no splashes or spills, runners that typically take multiple cups at hydration stations will now only need to grab one cup.  The runners can hydrate well with one cup since they’re not spilling any of the liquid all over the front of their shirts.  This results in less cups needed at each hydration station, and therefore less water or sports drink that would have otherwise ended up on the road.  Furthermore, the lids can and should be fully recycled.

Are there different styles of lids?

Yes, there are two different FastFlow Lid designs.  The version featured in this Indiegogo project uses a unique venting system that prevents liquid from splashing in the face of the user.  As shown in a picture above, the vent is located under the rim of the lid.  This venting system is best suited for runners.  The second FastFlow Lid design has a vent through the top of the lid.  This particular design may be better suited for the consumer market.

What cup size does the FastFlow Lid fit?

The FastFlow Lid is designed to fit the Gatorade brand 12 oz. cold cup (made by Solo Cup).  FastFlow Lids should fit any standard 12 oz. paper cold cup, but if you’re not using the 12 oz. Gatorade cup, we suggest that before buying all of your cups you test the fit with the specific cup first.

Won't this take more time for volunteers to put lids on cups at races?

Yes, it will take just a little more time for hydration station volunteers to put lids on cups, but not much more.  Volunteers want to help and are willing to do more if it benefits the runners.  So, if volunteers start preparing cups and lids just a little earlier, they will be ready to go when the runners arrive.  Alternatively, adding an extra volunteer or two at the station will also do the trick.

Can cups with FastFlow Lids be stacked on top of each other for large races?

Yes, cups with FastFlow Lids can be stacked in several layers with a thin supporting material (such as cardboard or poster board) used between layers.  There is a clip in the video above showing cups and lids stacked on a hydration station table.

What other benefits do FastFlow Lids offer runners?

FastFlow Lids reduce congestion at hydration stations because they make the drink handoff quick and easy.  This allows runners to save precious time.  The more congested and slippery a hydration station is, the more likely an accident will occur.  However, FastFlow Lids prevent spills in the handoff and while drinking on the run, and prevent the road from becoming wet and slippery, or even icy.
Another benefit of the FastFlow Lids is that they keep contaminants (bugs, leaves, dirt, etc.) out of the drink before they're handed to the runners.  They also keep hydration station workers’ fingers out of the drink.

Why would I want to incur the cost of having FastFlow Lids in my race?

Runners that have used FastFlow Lids absolutely love them.  In fact, runners are asking for them in other races.  Based on runner survey results, races can raise their fees at least $5 if they communicate that they will provide FastFlow Lids at all their hydration stations.  Providing FastFlow Lids is a great way to attract more runners while also increasing race proceeds.


Who are the company founders?


Wade Powell and Geoff Carlson are the co-founders of Cornerstone Innovations, LLC - a company committed to developing products that make life easier.

Wade has 17 years of product development experience and has worked at various consumer electronics and medical device companies. Wade holds a bachelors degree in mechanical engineering from Utah State University and a masters degree in Engineering Management from Stanford University.

Geoff has 12 years of experience in the consumer electronics industry. Geoff holds bachelors and masters degrees in mechanical engineering from Brigham Young University.
With more than a dozen patents to our name, and others pending, we are passionate about creating value for the customer through innovative, yet elegantly simple, solutions. We both have had a life-long fascination with product development and spend much of our spare time developing products that solve common, everyday problems.

story:
Introducing the Stray No More Pet Barrier

The most versatile, expandable, fully-retractable, temporary barrier for pets

 

Do you have a pet that:

  • Tries to escape when you leave the house?
  • Is a bit too excited when visitors come to visit?
  • Doesn't want you to leave them?
  • Chews on everything and everywhere?

Our Stray No More Pet Barrier can help! Meet the stars of our video:

 

What Makes the Stray No More Pet Barrier Different?

Our patent-pending design was created by Tammy Ven Dange, the former CEO of an animal shelter in Canberra, Australia.  After seeing thousands of stray animals come through the shelter every year, she knew that there was a problem.  Yet there were few products on the market that were made specifically to help owners keep their pets from escaping their home or yard.

So, she created the Stray No More product line to do this.  Furthermore, she wanted to help the environment at the same time.  Therefore, all of the Stray No More products are made from nearly 100% Australian recycled plastics and manufactured in Australia.

The Stray No More pet barrier is unique in its versatility, expandability and retractability - making this barrier useful for any pet-owner or someone that may have pet visitors regardless of whether you own a home or are renting.

 

It's important to measure the space where you want to put your barrier before placing your order. This is to reduce hassles for you later, as well as wasted transportation emissions.  

Depending on the layout of your house, simply measure the space from A to B with the door open.  Then, give yourself an extra 25 centimeters of panels minimum to ensure that the barrier can stand on its own and isn't reliant on the walls to hold its form and weight.

If in doubt, it's better to order an extra panel as it can always be used to provide more stability and length.

The following diagrams are a general guide for measuring your space and also provide an idea of standard sizes.


 

 

Stray No More is the first product line of The Refoundry.  Our company began purposely to help Mother Nature by making great products from recycled plastics – to create a demand for this material that may otherwise go to landfill or into waterways.

We believe our sustainability mission and responsibilities are beyond using recycled plastics in our products though. Therefore, we have also instilled the following policies:

 
OUR PRODUCTS

Our products are manufactured in Australia and made from Australian recycled plastics. Where possible, the products contain 100% recycled plastics. Sometimes this percentage may vary due to variables we can’t control like the availability of the processed plastic feedstock.

However, it’s more likely that this could occur because some additives may be required to restore any deterioration of the quality of the product or to enhance certain characteristics like strength.

We will always be clear in our product descriptions so that our customers know what percentage of any product is from recycled plastics.

OUR PACKAGING

We have purposely chosen product packaging that uses recycled paper and cardboard. The only thing that is not currently available in a sustainable form is the strapping tape which unfortunately is plastic. We will continue to look for better options.

TRANSPORTATION IMPACT

We aim to minimise our carbon emissions for transportation where ever possible by manufacturing in Australia and by choosing fulfillment centres near our manufacturers.

Furthermore, where interstate travel is required by our employees, we use carbon offsets for any flights.

CIRCULAR LIFE CYCLE OF PRODUCTS

We considered the circular life cycle of our products from the very beginning when we pick our Australian manufacturers.

Furthermore, if a customer no longer wants or needs one of our ‘Stray No More‘ products, they can send it back to us, and we will either:

1) Donate it to an animal shelter to be included as part of a adoption packaging for a ‘harder to rehome’ animal; or

2) Recycle the product back into the same product.

 

Due to the size and heavy weight of this product, we will only be shipping to Australian addresses at this time.  The additional cost for shipping is as follows:

  • 1.25M Hallway Barrier - $25
  • 2M L-Shape Doorway Barrier - $30
  • 3.5M Open Plan Barrier - $50
  • 25cm Extra Panel - Add $5 on top of original order

 

PROTOTYPE CHANGES

This product has been in the making for about six months and has been tested with various animals.  Nevertheless, it's in the prototype stage, and as such we already have a list of things we want to improve or fix.  As such, the product you see here may change slightly to make it better.  The changes will unlikely be cosmetic however, and so the overall appearance shouldn't change much.

MAY NOT WORK WITH ALL ANIMALS

As a pet owner, you'd appreciate the fact that every animal is different.  Even pets from the same litter have different personalities just like kids.  The pet barrier is meant to act as a deterrent to keep animals from escaping when  a door is opened or to prevent them from entering/exiting a space.

And while it has worked on all the animals we have tested this prototype on so far, it's not to say that it will work with yours if it decides to jump over the barrier or pull it out of the wall.  We just can't make that kind of guarantee. What we have found though is that:

  1. Most pets hesitate to jump over something when they cannot see the other side (i.e. our no-peak panels);
  2. The barrier will move if a pet tries to jump on it, and they usually back away when that happens;
  3. Because each panel weights about 1 kilo each, they haven't been able to get under it very easily;
  4. The pet will tend to look at the human when they can't find an exit or see what's on the other side.
  5. If the human leaves quickly, they get bored with the barrier quickly too.

PRODUCT DELIVERY

While our products will be made in Australia, the 6 tonnes of steel moulds will be made in China.  As such, our schedule will be impacted by their long Chinese New Year shut-down period in the January/February 2020 time frame.  With this in mind, we have forecasted a March 2020 delivery schedule for this product.

We purposely decided not to offer a lot of random prizes for those who back this campaign - mostly because so much of it could be junk that just ends up in the landfill.

Instead, regardless of whether or not you decide to pre-purchase our Stray No More pet barrier, we would really love it if you could share our campaign with your own contacts.  Who knows - maybe our product can solve a problem for their pet!  Furthermore, the more barriers that are bought, the less plastic that goes to the landfill here in Australia.

Thanks for being so PAWSOME and helping us keep pets safer while helping the environment!

-Tammy

story:
What are the features？

  • Open-source hardware, no need to design from scratch
  • Java language support, enabling app developers to participate smart device development
  • Powerful SDK, easing the interaction with mobile device and improving the experience.
  • Coin-sized CORE Board
  • Sensor boards expanded
  • Openwrt support
  • Low cost, the Core board is less than $6 in bulk

We offer you the integrated solution--SproutJoin. SproutJoin includes Sprout Kit and Sprout SDK, both of which will assist you to develop Smart Home Applications faster and easier than you every could image!

SproutJoin is designed for the small-sized developing teams who are willing to build the innovative and unique equipment, like a remote control that can adjust the temperature of air conditioner at home when the user is still driving a car outside.

For designing a smart device, a developing team has to assign teammates to do the scheme of hardware and programming of the software, which will not only take up a great amount of time, but will use up the limited finance. Here we offer the SproutJoin, an integrated solution to do your old job in a brand new way. You can use the existing Sprout Kit as an ideal hardware platform, and program with Java with the Sprout SDK to implement your wonderful ideas. As we observe, with the aid of Sprout Kit and Sprout SDK, the developing cost will be cut down to 30 % and the developing period will be shorten to 35 %. 


A better tool for the developers

The Sprout Kit is designed for this visions that app producers can dramatically shorten their smart devices’development cycle and program the devices more easily than ever before.

CORE Board and expansion boards for various functions

The Sprout Kit consists of a CORE Board and many sensor boards.  The CORE Board is assembled with a Wi-Fi embedded CPU-RT5350 that enables smart devices to communicate with smartphone or to join home proximal network.

                                                Schematic of the CORE Board

In addition, the Sprout Kit plans to offer expansion boards that will support specific functions including acceleration, gyroscope, magneto resistance, light intensity, baroceptor, temperature, humidity and so on.

                                   

Program with your familiar language

The application is written in Java with a JVM with GNU class path, so app developer can program in their familiar language. The application can be debugged with simulative environment firstly. Then user can upload it to sprout kit through USB cable.

                                              Upload through the USB Cable


For now, four boards have been developed, and more are coming !

  • SJ1000-CORE : a 33mm*33mm sized CORE Board with Wi-Fi.
  • SJ1000-BASE : a card sized board provides power and extend several ports for the CORE Board.
  • SJ1000-ENV : an ENVIRONMENT Board measures air pressure, illumination, temperature and humidity.
  • SJ1000-SPACE : a SPACE Board integrates with accelerometer, gyroscope, and magneto resistance.


More details about Sprout CORE Board

It is a small sized Wi-Fi module in compliance with IEEE 802.11b/g/n.

◆Embedded 802.11n 1T1R MAC/BBP with MLD enhancement

◆150 Mbps PHY data rate

◆MIPS 24KEc 360 Mhz with 32 KB I cache/16 KB D cache

◆32 MB SDRAM

◆16 MB SPI FLASH

◆USB 2.0 HOST/Device dual mode x1

◆Supports 5 10/100 UTP ports

◆Rich peripheral interfaces：GPIO*9，SPI*1，I2C*1，I2S*1，UART*1，ENET*1

◆I/O：3.3 V

◆33mm*33mm small sized

◆2.0mm circular gold-plated socket

                                                      Layout of the CORE Board


                                                           Sprout Kit is working


What is Sprout SDK?

Sprout SDK is a software package designed for simplifying interaction between Sprout Kit and smartphone. It offers P2P protocol which ease the communication in proximal network. It also offers functional modules which can be integrated into user APP to improve developing experience. The Sprout SDK currently supports Sprout Kit, Android and iOS.

Examples that will guide you

At the same time, we offer the instances for you to get familiar with this software. An example of adding interface.

Callee:

Caller:

Screen-shots of the development:

Note: The package will be available on beta version soon.


For more information, please visit our web site : http://www.sproutjoin.com


Use of Funds

  • Board Design, Tuning and Refinement
  • Antenna Refinement
  • Firmware Development and Optimization
  • Production Samples
  • Expansion Boards Design and Test
  • App Design and Improvements


Schedule


About Us

SproutJoin is a team offering Open Source and Open Hardware to simplify the process that iOS and Android developers extend their App with smart devices.

Our team comes from Hangzhou, China, which consists of two Senior Hardware Engineers, two Senior Software Engineers and an Industrial Designer.  We now part-time operate the project and intend to in the near future have our own company.


Contact Us

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions! We’d love to hear from you!!

Email Support at: SproutJoin@163.com

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/sproutjoin

Follow us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sproutjoin

For inquiries regarding more products details, the latest information please apply at: http://www.sproutjoin.com

story:
Cajun Crate is a monthly subscription box that delivers specially curated boxes filled with Louisiana made items! Each month a box will contain Cajun products ranging from coffee to beignet mix, jambalaya to gumbo roux, étouffée sauce to bbq sauce, and so much more! 

We are teaming up with chefs and tastemakers from Louisiana to find the best products from Louisiana that we can deliver to you! In your Cajun Crate you will find a guide to what's inside your Cajun Crate. Find out where your product was made and how you can create cajun creates at home with our step by step recipe guides. 

We will be going behind the scenes with our awesome Cajun vendors to show you how and where your products were made, introduce you to the creator, and explore their little piece of Louisiana culture.

This is not an ordinary subscription box. This is a Cajun subscription box! We do things a little different in Louisiana and we want to share that with you!  Each Parish has a different style and our subscribers can taste it all.
 

The idea behind Cajun Crate was born out a constant need to send loved ones Cajun fixings and staples. Any one from Louisiana but now living out side of Louisiana knows it is hard to find good cajun products in grocery stores. We were constantly bringing coffee, soda, gumbo roux, jambalaya, and hot sauce to family and friends in other states whenever we visited. We started make "cajun care packages" for family that contained all the cajun staples. It was always like watching a kid on Christmas morning open up the package and inspect all the goods.  After talking to friends, this seemed as though everyone has to do this for loved ones living out of state. Not to mention all the local goods we were also bringing to friends from Lafayette to New Orleans or Shreveport. We started discovering that even though something was made in Louisiana you might not be able to find it in all parts of the state. 

This is a problem that needed to be solved! And Cajun Crate was born! We have been going to farmers markets and local grocers ever since to find brands big and small, unique and small batch, from Caddo Parish to Jefferson parish. 

 

Our goal is to promote local. Louisiana owned. This way the small and large brands can gain more exposure, hire people, buy more from local farmers, and create new products. We are locals that love helping locals.  Each box of Cajun Crate will help support at least 7 Louisiana owned businesses.

We don't want to give away the surprise! But Cajun Crate will deliver a box filled with 5-7 Cajun products, a guide to what's inside and recipes. All items are food and drink related and will be non perishable. Items featured will be FULL SIZE & some products will be exclusive to Cajun Crate. This is culture in a crate! 

 

Check out the brands that we are working with already! We are adding more to the Cajun Crate family everyday!
story_txt: Cajun Crate is a monthly subscription box that delivers specially curated boxes filled with Louisiana made items! Each month a box will contain Cajun products ranging from coffee to beignet mix, jambalaya to gumbo roux, étouffée sauce to bbq sauce, and so much more! We are teaming up with chefs and tastemakers from Louisiana to find the best products from Louisiana that we can deliver to you! In your Cajun Crate you will find a guide to what's inside your Cajun Crate. Find out where your product was made and how you can create cajun creates at home with our step by step recipe guides. We will be going behind the scenes with our awesome Cajun vendors to show you how and where your products were made, introduce you to the creator, and explore their little piece of Louisiana culture.This is not an ordinary subscription box. This is a Cajun subscription box! We do things a little different in Louisiana and we want to share that with you!  Each Parish has a different style and our subscribers can taste it all. The idea behind Cajun Crate was born out a constant need to send loved ones Cajun fixings and staples. Any one from Louisiana but now living out side of Louisiana knows it is hard to find good cajun products in grocery stores. We were constantly bringing coffee, soda, gumbo roux, jambalaya, and hot sauce to family and friends in other states whenever we visited. We started make "cajun care packages" for family that contained all the cajun staples. It was always like watching a kid on Christmas morning open up the package and inspect all the goods.  After talking to friends, this seemed as though everyone has to do this for loved ones living out of state. Not to mention all the local goods we were also bringing to friends from Lafayette to New Orleans or Shreveport. We started discovering that even though something was made in Louisiana you might not be able to find it in all parts of the state. This is a problem that needed to be solved! And Cajun Crate was born! We have been going to farmers markets and local grocers ever since to find brands big and small, unique and small batch, from Caddo Parish to Jefferson parish.  Our goal is to promote local. Louisiana owned. This way the small and large brands can gain more exposure, hire people, buy more from local farmers, and create new products. We are locals that love helping locals.  Each box of Cajun Crate will help support at least 7 Louisiana owned businesses.We don't want to give away the surprise! But Cajun Crate will deliver a box filled with 5-7 Cajun products, a guide to what's inside and recipes. All items are food and drink related and will be non perishable. Items featured will be FULL SIZE & some products will be exclusive to Cajun Crate. This is culture in a crate!  Check out the brands that we are working with already! We are adding more to the Cajun Crate family everyday!

story:
The idea – Where did we get it?

There were many times when we purchased a beautiful plant and for the first few days we watered it regularly (sometimes we even overdid it ;) However, as the weeks went by we devoted less and less attention to our plant, so it withered away and in the end we threw it away. If only we had remembered…. Does this story ring a bell? It does to us.

That’s how we came up with the idea to create Kviatec – the intelligent sensor, which constantly monitors the conditions a plant lives in and informs us of its needs.

How does it work?

The sensors are located in the plant pots and monitor the air temperature, amount of sunlight and the soil’s moisture level. Every 15 minutes information is sent via radio frequency to the Main unit that streams this information to your mobile phone or computer.

One main unit collects information from up to 50 sensors. The sensors can be located even 200 meters away from the unit (we tested the maximum range in open terrain).

The creation of a set (Plant sensor + Main unit) has allowed us to achieve an optimum solution. Thanks to this combination:

  • We’ve made the sensor as small as possible
  • We’ve made the sensor as cheap as possible – if you have a lot of plants you can purchase a lot of sensors
  • Thanks to radio and WiFi transmission our set works online – you know what’s happening to your plants wherever you are. If you are away, and someone was supposed to water them, but forgot about one plant – you will know that ;) 

Current data

You can observe your plant’s ongoing conditions online. An website as well as a mobile app are at your disposal. If you want to, you can personalize these tools – add pictures of your plants and name them.

Plant database – you can set your plant’s requirements or use the plant database we are currently working on.

The app does not only let you check your plant’s conditions, but also has a notification option. You can set if and when you should be notified.

Data analysis

Information is collected long – term and presented on easy to read charts. This will allow you to analyze data for various time periods (hourly, daily, weekly or even longer periods of time).

Design

When we were designing this device we kept in mind that our plants are what is most important to us. That’s why we didn’t want the sensor to draw too much attention. We devoted a lot of effort into creating the smallest sensor possible.

Our sensors are available in five colors: white, grey, green, brown and black.

You can order an array of colors to match your plants when purchasing a set.

The Main unit is available in black.

 

We think ecologically

Each sensor has one 1 CR2032 battery that will last for at least a year of the sensor’s operation.

The Kviatec sensor will help you adjust the amount of water your plants need – some plants need less water, others more –you don’t need to water all your plants with the same frequency.

Considering the fact that most of us have lots of chargers at home, we decided that the main unit will be equipped with USB cable only. You can plug it to the charger at least 5V DC> 500 mA.

Kviatec is appropriate both for indoor and outdoor plants. 

Project Timeline

 

2016

June – The idea and the first functional sensor prototype ( a device that checks all three parameters)

September – PCB prototype

December –The third sensor prototype (miniature version of the previous one) + 

The Main unit is created

 

2017

March – the trial website is created

We attain initial CE certification

May - the  design of the exteriors are finalized - 3D prints.

September - starts Indiegogo campaign


So far we have been able to finance our project by ourselves. Now came the moment we need a support. There are three milestones ahead of us, which require the largest financial effort. Without your support we won't be able to run mass production :)

 

To do:

Production of forms for the production process

Attain FCC and CE certificates

Create the app (for Android and iPhone)

Dispatch of ready devices (estimated time is May 2018)

 

Meet the team

story:
ArctiEdge Chef Knife--Lifetime to Everyone Everywhere

Comparing to other big chef knife brands who are applying a huge sales margin on top of the actual cost, our great knife with online sales model will only cost you a fraction of the price.  By closely associated partner with our factories and selling directly to you point to point, we’re capable of offering an incredible knife at wholesale pricing. Top materials, lower price.  Save your cabbage for more fresh food! 

 

Progressive and Human-centered Design

THE HANDLE

Knife handle is based on human-centered design, you can perfectly hold in hand. Designer makes a lofted shape from the beginning of rounded square (bolster) to ellipse at end cap, it meets with different cutting skills.  By introducing carbon fibre to the handle material, which is normally applied in aviation, super car, boat, space industries, etc., made us believing that it is revolutionary in the knife industry.

This luxury material is three times stronger than any steel, resistance to corrosion, rust-free and stains, incredibly durable and anti-extreme temperature.

The forged cap design gives you the perfect balance between blade and handle, maximising the comfortability for any users.

THE BLADE

The blade is also designed so it cuts right to the end of the blade using the full length which is often missing on knives.  ArctiEdge chef knife is made from the finest stainless steel material.  The blade utilized Japanese V. Gold 10 Steel Core, laminating with 66 layers of Damascus Steel.  It is hardened to Rockwell *C62-64 degree which definitely excels the hardness and durability to the next level.

The cutting edge is sharpened to the perfect angle of 26+/-3 degree, assuring an outstanding cutting performance that meet the most demanding requirements.

*Cutting Paper Test:

 
 
*Japanese Materials Certification

 

Guarantee of Quality

No matter how strong of the knife, over time all blades will dull.  A sharp knife is always safer as providing “non-slippery” cutting performance, and also keeps it fun to cook with.  We won’t let you get stuck.  If your knife goes dull, we’ll make it sharp.  Simple as it is.

 

Reward for first 400 Backers

We do thank you for the backers in support of our campaign at the early stage, herewith, we are sincerely to offer a reward for first 400 backers--5" Ceramic Utility Knife" which is perfect for fruit slicing or cutting small foods.

If Campaign Goal Amount is US$60,000 or above, this reward is applicable to all backers. 

 

 

Timeline

 

Risks & Challenges

The only risk of project are timing and the number of backers.

We have been working many years with experienced knife factory to help us manufacturing our knives, with accumulated over 30 years production experiences to ensure the quality, the lead time is our main concern, of course the sufficient number of backers are also very important to meet with the minimum production quantities.  We would keep track of everything for the backers, such as mold development, preparation of materials, and the production status, so you would not feel left in the dark!

 

Who We Are

We're a team of passionate designer and product developer that love great food and well-made objects. We have wide-ranging experience to dispatch products to market and strongly communicate with companies both large and small.

story:
Stars & Stripes Soirée

Celebrate this 4th of July in style with the Stars & Stripes Soirée box! Everything you need to celebrate - from near or far. Have everything delivered to your door for up to 12 guests. Or, celebrate virtually and send a box to each of your guests. We'll even include patriotic e-vites and virtual backgrounds to add to the fun!

 

What's In The Box

Each Stars & Stripes Soirée box comes with:

  • Disposable place settings for each of your guests, incl. paper plates, bowls, napkins and plastic cutlery and glasses.
  • Festive decor: a table runner, tin pail candle holders with tea lights, a red pail vase (to add your own flowers), silver sparkler stirs, and hanging paper fans.
  • If you opt for a "virtual party", we'll email you a patriotic evite design and virtual backgrounds.
  • A party guide, including simple set-up instructions, hosting tips and photography tricks for an easy, post-worthy party!

 

Pre-Order

Pre-order your Stars & Stripes Soirée box now through May 31st to automatically receive a 10% friends and family discount. Simply select your perk (on the right side of the page) based on the number of guests and follow the check-out steps. If you're celebrating virtually, be sure to select the "Virtual Party" add-on!

 

The Posted Party Co

Posted Party is on a mission to make every at-home celebration post-worthy!  We are working hard to bring you our second holiday box offering this year. We loved hearing your feedback on our Valentine's Day Box offering - and we've used it to bring you our all-new summer celebration boxes, starting with the Stars & Stripes Soirée.

 

Our Business Goals

Posted Party was founded by Samantha Scinta in 2020 and was born out of many virtual events and an effort to make at-home celebrations extra special during the pandemic. Samantha's goal with Posted Party is to make at-home, post-worthy parties easy and accessible to all (especially her friends & fam)! Posted Party is currently in a "proof-of-concept" phase. We're so excited to have you try out our brand-new celebration box concept. Posted Party is not profitable - so we are offering our boxes at the lowest price we can, while still sourcing all of the contents at lower quantities. We hope to scale to higher volumes in the future as we build out this business - and lower our prices in the process.

story:
He never needs sharpening


 Nobody makes aluminum knives because knife makers say an aluminium blade would go blunt immediately.This is not true for the Single Knife: With an already patented process in Europe, USA and other countries, the anodic G.H.A. treatment with silver ions makes the aluminum 10 times more wear-resistant than steel. It lasts a lifetime and never needs sharpening.

HOW IT'S MADE






What is the G.H.A. treatment ?  

G.H.A. treatment It is the most recent and innovative technology applicable to the surface of all aluminum alloys. It is a special anodic oxidation treatment, patented, with the addition of silver ions Ag +.


Silver was used to disinfect water and conserve food by the ancient Egyptians, Romans and Greeks. In more recent history, it was also used by sailors and pioneers that arrived in the United States.



No vegetables sticks to the blade

At lunch I cook and, every time I cut vegetables, they stick to the blade of the knife, then I have to stop cutting. I have to remove the vegetables, risking cutting my fingers, then resume cutting. I waste time doing this. Since I could not find a knife on the market that really prevented vegetables attaching to the blade, I designed one myself.

Camillo Baldeschi - designer



Perfect cut and the vegetables do not stick to the blade 


HOW DOES IT WORK 


 Patent - pending 

 We are waiting for the patent about the original shape of the knife



WHAT TO CUT 




HOW WE STOP VEGETABLES STICKING TO THE BLADE




Balanced and lightweight

Test antibacterial

Test carried out and certified in accordance with ISO 22196 by :



100% antibacterial



Always and all Hygienic


 If you forget to wash the knife, no problem, after 24 hours the bacteria are dead.


Very easy to clean - just wash using your hands and water - the GHA treatment will kill bacteria on its own.  

You can also use a soft or rough sponge. If you do want to use a detergent, it is better to use an ecological detergent.

Use a wooden cutting board or of plastic material


Very hard G.H.A.® treatment


 Low cost

We can keep the manufacturing cost low because the Single Knife is made of aluminum which costs less than blade steel and requires less manufacturing steps than steel.

The ownership cost is kept low as you never need to pay for sharpening or use a sharpener because of the G.H.A. treatment.


Excellent grip for every hand because it was built with aueree proportions. 
See Harmonic Scheme



​

Drawings and Prototypes​

​Work in a Factory

​


PERKS​​

SHIPPING 





​


​

​

​

story:
Features

  • Live view of your oven from anywhere
  • Easy mounting and removal with suction cup design
  • Multiple timer notifications
  • Live temperature info & temperature alerts*
  • 12 hour battery life for all day cooking and baking
  • iOS & Android app support

* With temperature sensor add-on

Oven monitoring, anywhere

Get a live view of what's cooking in your oven from anywhere: on the couch, in the backyard, anywhere!

Simple.

The oven cam's (patent pending) design has simplicity at it's core. Setting up the cam takes less than a minute (even for my parents)! Power on the cam and stick to your oven - that's it!

 

Timers and temperature alerts pop up right on your device. Set multiple timers to help remind yourself to periodically check in on what's cooking.

 

With the temperature sensor you can set temperature alerts so you know exactly when your chicken is done cooking, oven is done preheating, or your steak is cooked to perfection.

 

Beefy 2200 mAmp battery lets you cook all day (or night) on a single charge.

 

Works on iOS & Android, Phones & tablets

 

Oven Cam Proto

The oven cam is currently in the prototype stage, and is fully functional in both the hardware and software. We are looking to you to help raise funds to transform it into a product that can be manufactured at large scale. For the hardware this includes working on injection molding for the camera body, silicone molding for the suction cups, custom printed circuit boards, and large scale assembly. For the software this includes extensive testing to squash all the bugs and working on the design of the apps so they look as great as they work!

Like the oven cam idea? Order now on Indiegogo and save 25% off the future retail price. Even better, the first 100 people get an additional 10% off (35% off retail)!

Worried about losing your money? We've done a lot of number crunching and research to determine how much we will need to take the oven cam from prototype to production. If this goal isn't reached we will refund all orders.

 

Spread the word!

Like the oven cam idea? Don't be the only cool kid on the block! Share this page with your friends and family so they can spend more time outside the kitchen.

https://igg.me/at/oven-cam

story:
Help us bring this advanced innovative, multi-function upgrade of the pooper scooper, to all pet owners who dread using their hands to pick up their pets deposits.

OVERVIEW

The latest innovation in pooper scooper design. Pooper scoopers have not evolved over the years and we still use our hands for the most expedient way to collect the deposits, but it is also the most unsanitary and unpleasant way too. With Bleu Paw we took out the unpleasantness and copied how you use your hand to provide a device that replaces your hand. You slide your hand inside a bag & you slide Bleu Paw inside a bag,  but instead of bending down,  you reach down to pickup poop.  In a comfortable posture that puts no stress on your back.

 Time To Upgrade How You Pick Up POOP!

Nothing ruins a great trip with our pets to the beach, campgrounds or the park until you run out of bags & have to pick up with your hands the unpleasant deposits they leave. One bag with Bleu Paw is all you need just stack all of your dogs  poop for the day into the huge claws and lock them closed until you need to collect more then discard one bag with all of your pets poop together. 

Yeah it’s unpleasant, but we have to pick it up.

After picking up countless piles and even having a few bags break my partner and I knew there has to be a better more efficient, sanitary way to pickup pets poop. So we said why not design one with all the features we would expect the perfect pooper scooper to have.

Meet Bleu Paw XL

For the last year, we worked on finding materials to make sure it’s a high quality, durable, functioning device packed with all the important features that will make it necessity while walking your dog.

Bulky, Long Pooper Scoopers Are OUT!

They make carrying them impossible and unsanitary. Bleu Paw Changes all that.

 

              Core Features

  •  LED  light
  • Extendable rugged aluminum pole
  • Carrying loop & carabiner clip
  • Locking claw button
  • Use as a Chuck it tool to Play catch.
  • Kitty liter openings to sift our kitty litter without bending down.

Weighs only 15 oz

 

 

  

        Durable Rugged Design

How tough is our Bleu Paw XL  you can use it to pick up Horse deposits. Use in Horse Stables, Farms, and Backyards. 

                     How Does It Work?

Featuring Our Patent Pending  Bag Adherence Sticky Roller Design allowing any size plastic bag to adhere to the device to allow you to reach down and pickup poop WITHOUT the bag sliding off.

 WORKS WITH ANY TYPE OF PLASTIC BAG

   

 Easy To Use And Easy to Store

Use on Ranches and in Barns

 

Our use of lightweight strong materials make it ideal to attach to leashes, strollers, even pockets & more.

 

   

 

Travel With Bleu

Have On Hand & Ready To Go

Use As A Chuck It Tool

Play catch with your dog.

                                        Perks

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have finished all development processes and brought Bleu Paw to fruition.  We’re hoping you will come along for this amazing journey by helping us secure production costs. We guarantee this product will be manufactured and shipped. We have already solved all development issues and produced the molds and started the production process.  

We have done the heavy lifting and $6000 allows us to manufacture in larger numbers & bring Bleu Paw to your door step.  Be one of the first and the envy of your neighbors by placing your order today. Let Bleu change your life.

For our Early Bird customers we are offering an amazing perk for those lucky ones you will receive the bleu paw Xl at a discounted price + 1 Roll of Poop Bags FREE. 

Production

 

 

Risks & Challenges

With any manufacturing projects there are inherent risks & we have gone to great lengths to mitigate those risks.   We have over 30 years manufacturing experience in China and can assure you this product will be delivered.  We have successfully developed and manufactured our popular Bleu Paw LG model & with this new model we will have a full line of  Pet Pooper Scoopers.

Production models

story:
A Short Summary

Let's face it!  We throw a tremendous amount of perfectly good wood into landfills.  We've all seen it.  Drive by a construction or demolition site, and you can see that there is enough lumber in the dumpster to build a small house!   

"Wood doesn't grow on trees."

I wrote that slogan to make people think about the fantastic resource we glean from trees.  It's a little tongue in cheek at first glance, but let's take it a step further.  Wood is a finite resource; demand can (and will) outstrip supply, but every single day someone is bulldozing entire old houses into landfills because it's just "more cost-effective."  Really? Or is it because people aren't aware of the amazing groups out there that make it their daily goal to "reduce, reuse and recycle"?  

For me, it began a few years ago when I was removing some baseboard in my basement. In my case, the baseboard was wonderful solid wood that had been perfectly cut and installed long ago.  It had to come off, but when I looked at the custom angled cuts in the corners… I knew I didn't have the skill or equipment to replicate the baseboard, nor did I see a single reason to throw it out, so I numbered the pieces and stored them on my porch for reinstallation after the new floor!  Newsflash: baseboard is generally installed with a "brad nailer" which shoots these 15 to 18-gauge staples through the baseboard into the framing.  In my specific case, whoever installed these was "overzealous" to say the least, and each baseboard piece I took off was riddled with brads and looked (on the wall facing side) a bit like a porcupine.  I was confident.  I had tools.  Lots of tools.  I had been handed down my Dad's tools.  I collected tools at garage sales for many years.  No problem!  Let me just get out to the garage and… huh?  I looked and looked and brought each possible solution to the porch, where I'd placed the baseboard on sawhorses and flipped them over for a quick brad removal.  I tried every manner of plier.  Tedious, slow, ineffective.  Wow.  This wood is looking unuseable!  No!  I don't have the skill, the time or even the extra dollars!  Then it came to me.  I'll make my own tool.  I will design something expressly for the purpose at hand!  Brads need to be gripped with gusto and pulled through the BACK of the board.  Once I gripped these long skinny nails at the base of the board, I’d need to lift and grip at the same time.  Turns out that there had to be a lever and fulcrum.  The jaws had to come together tightly out at the tips and have real gripping power while I rocked back on the “spoon-shaped fulcrum”.  Thank you Archimedes!

Enter the Nail Hunter!  Precise tips for gripping fasteners as thin as staples.  A spoon fulcrum head that rocks and levers out embedded nails.  A rear pulling area for extremely quick pulling of partially buried nails! And additionally, a flat spot behind the rivet to tap with a hammer if you need to dig a little deeper. Let's do this!

What our goal is...

First and foremost our goal is to put effective tools into the hands of people with a passion for reuse. Our campaign will directly contribute tools to the BMRA.org, a 501(c)3 charity, that is working to help create a world without waste. This charity and your support means that both of you will get a Nail Hunter that is powerfully effective, simple to use, and designed for efficiency. 

Our Impact

The Nail Hunter is a tool for change because it materially reduces the time and effort it takes to "get your wood back."  Reusing wood also saves you lots of money and is good karma. Using a tool like the Nail Hunter allows volunteers, deconstruction groups and recyclers to clean used wood for another new purpose!  Responsible deconstruction, demolition, recycling!  A  2 by 4 with a few nails protruding out of it has no business (or purpose!) in the scrap pile. Wood is so amazingly resilient that if you can effectively remove nails with very little residual damage, the lumber can be redeployed back into an entirely different construction project!   Filling landfills with lumber that has served only a single purpose in its life so far is not just absurd, it's a bit arrogant, isn't it?  We know that to change this behavior, a change of mindset is needed.  Respectfully, there are also real TOOLS needed.  Along with education and the mobilization of groups like the BMRA (The Building Materials Reuse Association), BigReuse.org and others… there have to be tools that allow the savings of TIME and MONEY, and that's what the Nail Hunter offers.

The Risks & Challenge

It's not easy to design and build a brand new hand tool. We're going to need a forging die created in order to make these unusual pliers. Currently, there is a tendency to use what's already "in our kitchen drawer" or toolbox, and that may continue. There are basically two hurdles keeping most new products from becoming widely adopted: you have to let the world know it exists to solve a common problem, and you have to teach the folks how to use it!  Hopefully, the amazing platform we have here will "close the gap" quickly and the features of my "nail pulling pliers" will become compelling enough for every one of you to make this your favorite new tool.

Other Ways You Can Help

It is my hope that even if you don't buy a Nail Hunter, you will think about gifting one to one of the amazing organizations that promote the reuse of wood and the responsible deconstruction and recycling of lumber and other construction materials to save trees and reduce unnecessary waste in our landfills.  Also, you can use your own powerful social media platforms to get our message out...there's a simple solution to an arduous task...the Nail Hunter!

story:
Orchid Blade

Shaving isn't easy.  It's even harder when you can't see what you're doing with a large blade attached to the end of an awkwardly angled handle.  You shouldn't be required to be an expert at yoga just to shave. 

The Orchid Blade allows you to have the blade right at your finger tip.  With its flexible handle you are provided with maximum maneuverability.  Add in a premium triple blade razor cartridge and you get a great close shave.

 

Birth of an Idea

Shaving is something I actually enjoy doing.  There is nothing better than the close shave of a straight razor.  Unfortunately it doesn't work everywhere.  I'm more or less bald so I shave my head to finish off what nature has left.  For that I use my HeadBlade®, a razor specifically designed to shave the head.

While in the shower shaving (without a mirror), I noticed the wall of products my wife owns.  I happen to think about how difficult it must be for women to shave.  As I started to shave around my mustache, my finger tip naturally went to the edge of the blade guiding the razor.  That small motion sparked an idea.  I talked to my wife, had a few awkward conversations with her friends, and the Orchid Blade was born.

 

The Advantage

Most "Bikini Blades" are bulky and awkward.  Here is one of the many sites that rank "bikini razors".  Orchid Blade is more than just a bikini razor!

 

Problem #1 - They are just too wide

 

Orchid Blade is half the width of a standard triple blade razor.

 

Problem #2 - The small ones just look dangerous!

 

Orchid Blade has a premium triple blade disposable cartridge. Typical bikini razors have a single blade permanently attached to the handle.

 

Problem #3 - The Handle 

 

Orchid Blade has a flexible handle that bends with your finger. Simply insert your finger into the two rings with the tip resting on top of the blade. Your finger will naturally guide the blade along all the curves for the perfect shave.

 

Project Status

☑ Concept - Originally sketched out on the back of an old medical bill.  From there it went through many iterations to make sure I had the best idea possible.

☑ Research - Talked to a good number of women, scoured the internet, and searched patents.  I also bought a bunch of razors that are on the market today, tore them apart, and learned how they worked.

☑ Design - Took the research and created some 3d Models.  Again, it took multiple iterations to create what I feel to be a great product.

☑ Prototypes - Multiple prototypes were made.  It was very difficult to get one that had some flexibility, but I managed to make something that worked.

☑ Suppliers - This was a bit harder.  The handle was easy, the smaller razor cartridge took some time.  However, I have quotes for tooling and the first small run of parts.

☐ Money! - This is where Indiegogo comes in.  With any luck we'll be off to the next step.

☐ Order Tooling - To get the molds made should take around 10 weeks.

After the tooling is made, I will receive a sample run to verify the molds were made correctly.  At that time I'll make any necessary adjustments and get your rewards in the mail!

The Final Step - Get Orchid Blade into stores nationwide!


The Money

The largest amount goes toward tooling; plastic parts require steel molds for injection molding machines. Funding also goes to packaging (designing/obtaining), and to fees required by the US Patent Office (patent protection).

Just know that I have created a dynamic spreadsheet with all the numbers to ensure the $35,000 will get the product into your hands.

**Orchid Blade is Patent Pending**

 

Risk

The majority of the work for this project is complete, now I simply need funding to order tooling and prototypes. While problems do arise from time to time in any project, I'm confident that my industry connections and creative problem solving skills will keep things on track; I've worked in research and development for 8 years and have extensive experience.

I do expect shipping to be quite a task. Getting that much product out of one's home will be challenging, but it should be manageable.

If any issues do arise I'll make sure to keep my backers informed.

 

Contributers

All contributers will be recognized on our website.

 

About Me

I'm a young Product Development Engineer and have a knack for creatively solving problems. Currently I'm working in the automotive industry on a small advanced product development team.

When I'm not at work I'm at home with my wonderful wife Danielle and five kids. I'm also a volunteer firefighter in the city of Troy. With around 180 volunteers, Troy is the largest volunteer fire department in the state of Michigan.

"Inspiration can be found in a pile of junk. Sometimes, you can put it together with a good imagination and invent something." - Thomas Edison

story:
The Smart O’Clock adds an important thing to your clock, Schedule.

Synced Seamlessly from your smartphone calendar.

Clocks has been around for centuries, and even today with smartphones and hand watches we still like to have one around. Especially now with the Smart O'Clock added value of seeing your schedule on it.

Even if we remember our next appointment, having it marked on the clock gives us a quick notion of the time we have left before it starts. Seeing the gaps between appointments help us plan our actual work time.





Smart O’Clock is modernly designed to correspond with the gadgets it syncs with. Body and dials were cautiously designed not to obscure the Clock’s main element which is the schedule markers.

Quality materials are used for the Smart O’Clock using steel frame for the body and real glass for the cover.

The Wall edition comes in Silver and black. Desktop version is Black.


Technology has finally reached the point where Electronic ink is now affordable and Bluetooth 4.0 smart devices can operate on regular AAA batteries so we can make a Clock that shows our daily schedule for a year without a constant outlet plug.

Smart O'Clock is a Bluetooth 4.0 device for Low Energy consumption, please check for compatible devices:


Compatibility

  • iPhone 4S and up, the new ipad, ipad mini with iOS 5 and up.

  • Android Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) phones and tablets, check this page for compatible devices: http://www.gsmarc.com/model-finder/bluetooth-support/bluetooth-4.0/




Calendar is a basic object in both Iphone and Android, this is why any app can access events. The sync app for both Iphone and Android works seamlessly in the background and is updated with any event added to your smartphone calendars including outlook events and Google online calendar. It will simply display them on the Smart O’Clock’s.




We need to reach our funding goal In order to buy the following components in reasonable prices:

  • Custom electronic ink display.
  • Bluetooth module.
  • Board for Bluetooth and electronic ink integration.
  • A Costume Clock per our design.
  • Assembly.
  • Packaging.

Thank you for your support :)


FAQ

SHIPPING COSTS

You can add your shipping cost on top of the amount of your perk. If you do not add the shipping costs to your payment, we will send you an email post campaign to do this payment. We know that it is not included in the Indiegogo platform. We keep track.


When can i choose the color of my watch?

Before the end of the campaign, we will simply send you an individual email to ask you for the color of your choice.  


Am I suppose to manually add shipping if I'm not from the US?

Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk.


What to do if I forget to pay for shipping?

Just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the actual amount you need to pay with the same account. Select "No perk, I just want to contribute." Pay for it and done!


How do I update my address?

Please contact us at update@ smart oclock dot com.


Do i have to pay extra shipping cost for more than one Clock?

Outside the US add an extra 5$ for every other clock up to 30$ total for every 10 clocks (at the same shipping address)


Will there be any VAT for EU countries?

Contributors will be responsible for any VAT that arises.


What happens if i have an appointment at 12:07.

Smart O'Clock displays appointments for the nearest quarter hour, you can't see the difference in smaller intervals. so it's going to show it on 12:00.
story_txt:
The Smart O’Clock adds an important thing to your clock, Schedule.Synced Seamlessly from your smartphone calendar.Clocks has been around for centuries, and even today with smartphones and hand watches we still like to have one around. Especially now with the Smart O'Clock added value of seeing your schedule on it.Even if we remember our next appointment, having it marked on the clock gives us a quick notion of the time we have left before it starts. Seeing the gaps between appointments help us plan our actual work time.Smart O’Clock is modernly designed to correspond with the gadgets it syncs with. Body and dials were cautiously designed not to obscure the Clock’s main element which is the schedule markers.Quality materials are used for the Smart O’Clock using steel frame for the body and real glass for the cover.The Wall edition comes in Silver and black. Desktop version is Black.Technology has finally reached the point where Electronic ink is now affordable and Bluetooth 4.0 smart devices can operate on regular AAA batteries so we can make a Clock that shows our daily schedule for a year without a constant outlet plug.Smart O'Clock is a Bluetooth 4.0 device for Low Energy consumption, please check for compatible devices:Compatibility
iPhone 4S and up, the new ipad, ipad mini with iOS 5 and up.
Android Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) phones and tablets, check this page for compatible devices: http://www.gsmarc.com/model-finder/bluetooth-support/bluetooth-4.0/
Calendar is a basic object in both Iphone and Android, this is why any app can access events. The sync app for both Iphone and Android works seamlessly in the background and is updated with any event added to your smartphone calendars including outlook events and Google online calendar. It will simply display them on the Smart O’Clock’s.We need to reach our funding goal In order to buy the following components in reasonable prices:Custom electronic ink display.Bluetooth module.Board for Bluetooth and electronic ink integration.A Costume Clock per our design.Assembly.Packaging.Thank you for your support :)FAQSHIPPING COSTSYou can add your shipping cost on top of the amount of your perk. If you do not add the shipping costs to your payment, we will send you an email post campaign to do this payment. We know that it is not included in the Indiegogo platform. We keep track.When can i choose the color of my watch?Before the end of the campaign, we will simply send you an individual email to ask you for the color of your choice.  Am I suppose to manually add shipping if I'm not from the US?Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. What to do if I forget to pay for shipping?Just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the actual amount you need to pay with the same account. Select "No perk, I just want to contribute." Pay for it and done!How do I update my address?Please contact us at update@ smart oclock dot com.Do i have to pay extra shipping cost for more than one Clock?Outside the US add an extra 5$ for every other clock up to 30$ total for every 10 clocks (at the same shipping address)Will there be any VAT for EU countries?Contributors will be responsible for any VAT that arises.What happens if i have an appointment at 12:07.Smart O'Clock displays appointments for the nearest quarter hour, you can't see the difference in smaller intervals. so it's going to show it on 12:00.

story:
Hello, Indiegogo!

We are delighted to introduce Fotogen: a smart and beautiful lamp for your home.
Think different of the known shapes - it's an endless source of inspiration!  The Fotogen idea is originated from the vintage petroleum lantern, its design being re-thought and reinvented into a simple, minimalistic and sleek lamp. But it is not only about looking good outside, it is also about being smart inside. Fotogen is powerful, smart, adjustable and portable - an evolution of which an old petroleum lamp would be proud. 
We want to change the position of the smart lamps. It will not be a useless toy more or be just a nightlight for bedroom. Fotogen is functional bright lantern for everyday use with some really useful features.




You'll appreciate the unusual yet simple design of the lamp and its aluminum body. Powerful battery enables Fotogen to work without being plugged to the grid for 5 hours. The lamp is a powerful 600 lm 16M colors with an extra set of warm white LEDs. Fotogen is bluetooth controled for your convenience.

One app to rule it all 

Turn on by touch

Adjust hue and intensity

Forget about wires! Take Fotogen with you

Get instantly notified about your messanges

Alarm clock in your lantern

Tech specs



 


Fotogen for work. A bright light source on your desk with possibility to adjust light temperature. You can also switch message indication if needed, not to miss something important when your phone is in silent mode.

Fotogen for home. Fotogen will color your place with every hue existing in nature. Fotogen has two LED types controlled from app. This allows to customize the lighting during the day. Whether you are throwing a party or planning a date Fotogen will be there for you.

The lamp has a timer you can set, and it will wake you up in the morning or will turn on when you come home in the evening.

Fotogen out of home. With itspowerful battery Fotogen can be autonomous for as much as 5 hours. Take it to your picnic in the park and have a convenient light source with you. 





A team of developers got together in late 2014 to create a new design product which would not only be smart but also look good. The team consists of a designer (Lena), an engineer (Alex) and product manager (Dima). Lena has the experience as a designer in several IT and real estate companies. Alex was involved in capital projects management in a big international production company. Dima has founded and is now running own small hospitality company.





As featured in



Risks & Challenges

Manufacturing

In order to produce a quality product one always has to carefully select engineering and manufacturings partners. We have a reliable engineering and manufacturing partner capable of delivering good quality on time. However there is always a risk of delays during manufacturing stage which we are going to mitigate by means of good communication and project management  

Shipping

Depending on destination shipping may take a shorter or longer period of time. We'll make sure to use reliable shipping contractor and provide tracking to our backers.

FAQ

Do you ship worldwide?

We do.

Do you ship the charger type do I use in my country?

Depending on where you live we'll provide you with your type.

How do I choose color and shipping address?

Just before shipping, you will fill out a form that will enable you specify your choice of color and shipping address. For Fotogen COLOR perks you can choose amongst the colors specified in the perk description.

Where can I mail you?

Please use the following mail: art@fotogen.xyz. We'll reply you as soon as we can.
Download press kit

story:
First time to Indiegogo?

It's super easy!
 

1. Decide which Clip Grip Perk you would like then click the pink button that says, "GET THIS PERK."

2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.

3. Receive and fill out the survey confirming order details and any additional add-ons you may want.

4. Await the last handle accessory you'll ever need :)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Clip it & Grip it

 

Why Clip Grip?

 

Clip Grip will fit:

What was originally intended as a silly drinking accessory for beers and jars ended up being an incredibly useful device for people suffering from arthritis, neurological disorders, or old age. Our Facebook inbox was getting blown up from messages like this:  

“My arthritis is KILLING ME! How do I order!?”

GIF Beer Drinking

 

 

 

 

 

Note from the inventor:

On a personal note, my dad had a quite devastating stroke and my Grandma needs a caretaker for simple household tasks. I received several heart-felt health and disability-related comments, and this hit a soft spot with me. Living with a disability is difficult for the patient as well as the family, and I believe that this simple device can help. I did this project to:

  • Improve "holdability" of every container worldwide
  • Scratch my own itch  a universal handle
  • Reduce hand-related pain
  • Help people like Tye improve quality of life

It's awesome and doing this was fun. Thanks for reading.

 You can select any combinations of colors for your rewards. For instance, if you order 8 Clip Grips, you can get 4 black and 4 purple. We'll send you a survey after our campaign is finished asking for your order!

Your Funds will Help!

-Order a large volume of components
-Fund development for future projects
-Increase First Production Run
-Drive Down manufacturing cost

 

Risks and challenges

Clip Grip is successfully prototyped, and we're confident about mass production. Our suppliers have been debriefed on the crowdfunding process. We've worked diligently with our team to validate production capabilities, shipping times, and fulfillment.

Set conservative lead times to account for small hiccups along the way. But as with any project, there are unforeseen circumstances that may occur. In the event there is an error in our production or fulfillment process, we guarantee full transparency to keep you up to date at all times!

Other Ways You Can Help

Clip Grip needs your support! Outside of monetary contributions you can help by:

  • Telling your friends and family about this useful handle
  • Informing your local PT or Hospital about Clip Grip
  • Telling your beer-drinking friend there's a fun new accessory on the market

story:
MEDIA COVERAGE


"(...) can be hung, held by hand, or simply placed on a surface for illumination."


"This adaptive light looks sexy just any place."

"Simplicity with multifunctionality, love everything about it. Flawless." - Reader Comment

(of )
"A Dead Simple Lantern With A Clever Multi-Purpose Design. Spot is basically just two parts: a light and a handle. But what a useful handle it is."



"(...) the perfect solution between practical and an physically attractive flashlight."

 


"It's often the seemingly simplest objects that offer the most versatility."

Also featured on:


SPOT - the light with a sweet spot

SPOT is a multi-purpose light that can be hung, hand-held, or simply placed on a surface. It can function as a torch, desk lamp, ambience light, or wall light - use it however and whenever you like!

SPOT is adaptable to a variety of situations. The elegant aesthetics of the light allows you to place it anywhere in the comfort of your home without fear of it being obtrusive.






SPOT is made of durable polypropylene (PP) material and is splash resistant. This means that you can even use it in the outdoors without fear of moisture damage.



DESIGN CONCEPTION

We were inspired by the simplicity, and functionality of industrial work lights. With SPOT, we retained the mobility of conventional torches and industrial work lights, as well as the dynamic rotational movement of theatrical stage lights. Stripping them down to their essentials and introduced an element of playfulness to it, bringing you a refreshing design of a functional light.


Currently, we offer SPOT in two colours - cool grey and tangerine.





LIGHTING

SPOT runs on a single high-powered 10W LED module for the light source. The benefits of LEDs are aplenty. They are long lasting, energy saving, and do not heat up much over time.

It is powered internally and runs on 6 1.5V AAA batteries for the current prototype. The lack of external wiring eliminates any hassle or mess in mobility and usage. Upon successful funding, we are hoping to refine the design by using rechargeable batteries for better convenience.

To replace the batteries, simply lift the diffuser cap from the case like taking the lid off a container and insert the new batteries.

WHY DOES SPOT NEED TO BE FUNDED?

SPOT currently remains as a prototype although we really believe in its functionality. With your support and sufficient funding, we will be able to complete a first production run and bring this delightful product to your household.

The funds will also greatly help us in refining the design in several ways such as using rechargeable batteries, introducing more colours, and also selecting the best materials to make SPOT a better product to own. 

PERKS

SPECIFICATIONS

Dimensions: 140 x 50 x 260 mm
or                   5.5" x 2" x 10.2"
Weight: 450 grams with batteries
Materials: Shock-absorbent Polypropylene (case and handle), Acrylic (diffuser)
Light source specs: 10W High output LED
Light source brightness: 600 Lumens
Light source temperature: 3000K (cool white)
Battery specs: 1.5V AAA (x6)
Battery life: approximately 8 hours of continuous use

PRODUCTION SCHEDULE

March to late May: Indiegogo campaign
June to August: Product refinement and placing orders
Late August: Begin manufacturing
End November: Shipping of first batch

ORDERING AND SHIPPING

International pledgers are responsible for applicable shipping fees.
Free shipping and delivery in Singapore.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

This is our first crowdfunding campaign and thus we might experience delays in terms of manufacturing completion as well as shipping due to unforeseen circumstances.

We want to deliver only the best to you. As such we ask for your patience and understanding as there may be unforseen delays while we source for only the finest quality of materials and manufacturers.

However rest assured that the team is under close guidance of experienced industry professionals and we will definitely be keeping you updated with our progress via this campaign page, our facebook page (http://www.facebook.com/pages/Spot/361327487313235) or emails if required.

FAQ

How does the light work?

SPOT's on/off button is integrated into one of the two hinges joining the body and the handle. The button is YELLOW to distinct itself from the other hinge. 


What does the light operate on?

Currently, SPOT runs on 6 1.5V AAA batteries. We understand that this may seem like a hassle but we assure you that upon sufficient funding, we will definitely be sourcing for rechargeable batteries or alternative battery types for greater user convenience.


How do I replace the batteries?

The batteries are hidden in SPOT's body itself. To replace, simply lift the lid off the case and insert new batteries.


Will the diffuser lid fall off the casing easily?

No, rest assured that the lid fits onto the casing snugly and is not loose.


How long will the batteries last for?

With continuous usage, the batteries will power SPOT for up to about 8 hours.


What is the lifespan of the LED?

LEDs are created to last for a reasonably long time. We only use high quality LEDs in SPOT which are expected to last at least 50,000 hours. If you left it on all day everyday it would last about 5 and a half years.


Why do you have only 2 colours?

We currently only have 2 colours but depending on the reception of our campaign we will surely consider setting a stretch goal so that we can bring more colours to SPOT.

I have ordered either a Family, Distributor, or EPIC distributor pack. How do I specify the ratio of my prefered colours?

Firstly, thank you for your amazing support! Should our campaign be successful, we will be personally emailing you so that you can specify your preferred colour preferences (e.g. 2 cool greys and 3 tangerines for a family pack).

How much do I pay for shipping?

If you are ordering from Singapore, shipping and delivery is free or charge.

For International Orders, please refer to the list show in our image gallery.

(http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/spot-the-light-with-a-sweet-spot/x/2548253?c=gallery)


*PLEASE NOTE that all prices are in SGD (Singapore Dollars)

However if your country is not reflected in the list, please click on the following link (http://www.speedpost.com.sg/index.php?quickTool...) and use the 'Price Calculator' option to check on the shipping rates to your country (if your country is not reflected in that list of countries given, we regret to inform you that we will not be able to deliver our product to your country).

story:
Pre-Order Now


​


​​


Hi! I’m Cooper. That’s me below. It may look like I'm hauling a sack of potatoes but, I'm not. I'm hauling my laundry. I live in San Francisco where in-unit laundry machines are as rare as warm summer days. I'd typically put off laundry as long as possible until, every few weeks, I'd sling that bag over my shoulders and huff it to the laundromat. The bag was huge, a major plus, but there was no easy way to carry it. One day, while carrying 30 pounds of laundry, my arms mutinied and pushed me over the edge. I needed a better laundry bag.


​


Turns out, I'm not the only one. From city dwellers to college students, people have succumbed to carrying laundry in trash bags, hampers, and flimsy sacks for years. Why? Because there isn’t a good option on the market. That's why I'm on an epic journey to end the laundry struggle by making a bag that is durable, practical, and as stylish as the clothes it carries. Join me and other laundry pioneers as we enter brighter days. We've spent too many years hauling laundry like fools.


​


After months in the laundry lab, I decided a backpack design makes the most sense. Down the stairs, down the block, or back to Mom's house, put the weight on your back and be on your way. Laundry backpacks exist, but the selection is not impressive. Taking inspiration from trend-setting backpack and luggage brands, the first premium laundry backpack was born. Meet The ChipmunkBag!

​



We've been selling ChipmunkBags for the past year. Over this time, we've gathered feedback from our laundry-pioneering customers on how to improve the product. Below are design enhancements you'll find in the newest CMB (clockwise from top left).

  • Inner pocket stitched to reinforced fabric - perfect for keys, cell phone, dryer sheets, quarters, and half-dollars.
  • Removable inner divider to separate your laundry - zip it in if needed, wear it as a scarf if not.
  • Wider, softer, thicker backpack straps - we added additional foam padding to the sleek, seatbelt webbing we've always used. Spiderman approved. 
  • Bartack stitch on all high-load areas - This includes all strap and handle attachments. This baby won't let you down.


Laundry pioneers want the ChipmunkBag to be big. That's why we're making these guys 40 inches tall with a carrying capacity of 115 liters. It's a tank. But, with the front metal clasp and cylindrical shape the bag never becomes unwieldy. 

Admittedly, the ChipmunkBag is large and probably not suitable for every occasion. That's why we're rolling out The Mini ChipmunkBag with a capacity of up to 55 liters, about half the size of its big brother. 





Stuck on size? Here's what I'd recommend. If you need something for multiple loads of laundry: sheets, towels, clothes, etc, go with the large CMB. If you need a bag for smaller loads, or just a great bag to get you to the beach or mountains, go with the The Mini CMB.


clockwise from left: CMB Mini (orange) & CMB (blue), CMB Mini, large CMBs with strap padding









We completed our Kickstarter campaign on July 22nd and raised over 300% of our funding goal. Due to the success of our campaign, we're continuing pre-orders on Indiegogo InDemand. Manufacturing is scheduled for early August and Kickstarter rewards are scheduled to ship in October. Indiegogo orders will ship just after Kickstarter orders. 
  

I look forward to getting a ChipmunkBag in your hands and ending the laundry transportation struggle together, once and for all. Thank you so much for your support!

Cooper Golding | ChipmunkBags Founder
