​Turns out, I'm not the only one. From city dwellers to college students, people have succumbed to carrying laundry in trash bags, hampers, and flimsy sacks for years. Why? Because there isn’t a good option on the market. That's why I'm on an epic journey to end the laundry struggle by making a bag that is durable, practical, and as stylish as the clothes it carries. Join me and other laundry pioneers as we enter brighter days. We've spent too many years hauling laundry like fools.​After months in the laundry lab, I decided a backpack design makes the most sense. Down the stairs, down the block, or back to Mom's house, put the weight on your back and be on your way. Laundry backpacks exist, but the selection is not impressive. Taking inspiration from trend-setting backpack and luggage brands, the first premium laundry backpack was born. Meet The ChipmunkBag!​We've been selling ChipmunkBags for the past year. Over this time, we've gathered feedback from our laundry-pioneering customers on how to improve the product. Below are design enhancements you'll find in the newest CMB (clockwise from top left).

Inner pocket stitched to reinforced fabric - perfect for keys, cell phone, dryer sheets, quarters, and half-dollars.

Removable inner divider to separate your laundry - zip it in if needed, wear it as a scarf if not.

Wider, softer, thicker backpack straps - we added additional foam padding to the sleek, seatbelt webbing we've always used. Spiderman approved. 

Bartack stitch on all high-load areas - This includes all strap and handle attachments. This baby won't let you down.
Laundry pioneers want the ChipmunkBag to be big. That's why we're making these guys 40 inches tall with a carrying capacity of 115 liters. It's a tank. But, with the front metal clasp and cylindrical shape the bag never becomes unwieldy. Admittedly, the ChipmunkBag is large and probably not suitable for every occasion. That's why we're rolling out The Mini ChipmunkBag with a capacity of up to 55 liters, about half the size of its big brother. 





Stuck on size? Here's what I'd recommend. If you need something for multiple loads of laundry: sheets, towels, clothes, etc, go with the large CMB. If you need a bag for smaller loads, or just a great bag to get you to the beach or mountains, go with the The Mini CMB.


clockwise from left: CMB Mini (orange) & CMB (blue), CMB Mini, large CMBs with strap padding













We completed our Kickstarter campaign on July 22nd and raised over 300% of our funding goal. Due to the success of our campaign, we're continuing pre-orders on Indiegogo InDemand. Manufacturing is scheduled for early August and Kickstarter rewards are scheduled to ship in October. Indiegogo orders will ship just after Kickstarter orders.   
I look forward to getting a ChipmunkBag in your hands and ending the laundry transportation struggle together, once and for all. Thank you so much for your support!
Cooper Golding | ChipmunkBags Founder

story:
INTRODUCTION.

We are a small group of electronics enthusiasts with a lot of experience in automatic control devices and sensors.

In the old days when developing electronics was always possible to find though hole alternatives for nearly all components, now the components are getting smaller and more difficult to solder by hand. All new electronic components are designed to be soldered with solder paste in automatic ovens. The problem is that professional ovens are quite expensive and not thought to be used at home.

So we decided to develop an alternative that could be used at home for small developers or hobbyists. The idea is to transform a simple toaster oven (easy to find for 35$) into a reflow oven.

See our video for a simple explanation here.

HOW IT WORKS.

Domestic toaster ovens are quite simple machines, a resistance or an infrared lamp is connected to the mains and heats up the interior of the oven, a simple mechanical thermostat will cut supply when the target temperature is reached. The problem is that mechanical thermostats can not regulate temperature and heating ramps so the control is not good enough for good solder joints.

The ideal temperature curve for soldering electronic components would be something like this.


Our controller monitors the temperature of the oven with a external temperature sensor and regulate the temperature by switching supply several times per second in order to achieve a really accurate temperature regulation. To switch the supply it is necessary to install a Solid State Relay which will be controlled by our controller.

The schematic of the connection can be seen below:

The regulation works using PWM regulation so it changes the length of pulses to the supply depending on the actual state of the temperature. For calculating the correct PWM output the controller uses a  PID  (Proportional, Integral, Derivative) loop.

The whole setup and control of the device is made with a computer connected to the controller by a standard USB cable. This connection will allow us to supervise the soldering status and to change soldering parameters, it will also generate a file with all the temperature measurements made during each soldering.

If you want to get more information you can visit our webpage and download manuals or the windows controller software Project webpage.

WHY ARE WE SETTING UP THIS PROJECT?.

Well, the obvious reason was to be able to design pcbs with surface mount components and being able to solder them easily afterwards. Once our first controller was done and we were happy with the result we asked our selves, why don't we simplify the design to make something economic and easy to use for everyone?, and this is how we develop this controller.

Now to manufacture it at a reasonable price we need to buy some of the components and the pcbs in big quantities to reduce the price. We have set the limits of the quantities in the perks to allow it.

WHAT IS INCLUDED AND WHAT IS NOT INCLUDED IN THE PERKS.

If you take a look to the perks you will see that there are two main differences between them. There are perks that include the controller card, the sensor (standard k type thermocouple) and the plastic box and others that only have the controller card. This is because many electronics enthusiasts have already this K-type thermocouples at home so it is not necessary to supply them with more.
 
The box is optional as it is not needed normally as many of you will probably install the controller card inside the oven. The box is supplied without holes so if you order it you will have to make the holes yourselves, sorry but we don't have a laser cutter and it will take too much time to drill the holes for all of you.

One component we don't supply is the solid state relay, this is because it is really easy to find and because we don't know the power of your oven and the mains voltage in your country. It would be difficult to get a good price for you in this component if we supply a different SSR in every shipment.


Anyway, you can find SSRs easily in Farnell, Conrad, RScomponents, Mouser, Digikey or even in ebay. You will have to look for a relay with a control voltage of  5Vdc and able to handle your oven power.

Same thing for thermocouples if you what to procure them yourself it is easy in your electronics shop, Farnell, Conrad, Digikey, RScomponents, Mouser or ebay. The only necessary thing is that the have to be of the k-type and the cable needs to be able to stand soldering temperature (max 270ºC).

ACTUAL STATUS OF THE PROJECT.
The controller is fully functional, the computer program and the controller firmware are finished and working. In fact all our new designs are now manufactured using it. The PCB is finished and we have already pretested the first batch of 4 units with no issues.

We are constantly making improvements in the PC software, we will update them in the downloads section of our website. Please send us an email for any feature/improvement you would like to see.

Also if you want to change something we can supply you with the source code, feel free to make improvements, all the PC program is in Visual Basic.NET. Please keep us informed on the improvements so we can share them with everyone.

All we need is you to ask for your controller so we can start to mass manufacture them.

SHIPPING COSTS
Shipping costs are not included in the perks prices as they will depend on your location.
The cost will always be lower than 10 euros for Europe and lower than 16 euros for other countries.

story:
Hi! thanks for visiting my campaign!

Cue is a simple alarm clock that will chime every hour to help you stay conscious of the way time goes by. With a free smartphone app, you can also customize the chime intervals, set recurring alarms, and reminders. 




Features

Smart: By plugging Cue to your smartphone, you can customize the chime intervals and also set as many alarms as you need. The Cue app will be available for iOS and Android devices. 

Unobtrusive: Cue has a minimal design that blends in any workspace (or any space, really). The soft cuckoo will remind you to focus and stay aware without disturbing your atmosphere. 


Uplifting: Cue will give you a reminder in such a gentle and delightful way it will make you smile.

Light-sensitive: An integrated light sensor makes sure Cue will not disturb you in the middle of the night.

Hand-made: Cue will be handcrafted from beautiful birch wood. 


Benefits 

Productivity: With just a little reminder once every hour, you can make a quick check in with yourself that can help you move forward if you are getting stuck or distracted. Cue is like a friend who is always next to you, constantly reminding you to keep going. 

Healthy habits: One of the biggest problems I used to have before Cue, was that I could be sitting down for five hours straight without even moving! I learned that doing this has terrible health consequences; so an hourly reminder to get up, move around for a few minutes and come back, can make a huge difference for your life quality in the long term. 

Cue Clock is available in 5 colors: natural, yellow, red, blue, and black


The Story

Cue started a few months ago as a personal project. I created my own version of a cuckoo clock to have something that would help me stay aware of the passage of time. And it worked! It helped me remain conscious during the day, and made me realize when I'd lose focus. Sometimes, a little nudge is all you need to bring you back on track.


This inspired me to take the idea to the next level and turn it into a real product. So I teamed up with my friends Carlos and Hugo, and together we developed Cue! I truly believe Cue can make a difference in the way people work and live.

Perks

The funds raised will allow us to buy the materials and electronic components needed to build the Cues. 

You can pre-order a Cue and at the same time you will be helping us make this project a reality! 

Cue Alarm includes a cable to connect to your smartphone, and free access to the Cue app.

Cue Clock includes a cable to connect to your smartphone, free access to the Cue app, and you get to chose the color of the clock hands!


We will only be able to collect the funds and build the Cues if we reach our goal, so please help us spread the word!

Thank you!

story:
Spread Mate

Hi my name is Amanda Tyrrell, I am a stay at home Mum, whilst studying.I was in the kitchen one day and my margarine was full of crumbs and vegemite, it looked awful, and I hated it so much. I figured I couldnt be the only one, and after some research, I found I wasnt. It is a pet hate for many people out there, so I went to see a designer (Jason@Invention Steps) who help me out with a solution, and this is what we come up with. I have a prototype, but now I need to get it out there, I need to buy the equipment, make a few adjustments, have some extra designs done, and create the website We have put so much into this and really want it to succeed.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We need $80,000 to do this properly.to make the design 100% right and to do some extra designs. Get some more prototypes to be able to market the product better, and to buy the machinery to make the product.

The Impact

Your contribution will make such a huge difference to the success of our product, it will mean we can really get it off the ground and running

Our product can be a vaulable assett to anyone around the world, it can be used for any type of spread, whether it be handmade or taken out of another container.

It is a very costly exercise to bring a product to market,and takes alot of time to save the funds, but I am determined  to succeed.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please make some noise about Spread Mate to help us make it a huge success. You can use the Indiegogo share tools or just tell your friends.

And that’s all there is to it.

We really appreciate all the support and help, Thankyou. Amanda & Glen

story:
If you have tried using desk organizers , you have probably felt our frustration . Many aren’t designed to satisfy your needs , and are generally made as a cheap desk accessory .

   That's why we made the Smart Organizer !

   We wanted to set a new bar for quality and make something that looks really good on your desk.

   So we’ve spent the last months obsessing over this project to get the perfect balance between design and functionality .

   Through endless tinkering with different types of materials and dimensions we’ve been able to distill what we believe a modern desk organizer should be.

   The Smart Organizer is beautifully designed  from hard wood and it comes with gorgeous wallet/book support ,  pen organizer and a piece of leather or fabric (to keep your stuff) .

 

 

 

 

 

   Features  :

 

  • is neither too large,  nor too small
  • is neither too broad  nor too narrow
  • is made from high quality hard wood
  • let’s you keep all your pens tougether
  • adapts to the user, not the user having to adapt to it
  • is minimally designed
  • will never wear out
  • the piece of fabric/leather is designed for you to be able to put your sunglasses,phone or whatever you want , without scratching it
  • isn't  just another useless desk organizer
  • isn't limited to only one design

   Smart Organizer does all these things and still has a design that is minimal and look’s  amazing!

 

  

  

 

 

  Specifications :

 

   WOOD

  • Size:  11.8 x 3.93 x 0.60 inches / 30 x 10 x 1.50 cm
  • Weight:  300 grams

 

   WALLET SUPPORT / BOOKS SUPPORT

  • Material : plexiglass
  • Colours : black , white

 

 

  

 

 

 

   WHERE THE FUNDING GOES 

 

   Products take a lot of time and money to develop and launch. Here are some areas where the pledge money helps to make the product a reality :

 

  • Tooling & Development. Our tooling and development will be approximately $10,000 based on the current designs.

 

  • Minimum Order Quanities (MOQs). Wood factories , leather factories and fabric factories requires MOQs  . This is a huge risk for a startup.

 

  • Professional Website . The website is very important , so we need to find a webdesigner to make one that looks great .

 

   With your help, we are hoping to surpass those obstacles and get the Smart Organizer into your hands as soon as we reach our goal .

story:
Our Story….

Robert Potorti owned a small restoration company in southern Indiana. His mother lived in Pennsylvania (near Philadelphia), and she wanted a small heater for her living room. Robert wanted to send her a new combination portable air conditioner-heat pump.  Just so there would be no confusion, he ordered two units (exactly the same make and model); there would be one for his office and one for his mother’s living room. If she had questions, he would be able to answer them remotely from Indiana.

When he used the machine, he was surprised to find out that a substantial amount of condensate water was generated, even in the heat pump mode; worse yet, the water came out at the bottom of the machine (about an inch and a third higher than the floor). He didn’t want his 90 year old mother bending down on the floor with a pie pan, and trying to carry water that would dump rather easily to the kitchen sink. So he went on line to buy something that would solve the problem, but as much as he looked, there was nothing available anywhere.

How could it be that no one made such a device? Why would they have a remote control for the unit, but yet no automatic way of emptying the condensate water? It needed rethinking.

Water would accumulate in the summer and the winter. Even though there is an evaporative system when in the air conditioner mode, water can still accumulate when you least expect it, making the machine somewhat undependable.

It was suggested (by Andrew Selter, Robert’s Lead Manager for the first business) to bring the advances that were created to the marketplace. Robert designed a pumping system that went through numerous changes and testing until production was ready to start. At the same time testing was being done on a kit that would insulate the air exit hose and window opening; it had to insulate well and have an appearance that would be acceptable in someone’s living room. It also had to be as user friendly as possible. Most of all, it could not be prohibitively costly. These were difficult tasks as no company to date had been able to accomplish these objectives.

Surveys showed that people were too often upset at the condensate issue as well as their machine’s lack of ability to adequately cool their living space. Increasing efficiency is one path to better performance as well as savings in electric (mostly during peak demand times).   

To date a patent is pending that will allow a pump system to keep water from freezing in the line during winter months as well as insulating the hose and window in a way that looks acceptable and is as user friendly as possible, yet can work with the vast majority of brands and window sizes (this along with other technical advances are included in the patent application).

story:
Summary

Whirly-Go-Round is a solution for parents of kids who want options for physical play that are more fun than staring at a screen and so well-made, can still be fun for another generation. Made of solid, hand-crafted bamboo, kids love the feeling of control they get from mastering the physical gyrations that propel them around for as long and fast as they want.

Mission: Funomenal & Sustainable Fun!

  • Funomenal Fun exceeds expectations, creating a sense of wow and awe.
  • Sustainable Fun lasts for years, the thrill never fades.

We believe, when able to play to their hearts' content, children can better discover their God-given gifts.

Born of family passion

I'm Chuck Knerr, founder of Spud 'N Rich. I come from a family of toymakers. I named the company in honor of my dad, Rich Knerr, and Spud Melin, they're my heroes! Together they created some of America's most iconic toys. Their little company was a gnat compared to the elephants of Mattel and Hasbro. But a lot of today's grandparents' most cherished memories of childhood involve Hula Hoop, Frisbee or Super Ball. Today's parents likely remember Slip 'N Slide, Trac-Ball or Silly String. My childhood was spent testing toys. The ones that worked and the countless ones that didn't.

Chuck Knerr, Selling Slip 'N Slides, Water Wiggle Commercial, and Testing Super Stuff

My childhood was fun! Not just because of the toys but my Dad's dedication to making everything fun, especially work. My passion for doing this is from dad's inspiration, and the joy it gives me to see kids having big fun, spinning on a Whirly-Go-Round. My hope is for kids to have the kind of fun I was blessed with growing up. I want every child to have their own "good old days" to fondly remember.

Shooting a commercial for Giant Monster Bubble (note the Knutty Knotter, far left)

A thrill I never forgot

The thrill I had spinning on a contraption my Dad brought home when I was 6, is still with me decades later.  It was like a one-person Merry-Go-Round. While just sitting and holding on, if I leaned back, it rotated! And I quickly learned that if I leaned forward at just the right time, it would not only continue to rotate, but pick up speed. I could spin as long and as fast as I wanted.   Funomenal!

The original "contrapation"  I tested when I was 6.

Dad's challenge to me

It was the most fun product they never made.  When Dad was in his seventies, I asked him why? He said there were just too many problems they couldn't solve. I protested, they should have kept trying and shared my memories of how much fun it was. He challenged me to solve those problems and I bet him I could. That was just like both Spud and Dad- can do!

It goes back to how they started in my grandmother's garage, making hardwood slingshots and selling them by mail order. They pulled themselves up by their own slingshot straps!

Well, Dad took that bet and I'm just sorry it's taken me this long because he and Spud aren't around to enjoy it.

Eurkea! Bamboo!

I got serious last year, designing prototypes. I started with wood, then shifted to metal. During Spud and Rich's era, plastic was the future. Today, it's just clutter and ends up in the next garage sale or a landfill. But what was in my heart was to create a toy that would last, an heirloom toy. That's when I discovered bamboo. Bamboo changed everything. It has the strength and durability of steel in gorgeous solid pieces that can be invisibly joined into a beautiful piece of modern-art. Bamboo allowed me to create a product that performs better, looks beautiful in any room and can last long enough to hand down to your children's children.

Testing, testing

Every idea Spud and Rich created, my sisters and I and the Melin girls "tested" long before they came to market as a product. So I took the first Whirly-Go-Round next-door to the neighbor girls. It worked! Then I took several prototypes to the Wednesday night children's group at church. One by one, those kids hopped on and started to spin. They lined up and took turns, they invented competitions. Before I knew it, their parents were at the door , it was already time to go.  Time really does fly when you're having fun!  

 

Now, it's up to you

There's one last hurdle to overcome. Will parents and grandparents buy Whirly-Go-Round? When Dad and Spud started in the garage, their answer came when the first mail orders showed up in their post office box. Our answer will come from you; parents and grandparents backing our project on IndieGoGo. 

Please: 

Back this project and banish boredom from your home.

Back this project and give your kids Funomenal Fun to create lasting memories and make these, their very own good-old-days.

Back this project and give yourselves a break from the clutter of plastic toys with one simple, durable toy they'll enjoy for years.

Back this project and give yourselves the gift of beautiful bamboo to grace your home with an intriguing piece of modern art, that is, if the kids ever leave it alone.

Please Pass the Word

Even if you don't have kids or grandkids of Whiry-Go-Round age, it's likely that the kid in you looks at this and wonders if they make one for adults? Sadly, no. But please help spread the fun!

Please use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign with friends and family!

 

 

Not Your Grandma's Sit 'N Spin!

A lot of parents and grandparents fondly recall Playskool's Sit 'N Spin. What makes Whirly-Go-Round, go around is entirely different, it's faster, more fun and a lot more satisfying for kids to master. 

Heirloom Toy

From the outset, I wanted to make a toy that could last long enough to be handed down to your children's children. Too many toys are cheaply made, the fun wears off and they clutter the house before ending up in a landfill. I designed and constructed Whirly-Go-Round like I was making it for my own family to pass down for generations. I settled on bamboo as the primary material. It's the hardest known wood and the most durable. And what a blessing that's it's so beautiful too!

To be strong, durable and sustainable Whirly-Go-Round has to be made of solid wood. But instead of killing old-growth trees, we use bamboo, which is actually a type of grass that regrows incredibly fast and can be fashioned into the hardest known wood. It's 2 to 3 times harder than oak! Bamboo is the most sustainable wood source. Bamboo is an ideal material for an heirloom toy.  Your Whirly-Go-Round can last and provide fun for a very long time.

These are the First Edition of Whirly-Go-Round, signified by a numbered metal plate. This campaign is the only time these first editions will be offered.

Beautiful in Any Room!

Physics Fun01

What makes it go?! It's physics. And it's a great way to introduce them to physical sciences. There's mass, center of gravity, acceleration, gravitational potential energy, and all sorts of aspects they don't care about yet. They just know they want to go! The sense of movement and their bodily adjustments to those movements produce decreases or increases in their acceleration. On the fly, their responses and rapid decision-making constantly improve as they get the "feel" of it. Spinning is not only fun, but gives them a real sense of achievement and control over themselves and their environment. But they only know it's Fun!

 

The Impact

Whirly-Go-Round represents a paradigm shift in children's play. You will be demonstrating to your child less really is more. Children need more fun, but it doesn't mean they need more and more toys. Fewer toys that provide more fun and last longer deliver more value.

Whirly-Go-Round is a Change for the Better 

  • From the clutter of plastic toys that kids soon tire of and end up in landfills.
  • From the need to pick up the toys before company arrives.
  • From passive, electronic entertainment.
  • Toward physically active and mentally stimulating fun.
 

Who took the "play" out of playtime?

After sitting most of the day in school, Couch time/screen time is a growing epidemic. Children spend as much as 40 hours a week glued to digital devices that offer to bring excitement & entertainment to their lives, but often leave them inactive and disengaged with life around them. Content providers have developed savvy algorithms for attracting young eyeballs and feeding children content they like to see; along with advertising.

Active, Physical Fun

Whirly-Go-Round requires a child to actively engage body and mind to operate. It's fascinating to watch them as work out how to make it go. You can almost see the signals being sent between the inner-ears, brains and bodies,  feeling the movement and adjusting their center of mass to make it go. The thrill sparks their imaginations. Are they flying? Racing? Going to the moon?

Spinning

There is plenty of science behind the positive developmental benefits of spinning for children. And they will get DIZZY. Most children like that feeling (but not adults). That has to do with the fact their their brains are developing and spinning engages both sides of the brain with their bodies and inner-ears helping to enhance their vestibular system, which increases physical coordination, balance, ability to focus, to listen and all sorts of things that can help them develop.

What We Need & What You Get

You will receive a first-edition Whirly-Go-Round

• Solid. hand-crafted bamboo Whirly-Go-Round with Metal First Edition Plate

• Built to last.
• Rubber feet to protect floors and prevent slipping on carpet.
• Recommended for children ages 4-12 years
• Not recommended for adults.

Good thing shipping is included because these beauties weigh 35 POUNDS EACH! (Truly built to last!) Our Whirly-Go-Round will arrive assembled so there is nothing to do but unbox it and play! 

There is a minimum order quantity for the bamboo we need to deliver Whirly-Go-Round. We have calculated our pricing to enable us to deliver the minimum quantity. 

Each Whirly-Go-Round is made of solid bamboo pieces. Bamboo is the hardest wood on earth and as such, is very dense. That makes it strong and durable but also heavy. We use steel hardware to assemble it with a heavy-duty steel swivel bearing designed for adults.

We're planning on delivering your Whirly-Go-Round in October and November, well in time for Christmas. 

We've limited the number of rewards for good reasons. As mentioned, we want to do everything possible to meet delivery in time for Christmas. At the same time, Whirly-Go-Round is hand-crafted and assembled here in Texas. We want to devote the time and careful attention to deliver with the best possible quality. You've heard the terms, "military-grade," "medical-grade," and the like? To us, "child-grade" deserves the highest level of care and diligence.

 

Timeline

    Risks & Challenges

    Over the past year we have designed and redesigned about 17 different versions. This try, try again philosophy means we've taken most of the risk on ourselves before bringing it to you for backing. The result; we have successfully produced nine prototypes. This followed a rigorous testing process with children that allowed us to identify further design and performance improvements that we fine-tuned and included in your Whirly-Go-Round.

    We have worked diligently to ready this product for IndieGoGo and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to handle them:

    BAMBOO:  We have lined up at least three suppliers who have been able to produce high quality bamboo to our specifications and whose samples we have used and approved. These suppliers have confirmed they are ready to produce and any one of them can supply the amounts we need. We can forsee some risk the Covid virus might return as an issue in China. In the event it does, it would not prevent delivery of orders but could delay them.

    Every other component is available in the U.S. Our fabrication, assembly and shipping will all be accomplished in house. That means all those steps are under our control so there is little to no risk of delay on these.

    FULFILLMENT: In general, stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, customs clearance or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We are using the United States Postal Service to bring Whirly-Go-Round to your door.. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.

    We have worked hard to prevent any delays in delivering Whirly-Go-Round. We feel our delivery goal is attainable because:

    • We have sourced multiple suppliers and successfully tested their samples for quality and suitability. We have tested samples from four capable suppliers.
    • There is no shortage of bamboo or hardware.

     

    Please Pass the Word

    Even if you don't have kids or grandkids of Whiry-Go-Round age, it's likely that the kid in you looks at this and wonders if they make one for adults? Sorry, no. But please help spread the fun!

    Please use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign with friends and family!

story:
Did you know that most people hang at least 15 pictures on their walls?

And most people take 5-10 minutes to hang a single picture!

That’s about 2.5 hours you can spend on doing something you love!

For years, these problems have continued without a revolutionary solution.

Until now!

In Only 2 Steps

Step 1: Attach Levitate Hanger set to the back of your picture.

Step 2: Push your picture onto the wall.

Step 3: (optional): Rotate as needed. Or just for fun ;)

 

We asked people if they hang pictures on their walls. Obviously, some said yes and some said no.

Levitate: Why not?

The People: Honestly? Pure laziness.

Can you guess what we replied with?

Levitate: Perfect!

One of the main reasons people are not hanging pictures on their walls is laziness.  It's not something to be ashamed of if you are too lazy to hang you pictures.  We get it.  We have so many other priorities in life, so we say "we'll hang these pictures some other time", but we never do.

Being lazy about hanging pictures is not because we are lazy people, it's because of what it takes to hang them: taking measurements, finding our tool kits, drilling/hammering into the wall, leveling, needing the help of others, cleaning afterwards etc.

Introducing Levitate Hanger!

Now, you can finally hang your pictures in 10 seconds or less!

With Levitate Hanger you follow only two steps: attaching one part of the hanger on the picture and attaching the other part of the hanger on the wall. A third step is optional - rotate as needed.

No more measuring, using tools, finding help, leveling or cleaning.

One of the things you can't do with other picture hangers is hang other stuff, like tablets, phones, small cameras, decorative plates etc.

Levitate Hanger is today's quickest and most versatile solution for hanging your pictures. Thanks to Levitate Hanger, you can hang pictures in just 10 seconds AND have it perfectly leveled on your wall. 

No more nails, picture wire, measuring and pencil marks. You can even easily rotate between portrait and landscape orientations.

Levitate Hanger is mess-free and reusable. If you ever want to move or take down a picture, pull the adhesives downwards to release the hanger from the wall. It will not damage your wall or the hanger and you'll be able to reuse Levitate Hanger over and over.

Its unique design makes easy to use and enables you to hang more than pictures. Hang your tablets, smart phones, smart home devices, etc. too.

Back our project now to help us revolutionize how we hang pictures, and experience first-hand how Levitate Hanger can make this part of your life much easier and more creative.

We designed Levitate Hanger to solve what most picture hangers lack.  This made Levitate Hanger the most versatile hanger out there.

 1. Hang any picture, tablet or phone in 10 seconds or less

2. Rotating 360 degrees and stops at any desired angle

Levitate Hanger is the only picture hanger out there that lets you rotate your pictures 360 degrees.  What is it good for? Tilting your picture left or right, post hanging, is important for not needing to use any leveling tools.  We could have stopped there, but we didn't want to limit YOUR creativity.  What if you have art works that can hang horizontally and vertically?  Heck, what if you have abstract images that can be presented upside down, downside up, left side right etc?

Creativity is one of the most important traits we have, and we at Levitate Hanger definitely don't want to limit that.

3. Change pictures without replacing all hangers

If you ever used other picture hanger systems, you probably know, in order to put up a different size picture you had to replace the hanger on the wall or replace the hanging system if they are both on the wall and on the picture.  Other than making you waste precious time and money it also added trash to our environment.

With Levitate Hanger you can change pictures to any size you want.  Replacement is done in matter of seconds, and you create far less trash than before!

4. One size fits all

We design for the future. After this campaign we're planning on manufacturing different sizes of Levitate Hangers.  With that in mind, we don't want you to waste money on a whole new system and create more waste.  Instead, you'll be able to purchase different sizes of the Slider, while using the same holder.

Why different sizes of the Slider? If you want to hang smaller things like lightweight pictures, phones.  It will save you money and help our planet stay cleaner.

5. Hangs more than only pictures

Remember creativity?  Why hang only pictures Levitate Hanger allows you to hang almost anything with a flat surface?

With Levitate Hanger, you can hang your tablet and set it free.  We know tablets are very powerful when they are in different orientation.  The ability to rotate your tablet 360 degrees lets your tablet unleash its real purpose.

Why stop at tablets? Hang your smart phone too.  Hang it in your car, on the kitchen cabinet, on the wall near your bed, your screen's mount, your refrigerator, your desk, your mirror, your car's window.  Wherever you want!

6. Leaves damage-free walls

Another reason Levitate Hanger was created is to leave your walls free of damage.  Drilling and hammering into your walls ruins and weakens them and if you do that a lot, you'll get to a point where you have no more space to put nails and screws in. Besides, "Swiss cheese walls" are not fun to look at and they are not fun to fix when the time comes.

This feature eliminates risks of hitting wiring, pipes etc and there's no need to locate a wall stud.  These are common problems when using nails and hooks. 

7. Reusable (because we love this planet!)

When created Levitate Hanger decided we don't want anyone to ever through it away and make unnecessary trash.  Making it a reusable hanger was the ultimate solution.  If one day you don't want/need to use it anymore, you can just hand it out or sell it.

If you wish to move your picture from one side of the wall to another, there's no need to throw it away and purchase a new Levitate Hanger.  You simply replace the adhesives, attach the Slider on the picture and the Holder on the wall. Done!

8. Can hold up to 20lbs

Size doesn't matter. Weight does. Your pictures, tablets etc can be as large as they can get, but if they weigh 20lbs or less you can hang them with Levitate Hanger.

9. Pictures are "floating"/"levitating"

rather than flush on the wall or with an angle.  This gives room for some extra creativity when it comes to interior design.  More on that in the near future.

By making Levitate Hanger rotate 360 degrees we eliminate the need for leveling before and/or after you hang the picture and by making Levitate Hanger hold up to 20lbs without any nails, screws etc we eliminate all measuring.  You simply push the picture onto your desired spot on the wall.  No need to measure distance from the floor, ceiling, sides etc.  

Should you really use it? We'll let you to decide if you want to hang your pictures (or tablets) with little to no effort. 

Why Was Levitate Hanger Born?

As a landscape and fine art photographer I print many of the photographs I capture and usually have them framed or mounted on acrylic, metal, foam board etc and when it's time to hang those photos on the wall I procrastinate. A lot!

I knew I needed to get my tool kit that included tape measure, level, hammer, nails, hooks, wires, screws and anchors.  Not to mention the cleaning that had to come after.  To ditch the tool kit I looked for other solutions.  The solutions I found were OK, but OK is not good enough!  I was able to hang some photos with adhesives only, but I had to have someone tell me if the picture is straight while I was slowly pushing it on the wall because once it was up I couldn't make any adjustments.

If I didn't have any help I had to balance a level on the picture while slowly pushing it on the wall.  Sometimes it fell, sometimes it didn't.  One thing is for sure. It was ANNOYING!

As per hooks and nails, I had to measure the distance between the wire, the picture and the wall.  After finally hanging it, the picture was at an angle, sticking out of the wall at the top.  Sometimes the hook/nail was visible above the picture which is not such a beautiful sight.

There had to be something better!  Well... there wasn't.

Since I come from the design world I started sketching up potential solutions.  Suddenly it came to me, the simplest thing no one thought about (for some strange reason).  Make it tilt AFTER I hang the picture.  Easier said than done.  

Everything in the design had to work in perfect harmony.  The shape, the functionality, the size.  Everything.  After a few good designs that already worked (theoretically) I got the final design I was happy with and sent it to my brother so he could model it in a 3D software and print a prototype.

Guess what? It was working better than I expected.  Hence the reason you're reading about this kickstarter campaign.

FEATURED ON

How to Back Levitate Hanger?

So now that you know how simple it is, to hang your pictures, tablets and phones, are you ready to make it happen and bring Levitate Hanger to your home?

We've put together a series of rewards for you to choose from.  Each reward has its pledge price so all you have to do is choose the one you most desire.  Even purchasing a single hanger helps us get closer to our goal and make Levitate Hanger available in stores near you. 

Follow the simple steps below:

Step 1 - Choose Your Reward:

For $10, you'll receive 1 Levitate Hanger.  ($2 off MSRP)

For $45, you'll receive 5 Levitate Hangers. ($15 off MSRP)

For $50, you'll receive 10 smallLevitate Hangers - holds up to 2 lbs- ($20 off MSRP)

For $75, you'll receive 10 Levitate Hangers. ($45 off MSRP)

For $100, you'll receive 15 Levitate Hangers. ($80 off MSRP)

For $160, you'll receive 20 Large and 10 Small Levitate Hangers. ($150 off MSRP)

For $350, you'll receive 50 Levitate Hangers. ($250 off MSRP)

The Creator

Moshe Levis - Product designer and photographer. 

* Levitate Hanger is not a 3M product, but it includes Command® Strips from 3M.

Risks and challenges

From the first sketch of Levitate Hanger through prototype development, we’ve taken all the steps to insure the success of Levitate Hanger. We’ve secured our manufacturer with ideal production capabilities for the our innovative picture hanger.

As per your orders, you can sure to receive them at the allocated time because our homework on shipping and fulfillment is done so. You'll be the first people in the world to enjoy all the benefits of Levitate Hanger and for the best prices!

If for any reason we encounter issues with our production, we have manufacturers and solutions in line. And of course, we don't keep secrets so we’ll keep you posted, every step of the way.

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

Levitate Hanger will last you for years to come so you can use it over and over again. Its unique design is the core of such feature.

Reusability and recyclability

Levitate Hanger is reusable so you don't ever have to throw it away. If, one day, you don't need it anymore, you can give it away to someone else.

Sustainable materials

Our plan is to eventually manufacture Levitate Hanger from recycled plastics. We love this planet and we are eager to protect it. With your help, we'll be closer to that mission and we'll be able to recycle more and more plastics in order to create future Levitate Hangers.
story_txt:
Did you know that most people hang at least 15 pictures on their walls?
And most people take 5-10 minutes to hang a single picture!
That’s about 2.5 hours you can spend on doing something you love!
For years, these problems have continued without a revolutionary solution.
Until now!

In Only 2 Steps
Step 1: Attach Levitate Hanger set to the back of your picture.
Step 2: Push your picture onto the wall.
Step 3: (optional): Rotate as needed. Or just for fun ;)
 
We asked people if they hang pictures on their walls. Obviously, some said yes and some said no.
Levitate: Why not?
The People: Honestly? Pure laziness.
Can you guess what we replied with?
Levitate: Perfect!
One of the main reasons people are not hanging pictures on their walls is laziness.  It's not something to be ashamed of if you are too lazy to hang you pictures.  We get it.  We have so many other priorities in life, so we say "we'll hang these pictures some other time", but we never do.
Being lazy about hanging pictures is not because we are lazy people, it's because of what it takes to hang them: taking measurements, finding our tool kits, drilling/hammering into the wall, leveling, needing the help of others, cleaning afterwards etc.
Introducing Levitate Hanger!
Now, you can finally hang your pictures in 10 seconds or less!
With Levitate Hanger you follow only two steps: attaching one part of the hanger on the picture and attaching the other part of the hanger on the wall. A third step is optional - rotate as needed.
No more measuring, using tools, finding help, leveling or cleaning.

One of the things you can't do with other picture hangers is hang other stuff, like tablets, phones, small cameras, decorative plates etc.

Levitate Hanger is today's quickest and most versatile solution for hanging your pictures. Thanks to Levitate Hanger, you can hang pictures in just 10 seconds AND have it perfectly leveled on your wall. 
No more nails, picture wire, measuring and pencil marks. You can even easily rotate between portrait and landscape orientations.
Levitate Hanger is mess-free and reusable. If you ever want to move or take down a picture, pull the adhesives downwards to release the hanger from the wall. It will not damage your wall or the hanger and you'll be able to reuse Levitate Hanger over and over.
Its unique design makes easy to use and enables you to hang more than pictures. Hang your tablets, smart phones, smart home devices, etc. too.
Back our project now to help us revolutionize how we hang pictures, and experience first-hand how Levitate Hanger can make this part of your life much easier and more creative.

We designed Levitate Hanger to solve what most picture hangers lack.  This made Levitate Hanger the most versatile hanger out there.
 1. Hang any picture, tablet or phone in 10 seconds or less

2. Rotating 360 degrees and stops at any desired angle
Levitate Hanger is the only picture hanger out there that lets you rotate your pictures 360 degrees.  What is it good for? Tilting your picture left or right, post hanging, is important for not needing to use any leveling tools.  We could have stopped there, but we didn't want to limit YOUR creativity.  What if you have art works that can hang horizontally and vertically?  Heck, what if you have abstract images that can be presented upside down, downside up, left side right etc?
Creativity is one of the most important traits we have, and we at Levitate Hanger definitely don't want to limit that.

3. Change pictures without replacing all hangers
If you ever used other picture hanger systems, you probably know, in order to put up a different size picture you had to replace the hanger on the wall or replace the hanging system if they are both on the wall and on the picture.  Other than making you waste precious time and money it also added trash to our environment.
With Levitate Hanger you can change pictures to any size you want.  Replacement is done in matter of seconds, and you create far less trash than before!

4. One size fits all
We design for the future. After this campaign we're planning on manufacturing different sizes of Levitate Hangers.  With that in mind, we don't want you to waste money on a whole new system and create more waste.  Instead, you'll be able to purchase different sizes of the Slider, while using the same holder.
Why different sizes of the Slider? If you want to hang smaller things like lightweight pictures, phones.  It will save you money and help our planet stay cleaner.

5. Hangs more than only pictures
Remember creativity?  Why hang only pictures Levitate Hanger allows you to hang almost anything with a flat surface?
With Levitate Hanger, you can hang your tablet and set it free.  We know tablets are very powerful when they are in different orientation.  The ability to rotate your tablet 360 degrees lets your tablet unleash its real purpose.
Why stop at tablets? Hang your smart phone too.  Hang it in your car, on the kitchen cabinet, on the wall near your bed, your screen's mount, your refrigerator, your desk, your mirror, your car's window.  Wherever you want!
6. Leaves damage-free walls
Another reason Levitate Hanger was created is to leave your walls free of damage.  Drilling and hammering into your walls ruins and weakens them and if you do that a lot, you'll get to a point where you have no more space to put nails and screws in. Besides, "Swiss cheese walls" are not fun to look at and they are not fun to fix when the time comes.
This feature eliminates risks of hitting wiring, pipes etc and there's no need to locate a wall stud.  These are common problems when using nails and hooks. 

7. Reusable (because we love this planet!)
When created Levitate Hanger decided we don't want anyone to ever through it away and make unnecessary trash.  Making it a reusable hanger was the ultimate solution.  If one day you don't want/need to use it anymore, you can just hand it out or sell it.
If you wish to move your picture from one side of the wall to another, there's no need to throw it away and purchase a new Levitate Hanger.  You simply replace the adhesives, attach the Slider on the picture and the Holder on the wall. Done!
8. Can hold up to 20lbs
Size doesn't matter. Weight does. Your pictures, tablets etc can be as large as they can get, but if they weigh 20lbs or less you can hang them with Levitate Hanger.
9. Pictures are "floating"/"levitating"
rather than flush on the wall or with an angle.  This gives room for some extra creativity when it comes to interior design.  More on that in the near future.


By making Levitate Hanger rotate 360 degrees we eliminate the need for leveling before and/or after you hang the picture and by making Levitate Hanger hold up to 20lbs without any nails, screws etc we eliminate all measuring.  You simply push the picture onto your desired spot on the wall.  No need to measure distance from the floor, ceiling, sides etc.  

Should you really use it? We'll let you to decide if you want to hang your pictures (or tablets) with little to no effort. 
Why Was Levitate Hanger Born?
As a landscape and fine art photographer I print many of the photographs I capture and usually have them framed or mounted on acrylic, metal, foam board etc and when it's time to hang those photos on the wall I procrastinate. A lot!

As per hooks and nails, I had to measure the distance between the wire, the picture and the wall.  After finally hanging it, the picture was at an angle, sticking out of the wall at the top.  Sometimes the hook/nail was visible above the picture which is not such a beautiful sight.
There had to be something better!  Well... there wasn't.
Since I come from the design world I started sketching up potential solutions.  Suddenly it came to me, the simplest thing no one thought about (for some strange reason).  Make it tilt AFTER I hang the picture.  Easier said than done.  
Everything in the design had to work in perfect harmony.  The shape, the functionality, the size.  Everything.  After a few good designs that already worked (theoretically) I got the final design I was happy with and sent it to my brother so he could model it in a 3D software and print a prototype.
Guess what? It was working better than I expected.  Hence the reason you're reading about this kickstarter campaign.

Who do you think will win?

There is the two strongest superhero ever.
What do you think? Which superhero has more fans? 

If you like both, see the pack options on the right side.

About Fity-GOs

Fitye-GO is the funniest and the most versatile keyholder.
It's easy way to serve your favorite superhero's face for dessert, chocolate, pudding, jelly form or anything what you give your frineds to eat. :)

Or just invite your friends a whiskey and put superhero icecubes beside it.

Allways take it anywhere on your keychain! You never know when a smile needs! :)

 

Introduction

It is a lightweight silicon keychain. 

Each part is 5g / 0,2oz.

Other details

You can order 4 different colors each type. 
And ofcourse the price contains the shipping fee wordwide.

 

Social engagement

Social engagement is very important to us. That's why we are donateing 10% of our profit to the Children Cancer Foundation.

Follow us on the socail media to see the results.

 

​Timeline

story:
Welcome! We are here to proudly announce an amazing project which holds a strong purpose and vision for the future. REMADE is not only about products, it's about making a difference. Our planet faces 400 million tonnes of plastic waste each year. A shocking 91% of plastic isn't being recycled. Single-use plastics contribute to this percentage with more than a half of the total. 

REMADE is here with a mission. Re-purpose single-use plastics and create products which can easily be used in any home. And this is the story of REMADE. 

 

All types of plastics, which we make our coasters and placemats with, are fully recycled, single-use plastics that have been recovered from the environment. Each pledge made contributes to getting large amounts of plastic waste out from nature, which (if left in a landfill) would not degrade for more than 500 years, making our planet more polluted as years go by. 

Every individual product in our range is created using a specific type of plastic which makes each of them 100% recyclable and ready to be reused again!  

 

Certificate of contribution

For each purchase of any product within our range and any quantity, every order will come with a certificate of contribution which will verify how many single-use plastic pieces were retrieved from nature and used to create your placemat or coaster which showcases how much your contribution has helped the environment and the planet as a whole.

E-waste dump is a term not many people have heard about, but presents a real and scary issue. Due to higher demands for electronic devices, more waste is produced which then gets sent to developing countries across Africa and Asia. Around 50 million tonnes of electronic waste (e-waste) are being thrown away each year. This waste is being burnt and seriously affects not only the environment but people's health. 

Annually, billions of pounds of more plastic end up in the world's oceans. Studies estimate there are now 15–51 trillion pieces of plastic in the world's oceans. These pieces of plastic stay in the water for years and years as they are unable to degrade, making animals' lives harder and endangered. 

These environmentally-friendly products are being produced with highest quality and lowest carbon footprint possible. Plastic manufacturing process uses 100% renewable energy and is sourced from a zero-waste company. 

Water-proof, rot-proof and strong weather resistance.

Risks and challenges

Our team has created a lot of successful campaigns and products for our supporters, and we are very happy and proud to announce this one as well. But there have certainly been some challenges throughout the whole process of development.  

As we are all very aware of, difficult times hit all of us, which come with their own issues. Between restrictions and protecting each other, we have managed to find middle ground to stay safe but still work on this great project in order to present it to all of you. Furthermore, many deadlines had to be adjusted and ended up being pushed back as a result of national restrictions. With a great deal of patience and true belief in this product, we have successfully created a simple and convenient solution to a big plastic pollution and single-use plastic waste issue of the modern day.  

Some potential risks include product malfunction which can be easily resolved through our customer service voice Sophie. She will handle any issue or need for assistance with a friendly approach in hope of a simple solution for all our consumers.

story:
The sundial and digital clock just had a baby and its name is Luma! And we're proud to offer it to you in this Kickstarter campaign. Don't miss out because it won't be made available again after the campaign ends. This is a one-time deal, folks!

 

Your Luma will look great in any setting, whether it be on a patio table or on the concrete slab beside the pool. By using the jar attachment, you'll be able to fill the jar with things that will be sure to complement any environment.

 

Based on the innovative concept originally developed by Mojoptix, the functionality is actually quite simple. Luma is filled with a complex structure, allowing light to pass through in different patterns as the sun moves across the sky. The result is a digital clock created entirely by sunlight!

 

Luma works in both the northern and southern hemispheres. However, they are mirrored versions of one another. The version you receive will correspond with the shipping address in your Kickstarter account unless specified otherwise while placing your pledge.

 

If a digital clock created with sunlight isn't enough, we've also added a thermometer and humidity display. The temperature can be set to Celsius or Fahrenheit. And yes, it goes in the rain.

 

You can adjust for daylight savings time (DST) by simply twisting the Luma until the time moves up one hour (approx. 15º).

 

You can choose to mount your Luma onto a standard Mason jar with the included attachment or secure the base directly to the surface of your choice.

 

Setting up your Luma is easy as 1, 2, 3! Set it down, lift it up to match your latitude and point it north. That's it, you can now watch the sun create digits in amazement!

 

Producing the Luma is only possible by additive manufacturing. We use a resin-based system which provides the best quality in any additive manufacturing method available today.

Since resin printing can be susceptible to sun damage when unprotected, we protect each Luma with a UV coating so it will remain beautiful for years to come.

 

Your package will arrive with all the parts below; the main sundial, the thermometer connector, the base, the jar attachment and all the necessary hardware.

story:
TiKA is an award winning modular creation kit suited to build an unlimited number of amazing structures, such as lamps, holders for your plants or just jaw-dropping design objects for your apartment, office or anything in between.​ TiKA's modular system opens a world of possibilities through its five different sized wooden building sticks and small magnetic metal balls that act as connectors with flexible joints.


TiKA's modular system opens a world of possibilities through its 5 different sized sticks, metal balls that act as connectors and flexible joints, along with 3 different bases to build upon. 

See a comparative look on the number of TiKA Sticks included in each KiT below.

Building with TiKA is easy! 
1. Start with a base (see the base options above in How does TiKA work section) 
2. Begin to simply connect the TiKA sticks with the metal balls to build mesh like structures
3. Display your creations around your home! 

You also have the option to create a circuit with the help of the electric base, electricity conducting TiKA sticks and the LED fitted sticks. The structures you build are brought to life through light!

story:
Eclipse Bundle: ab jetzt gibt es das brightup Bundle auch in Schwarz! Das Eclipse Bundle beinhaltet die Zentraleinheit und drei Zwischenstecker für 249€. Diese Angebot ist exklusiv nur über Indiegogo verfügbar!

brightup ermöglicht das automatisieren, steuern und personalisieren der Beleuchtung Zuhause. Es ist ohne jeglichen Aufwand zu installieren und bietet kontextbasierte Automatisierung, d.h. es nutzt alle verfügbaren Informationen, wie Sonnen Auf- und Untergangszeiten und Ihren Standort, um die Beleuchtung entsprechend anzupassen. Mit dem brightup App ist es sehr einfach und für jeden möglich dieses Verhalten nach Ihren Wünschen einzustellen.

Verbinden Sie einfach Ihre bestehende Lampe mit einem brightup Gerät und stellen Sie den Alarm mit dem Smartphone ein. brightup weckt Sie sanft zur gewünschten Zeit durch langsames Heraufdimmen Ihrer Lampen.

Stecken Sie Ihren Fernseher in einen brightup Stecker. Wenn Sie den Fernseher nun anschalten, bemerkt dieser einen Anstieg im Energieverbrauch. Die Zentraleinheit nutz diese Information und aktiviert die voreingestellte Fernsehbeleuchtung.

Mit brightup können Sie Ihre Lampen mit verschiedenen Helligkeiten zu Szenarien gruppieren. Diese können anschließend abgespeichert und jederzeit über die App mit einem Klick wieder aktiviert werden.

brightup's cleverer Algorithmus integriert Wetterinformationen und weiß, wann es draußen dunkel ist. Wenn Sie zu dieser Zeit nicht zu Hause sind, schaltet brightup in zufälliger Abfolge Lampen an.

brightup bietet kontextbasierte Automatisierung ohne jeglichen Installationsaufwand. Alle anderen Systeme dieser Preiskategorie bieten lediglich Fernsteuerung über das Smartphone, was bedeutet, dass Sie dieses jedes Mal herausholen müssen, um das Licht anzumachen.

brightup geht einen Schritt weiter und bietet echte Automatisierung!

Wir vier haben eine doppelten Masterabschluss in Ingenieurwesen und Management. Seit 2012 arbeiten wir an dem Konzept von brightup und haben seit dem ein großartiges Team aus Software- und Hardware Entwicklern und Produkt- und Grafikdesignern aufgebaut.

Wir haben die Entwicklung der Prototypen der Hardware und der Apps abgeschlossen und brauchen nun Ihre Hilfe, um brightup Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen. Mit dem gesammelten Geld können wir die Kosten für die Spritzgussformen und die Fertigstellung der Apps bezahlen.

Seien Sie dabei und machen Sie es möglich!

Produktion: Um die Risiken während der Produktion zu minimieren, haben wir von Anfang an mit möglichen Partern zusammengearbeitet, um alle Schritte, Mengen und Kosten genau absehen zu können.

Lieferkette: Die Lieferzeiten für alle Komponenten wurden mehrfach überprüft und mehrere Lieferanten ausgewählt.

Hardware & Software Integration: Von Anfang an haben wir durch direkte Abstimmung dafür gesorgt, das Risiko für die gleichzeitige Entwicklung von Hardware und Software zu reduzieren.

  • Werden die Stecker in den USA funktionieren?
    Nein. Die aktuelle Version mit Stecker-Typ CEE7/7 „Schuko“ funktioniert in den meisten Ländern Europas.
  • Welche Glühlampen können gedimmt werden?
    Die brightup Stecker und der Unterputz-Dimmer können normale Glühbirnen und Halogen-Lampen bis zu 300 W dimmen. Neuere LED-Lampen und Energiesparlampen können auch an das System angeschlossen und oft auch gedimmt werden. Hierbei kommt es aber im Einzelfall auf die Lampe an.
  • In welchen Ländern Europas funktioniert der Stecker?
    Der brightup Stecker funktioniert in den meisten europäischen Ländern außer Zypern, Dänemark, Italien, Irland, Malta, Schweiz und Vereintes Königreich. Schreib uns, wenn Du nicht sicher bist ob das brightup System in Deinem Land funktioniert.
  • Fallen monatliche Nutzungsgebühren an?
    Unsere Indiegogo-Besteller bekommen komplett freien Zugang für unsere App und die Cloud.
  • Wie sicher ist das System?
    Das System ist so sicher wie das Online-Banking von Deiner Bank. Unsere Technologien sind auf dem neusten Stand der Technik und benutzen SSL und OAuth 2.0, um die Sicherheit des Systems rundum zu gewährleisten.

English Version:

Eclipse bundle: Our brightup central unit and smart plug are now available in shiny black. The Eclipse bundle includes a central unit and three plugs for 249€. This offer is available only on indiegogo.

brightup is connected hardware that allows you to automate, customize and remote control your lights at home. It comes with zero effort installation and context-aware automation. It uses all available information like the position of the sun and your location to create the best lighting in your home. With the brightup app, it is very easy to set automation rules. The most common ones are already pre-defined for you!

Just connect your existing lamp to a brightup device and set an alarm in your smartphone. brightup will wake you up gently at the set wake up time by gradually dimming up the connected lamps.

Connect your TV to a brightup plug. When you now turn on your TV, the brightup plug notices the increase in electrical consumption. The central unit uses this information to trigger your pre-set TV light scenario.

With brightup you can group your lamps with different brightness levels to light scenarios. Save your scenarios and activate it with the app when needed with just one touch.

brightup's clever algorithm integrates weather information and knows when it is dark outside. If you're not home at this time, brightup turns on your lamps in a random way.

brightup is unique due to its zero installation effort and the context-aware automation. All other systems in this price range only offer a smartphone-based remote control for your lamps, which means you have to take out your phone every time you want to switch on a lamp.

brightup goes beyond that and offers real automation!

The four of us have a double degree masters in Management and Engineering. We have been working on the concept of brightup since 2012 and built up an amazing team of software and hardware developers along with product & graphic designers.

We developed the prototypes of the hardware and the apps. With your support we can bring brightup to life. The money we raise through the campaign will be used for tooling and finalising the apps.

Join us to make this happen!

Manufacturing: To minimize the risk in Manufacturing, we collaborated early with potential manufacturing partners and this helped us establish the time, cost and volumes required for production.

Supply Chain/Sourcing: Lead times for every individual element in the bill of materials has been verified and wherever possible dual suppliers have been identified.

Hardware & Software integration: We paid close attention to this risk from the beginning and from our current state of development are confident that this risk is minimal.

  • Will the plugs work in the US?
    No. The current version is CEE 7/7 which works in most European countries.
  • Which light bulbs can be dimmed?
    The brightup plug can dim incandescent and halogen light bulbs up to 300 W and the in-wall dimmer can dim incandescent and halogen light bulbs upto 600W. Newer LED and fluorescent light bulbs can also be used with the system.
  • In which European countries will the plugs work?
    The brightup plugs work in most European countries with the exception of Cyprus, Denmark, Italy, Ireland, Malta, Switzerland and United Kingdom. Write to us if you’re not sure whether the brightup system works in your country.
  • Are there monthly subscription fees?
    Our Indiegogo backers gain free access to our app and cloud services.
  • How safe is the system?
    The system is as safe as the online transactions that you carry out with your bank. We use the latest web technologies to secure the system, including SSL and OAuth 2.0.

story:
"Transform any object into a notifying object"

Notifon is a push-notification device that connects you to your home and office wherever you are.

Notifon sends you instant alerts on your SmartPhone, Email, Twitter, or even Karotz when a real life event occurs at your home or office.

Use cases

Garage door

Mailbox

Switch button

Water leak detector


Other use cases...

  • Know when your kids are back home by putting Notifon on your entry door.
  • Get notified when somebody rings at your doorbell.
  • Build a cool Twittering toaster like @mytoaster.
  • Set up a Notifying Cat Door for your cat! (cc @PepitoTheCat)
  • Tell your customers when your store is open or closed by sending a tweet.
  • Know when someone opens the fridge, your safe or the guns cabinet.
  • Use it as a cheap alarm system for your rented flat.
  • In fact, Notifon is universal. Your imagination is the limit!

What do notifications look like?

Here is what a notification looks like on an iPhone, a WindowsPhone, an Android Phone, an iPad and a Karotz. Text-to-Speech function is available for Android Phones and Karotz.

Safari Push Notification on MacOSX Mavericks:

Notification on Windows 8:

Notification on a Pebble SmartWatch:

Other kinds of notifications:

  • Email.
  • Twitter.
  • Custom HTTP GET/POST request.
  • Many more to come...

Notifon and Web Camera

If you own an Internet Web Camera, you can attach real time pictures to your Email and Tweet notifications.

The Cloud

Two years ago we launched PushingBox, a cloud service where you can manage your notifications. You can configure each real life event to trigger multiple actions such as Push+Tweet+Email. All this in real time!

PushingBox is already used by thousands of registered users who have their own triggering hardware. We have sent millions of notifications since 2012.

What does Notifon looks like?

Notifon is smart, small and beautiful. With a curved white glossy design, Notifon is the kind of technology you don't want to hide.

Notifon comes with one Hub and one or more Node(s). The Hub is an internet-connected gateway that communicates wirelessly with the Nodes(s), and passes on the notifications to the Cloud.

Tech Specs

Dimensions

Wireless technology

Notifon is a wireless Internet of Things device. It uses ZigBee to communicate. ZigBee is a low powered technology, made for the IoT world. The transmit power is 15 times lower than the WiFi for the same range.

Battery life

Don't even think about it. The battery in each Node will last between two to five years depending on your usage. Once depleted, the battery used in Notifon is a commonly found in any convenience or electronics store (type CR2032).

Our first prototype has been working since february 2013 even though it transmits more than 20 notifications per day!

Extendable

You can connect up to 14 Nodes with one Hub. Just put the battery in and it's ready to use.

Power consumption

The power consumption of the Hub is less than 0.2W, that's about $0.20 per year :-)

Sensors

Notifon is universal. You can use any sensor that has two states, such as a switch, a push button, a magnetic door switch, a relay... Notifon allows you to predefine a set of actions for each state.

Simplicity

Simplicity is key! We worked very hard to design and build a product so simple that anyone who knows how to create a Facebook account should be able to set up Notifon.

Essentially, this is all you need to do:

  • Plug the power and Ethernet cable to the Hub.
  • Register the Node into the Cloud by entering his serial number (called the DeviceID).
  • Add action(s) into each Scenario, such as : Send to my phone "The door is open".
  • Place the Node on the object you want to transform into a notifying object.

Perks for Indiegogo contributors

Where we are in development?

We already have the working prototype, final enclosure, Cloud service and we're now focused on:

  • Final board review.
  • Customizations options on PushingBox.
  • Hiring talented individuals to join the team.

We will soon begin the process of:

  • Producing a small batch of PCB.
  • Designing the supply chain process.
  • Tooling.
  • Materials procurement.
  • Designing the packaging.
  • Launching the production with your help!

Risks and challenges

Launching a mass production from a prototype is a huge challenge, and we are well aware of it.

We are already making dozens of prototypes that have been tested by our beta testers and our first prototype has been working well since february 2013.

We have contacts for mass PCB production, enclosures and the plastic injection molds are ready to be built. To simplify the production, we will be doing the programming and shipping in-house.

We are using a ZigBee Module that is FCC, IC, ETSI, CE, RoHS certified. Because of that we'll save months of work and thousands of dollars on certification fees.

The cloud has been working for two years and has successfully sent millions of notifications to subscribing users.

All we need now is your support!

Team

Clément Storck

Founder of Notifon and PushingBox. At this time, based in France. Worked for Orange Group as a data center engineer.
Home intelligence addict, playing with notifications since 2010, puts his cat on Twitter! @PepitoTheCat
— @ClementStorck

Wanted

This is only the beginning and we are already looking for great people. You are passionate in building cool stuff, love design and simplicity and you are ready to travel (USA, France, China). Contact us! (clement[at]notifon[dot]net)

FAQ

What's in the box?
Each Hub comes with a USB power adapter and Ethernet cable. Each Node comes with a battery and a magnetic door switch.

What is the range of ZigBee?

Same as Wifi.

What kind of sensor can I connect to a Node?

Any sensor that has two states, such as a switch, a push button, a magnetic door switch, a relay... You will be able to define a set of actions for each state. It does not work with temperature sensor or other analog inputs.

Is the Cloud (PushingBox) free?

There will be no subscription fees for Indiegogo backers.

Does Notifon work with 110, 220, 230 or 240v panels?

Yes, the Hub is powered by USB, so it works anywhere in the world.

How long does the Node battery last?

We spent a long time to optimize the power usage as best we could. The battery life is enormous, from two to five years.

Can I replace the battery of a Node?

Yes, just open the case and install new CR2032 battery.

On which smartphones can I receive notifications?

Push notifications work with iPhones/iPads/iPods, Android Phones and Windows Phones. It doesn't support Push notification for BlackBerry yet, but you can still receive Email and Tweet notifications.

Do I need a data connection on my phone to receive Push notifications?

Yes. Push notifications are free and use the data network. We also may add Short Text Message (SMS) notification, but SMS are not free...

What happens when there is an Internet or power outage in my home?

Notifications won't be sent.

How secure is Notifon?

Let's be clear - A hacker will never be able to open your garage door using Notifon because it is a one-way only device.

Why isn’t shipping included?

Shipping prices vary by location and country. It’s simpler (and cheaper for you) to handle this separately. Please note that you may be subjected to additional customs fees, Taxe (VAT) depending on your country.

Could you make shipping cheaper for us?

This is possible by shipping in bulk. If one of your friend buy a Notifon, we can send them grouped, you only pay for one shipping. So go out and start knocking on your neighbors' doors :)

Which PCB board manufacturer we used?

We prototyped Notifon using the awesome Purple PCB service from OSH Park.

Any more questions? Ask us! (clement[at]notifon[dot]net)

Press & Media

  • Download the Media pack
  • Download the Press Release
  • Get the Video
  • Follow us on Twitter: @Notifon
  • Like us on Facebook: Notifon
  • AngelList: RedLab
  • Contact us: contact[at]redlab[dot]io

“The older I get, the more I see how much motivations matter. The Zune was crappy because the people at Microsoft don’t really love music or art the way we do. We won because we personally love music. We made the iPod for ourselves, and when you’re doing something for yourself, or your best friend or family, you’re not going to cheese out. If you don’t love something, you’re not going to go the extra mile, work the extra weekend, challenge the status quo as much.”

—Steve Jobs

Press & Media

Download the Media pack
Download the Press Release
Get the Video
Follow us on Twitter: @Notifon
Like us on Facebook: Notifon
AngelList: RedLab
Contact us: contact[at]redlab[dot]io

“The older I get, the more I see how much motivations matter. The Zune was crappy because the people at Microsoft don’t really love music or art the way we do. We won because we personally love music. We made the iPod for ourselves, and when you’re doing something for yourself, or your best friend or family, you’re not going to cheese out. If you don’t love something, you’re not going to go the extra mile, work the extra weekend, challenge the status quo as much.”
—Steve Jobs

story:
What´s the Wino board?

The Wino board is a small, Arduino compatible microcontroller gadget with built-in WiFi for only $15. It´s easy to program and you can use it to control almost any device you can imagine.

Wino board features:

  • Arduino hardware and software compatibility
  • User friendly programming with thousands of code samples
  • Perfect for mobile application due to its very low power consumption
  • Stackable header to add upgrades easily
  • Connect it to your home network, your Smartphone or tablet
  • Out of the box internet capability over WiFi!

Please find more technical details at www.wino-board.com.

Why we need you!

Until now there is no really cheap and easy solution on the market which grants wireless access for your microcontroller to the internet over WiFi. So it´s quite expensive to realize the often proposed Internet of Things (IoT) at this time. We want to provide an more affordable solution which combines the benefits of the strong Arduino community and latest technology in one device. But we need your help to make this real!

  • We need approx. 30,000€ to start mass production and bring our prototype in a customer ready device.
  • Help us and get one of the first Wino boards, maybe until christmas?
  • We will try anything to bring the Wino board to life even if the funding is not successful, so any help is highly appreciated.

The dream of the Internet of Things

We would like to provide a solution for beginners, makers, enthusiasts and also professionals to realize their ideas and bring the dream of the Internet of Things to life. There are endless possibilities like:

  • Home automation, home control and home security
  • Toys, fun projects or mutimedia applications
  • Fitness and Medical devices
  • DIY projects

and many more...

Risks and chances

We put already a lot of work, money and passion in this project. There is still a lot of work to do but now we are sure that we are able to finish device according to the communities needs. What helps us to make the project successful:

  • More then 10 years experience in product development
  • After almost one year of development and the 4th version of a prototype we are finally ready to bring it to your home
  • A lot of passion and we are big fans of maker devices like the Arduino and the Raspberry Pi

Other ways to help

You can help us in many ways:

  • Share this campaign with your friends and family
  • Give us your feedback
  • Visit us at our homepage our on our facebook page
  • Tell your friends about the Wino board

We are very thankful for any help.
